Review: Omg never ever ordering from deliveroo again 1st time ever ordered from the worst food delivery service bloody ordered a expensive load of food and the poncy driver must have taken it home to eat with his family for free didn't even get my food and get a happy message saying enjoy your meal its 5 minutes early. Then call up customer service and now have to wait 24 to 48 hours for a solution. Waste of timers never ordering again with this rubbish service  note to self stick to uber eats & just eat in future.

Title: Driver not the same as shown on app
Review: Delivery was ok, but driver was clearly not the person named on the app.

Title: The restaurant gave me Deliveroo number and Deliveroo actually gave me credit for undelivered dinner
Review: I ordered sushi delivery for 80 pounds. Instead I got the wrong order for 30 pounds. The driver made a mistake. As it was a contactless delivery, he sped away before I could figure it out. There is no call number or live chat in Deliveroo site to make a quick fix. When I filled in complaint form Deliveroo issued a promise to get back to me in two days. Thank you for ruined dinner Deliveroo!Eventually the restaurant gave me Deliveroo number and Deliveroo gave me credit for undelivered dinner

Title: King of food delivery
Review: So far no problems, they help you when there is a problem and their app is great to use

Title: Bad company. Avoid
Review: My employer organised voucher from deliveroo to order lunch for virtual company day. I have placed an order for a higher amount than in voucher and went to pay the difference hopping that deliveroo will deduct different amount while checked out. But deliveroo charged me whole amount! My employer and me both made sevaral contacts to deliveroo customers service but they denied refund and suggested me to order another meal today to use the voucher.  Why will I order 2 meals? I lost the voucher as it only lasted 12 hours. Awful service. No care for customers.  Never ever I will use deliveroo again and I won't reccomend it to anyone.

Title: My order was delivered to the wrong‚Ä¶
Review: My order was delivered to the wrong address. I contacted Deliveroo and they advised their complaints department would contact me within 24-48hrs to discuss refund and I didn‚Äôt hear from them after 3 days so I called them back and again they advised I‚Äôd get a call back within 24-48hrs. It was only when I threatened to expose their poor service on social media they authorised my refund immediately.

Title: Shocking customer treatment
Review: Ordered food at 7pm - 2 hours later we couldn‚Äôt get in contact with restaurant (nor could Deliveroo) so we ordered a pizza. Food then turned up finally at 9:40pm but we refused it. Deliveroo won‚Äôt give refund as they said they delivered it. Have complained and no one responded so put a claim through resolver. Will never use again ü§¨

Title: Good sevice .good drivers . Good staff ..
Review: 1..pick up your food 2..let you phone on and answer to the phone when the driver arive .3...don't be lazy to come down from the flat, to the door, to colect your food ..,drivers, sometime not having where to park the cars,motors or bicycle 4..be more polite ,drivers they do all what is need to find you ,they dont know all the flat numbers ,houses or street sat nav isn't accurate all the time . Nor time to travel from point A to B.5..some of you dont know even the number of the door oposite to them and they live there 10years :)) 6..be kind and be safe all the problems will go .:)

Title: Your delivery staff are dishonest
Review: Your delivery staff are dishonest. In this case they are regularly stealing mail and parcels from the building on their way out after a delivery.

Title: Terrible Experience
Review: The order was fine until I watched the tracker go right past my house and then the tracker tells me my order has been delivered.I phoned your support number and requested a refund. To be told that the operator on the phone had already requested a redelivery and couldn‚Äôt process the refund. To be clear I asked how long the re-delivery would take and after hearing, I was very clear that I did not want it and only wanted a refund.I was then on hold for the best part of 20 minutes throughout our call while the operator struggled to rectify the error and issue the refund.I was also then told that there would be no additional compensation despite wasting my time and losing complete trust in the service. My view here is this error is entirely down to the deliveroo service and it is not the restaurant's fault.After arranging alternative food, we then get a loud knock/ door bell ringing at our door at a late time with the replacement food delivery. We deliberately didn‚Äôt want the redelivery to avoid such loud unexpected noises while our young children had gone to bed.Altogether a poor experience that will lead me to avoid deliveroo in the future and the unhelpful support after the error of no food will leave me with only very poor opinions to share with my friends and colleagues.To top it off - the automated response said they would respond within 24 hours..... I'm still waiting!

Title: Please be aware !!
Review: Please be aware, you will receive your order after few hours !! If you lucky. I was waiting couple of hours for my order, at the end I was forced to cancel my order. The best is that I will have to wait few day‚Äôs to receive my money back. For what is this how they say my colleagues.Last time when I order through deliveroo !

Title: Liars, jokers, thieves
Review: Liars, jokers, thieves Status changed to deliver after 1 hr 20 mins but never received. Called CS N i was told my address is not accessible rider couldn‚Äôt reach. I am overwhelmed with rider behaviour that he/she rode/drive or cycle for 2.86miles then couldn‚Äôt bother to call if he was lost or couldn‚Äôt find and instead of changing the status to failed he changed to delivered. Great, well doneüëåüñï. Its the same address where they already have delivered a lot of times. Clearly company is going downhill.

Title: THINK ABOUT YOUR CUSTOMERS AND MAKE MORE EFFORT!!!!!!
Review: I think this service is absolutely appalling,as the deliveroo riders do not make enough effort in to finding out who you are before they hand you the food.Three times now,I have had my food given to the wrong person,this costs a lot of money. they dont keep note of the riders name it should be shown on order history or receipt. So it makes it hard to prove the food has gone elsewhere to get a refund even with an order number you wont get your money back you can only reorder. The company and there riders need to take better care

Title: Orders never arrive
Review: Our last two orders were reported as delivered and neither one turned up. Did manage to get a refund on both occasions at least. Overall, very unreliable to the point that we will stop using.

Title: Joke of a company
Review: There has not been a single time where my order has arrived 100% correct. There Is ALWAYS something missing, and I have even gotten completley wrong orders several times. There HAS to be something wrong with this app because is not just one restaurant, it is EVERY SINGLE ORDER. This company is a complete joke. Even here on trust pilot it has a 1.3 rating!!! Do the people that wok at Deliveroo sleep all day?!?!?! Why are they not fixing this terrible joke of a service?! And dont even get le started on customer service. They might as well not have it at all, as it is 100% useless.

Title: These guys are a joke and a shambles of‚Ä¶
Review: These guys are a joke and a shambles of a company.... Very short vision trying to exploit both restaurants and customers to make a quick ¬£¬£¬£¬£¬£..... I will never ever use any branch of them again.

Title: Not even worth 1 star
Review: Not even worth 1 star. Delivery is constantly late - gestimating 35 mins - then arriving 1 hour 30 late. Customer service seems to be just as useless as the tracking app that they use - no live tracking.Not worth the hassle - stay away

Title: I don‚Äôt think Deliveroo read their‚Ä¶
Review: I don‚Äôt think Deliveroo read their reviews to be honest! Anyway, this is the first time I ever used their service. I was 100% certain which restaurant I placed the order at, I mean 100% certain. Guess what? Deliveroo - not very cleverly enough really but rather stupidly - switched the order to another restaurant that A- I never heard of and B- I would never order from! They don‚Äôt even specialise in the food I ordered so I knew exactly where to order it from ( not the restaurant Deliveroo sneaked in by switching the order to them, completely overriding the first restaurant I chose and selected!) The manager, of the restaurant I never selected or hear of, said he had nothing to do with this and that I should take it up with Deliveroo. Deliveroo had already hid their customer service number and only provide an email adresse if you wish to complain or need to have a go at them for their not so clever scamming scam. When I got their number and phoned them I needed to speak up a tad louder because there was a  sound of a cockerel blasting the background - I thought the lady who answered had just woken up. After I spoke to her about what happened and explained how upset and very disappointed I was that Deliveroo would play such a silly trick on its customers, she said ¬´¬† Thank you for your feedback I will pass it on¬†¬ª The meal? Well, it wasn‚Äôt what we expected at all. It was very very very disappointing that Deliveroo would run such a scam on its customers, well: ex customers. How shameful Deliveroo, how very shameful

Title: Laziest delivery drivers
Review: Laziest delivery drivers. They can't be asked to deliver to my flat and keep asking me to come to collect downstairs. Very rude drivers, I'll stick to Just Eat or Uber Eats.

Title: Would give less than this if possible
Review: Would give less than this if possible. Placed an order with deliveroo. Food did not arrive. Took over an hour to get through due to high call volumes. Was then told I could reorder but it would take 45mins-70mins. All this without any form of compensation. I have ordered almost daily from deliveroo and will be moving to Ubereats or just eats.

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service - 3 times in a row on separate occasions had a variety of food never dispatched, wrong items turning up or rider not bringing my order. Each time shocking customer service, no empathy, no offer to redeliver, all they wanted to do was provide, at a push, a refund in the form of deliveroo credit. People order food because they are hungry - a delivery service should pride themselves on prompt accurate delivery, something deliveroo most definately cant.

Title: USE UBER EATS INSTEAD.
Review: A complete waste of time. ALWAYS late. IMPOSSIBLE to get your money back without a fight with some brain dead, slow life chat idiot. USE UBER EATS. Much more efficiency and handle complaints MUCH better. Would not recommend to my worst enemy. Painful service. Absolutely not customer centric.

Title: Utterly disappointing
Review: Utterly disappointing. Our family from overseas placed a takeaway order as a gift through a Deliveroo partner restaurant. Deliveroo took the money, kept sending status updates about the order but it never arrived! When we called the restaurant, they asked us to contact Deliveroo. Which we did, only to find out they have cunningly cancelled the order so the restaurant was none the wiser. Deliveroo then tried to pretend as if they had no control over this. Why have restaurants as partners on their platform if they can't have any control over the orders? The service is absolutely appalling. Terrible.  It's smacks of a scam. My advice to anyone is don't ever use Deluceroo.

Title: Not bad but not good either
Review: Not bad but could be better. I used to live in Ramsgate and didn‚Äôt have a problem with Deliveroo. However since relocating to London 2 out of 3 orders have had their problems. First one said that the address was wrong even though I checked it thoroughly before placing the order. Eventually they came down on my side and refunded the entire order, I placed it again with no problem. Tonight everything was going swimmingly until the order time kept updating and I waited for 30 minutes before contacting live chat. To cut the long short the driver had gone AWOL so a new driver was found. Deliveroo gave me ¬£2.50 compensation. It is because of how they have dealt with these problems I have awarded them 3 stars. I don‚Äôt like to complain but with the economic climate money is a little tight so ¬£15.00 for a pizza is pint is a lot of money and I would prefer to have it than leave it and go elsewhere. You will get another chance Deliveroo but my recent experiences have been less than good I am afraid.

Title: I placed my order to the wrong address‚Ä¶
Review: I placed my order to the wrong address (oops) and the very calming and professional Mary Grace from customer care helped me to cancel the order. Would use again for the customer service :)

Title: Excellently dealt with my refund issue, were very patient
Review: Someone broke into my account. Deliveroo issued a refund, which I thought was very kind as apparently my password was not good enough (I thought it was a safe password, but if that were so, they wouldn't have broken in). Then I was confused about the refund, and called customer service again. Everything was clarified adequately. The people at customer service were kind and patient with me throughout all of this, which I really thought was excellent, because I'm sure it's not exactly fun having to explain a customer about refunds etc.

Title: Deliveroo drivers are the worse
Review: Deliveroo drivers are the worse. Food never arrived multiple times. Driver never called, they just text to say they can‚Äôt find the address and cancelled my order.  Another  driver threatened to come to my house to fight me. It‚Äôs like anyone can be Deliveroo drivers, including thugs and criminals! I‚Äôve deleted the app. Never again!

Title: Ordered from Nandos
Review: Ordered from Nandos. Waited for 1h. It said it's been delivered but it wasn't. Bloody joke. Don't recommend it to anyone. It seems that drivers in deliveroo are hired from the 4th world countries.

Title: Unrightfully billed for months!
Review: Two months ago in September I was billed 7,99GBP for a transaction that I did not sign up for - by Deliveroo Plus - UK. I have no idea what this service is for nor did I sign up for it. I wasn't even in the UK during this time. I immediately got in touch with customer service and Joa was going to look into this, however now, over 2 months later, I still don't have a clear explanation and/or a refund. He said that someone by the name of Zixia has used my card details - I have no idea who this person is! Meanwhile I've been billed AGAIN in October for the same charges. This is ridiculous, how come I have to wait over 2 months (and counting..) for a proper explanation and resolution?! This is beyond disappointing and not to mention slow service!

Title: Poor service
Review: I placed an order from a restaurant which is two miles away or so and it said it‚Äôll will take 30 minutes to get here but it‚Äôs been 2 hours and still hasn‚Äôt arrived,I‚Äôm highly highly disappointed with their service. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this in the future. Also the recommend the app for a ¬£10 voucherSeems to be a a hoax as well

Title: Missing items
Review: Ordered from Aldi and a couple of items didnt arrive but instead of a refund I get a credit to use no I want a refund as I dont intend to use deliveroo again

Title: The Sydenham resident
Review: The Sydenham resident. The worst delivery company ever, on Halloween night they delivered an inappropriate order which was short. Their customer services are very rude and they don‚Äôt want to pay compensation

Title: Deliveroo
Review: Deliveroo . What a Halloween nightmare, after Deliveroo delivered a tenth of what we ordered and after calling them, we spoke to the spooky and rude Karen. She was very rude and unapologetic and even refused to give us a refund. Am done with Deliveroo they put profit before quality and poor customer care

Title: NON COViD COMPLIANCE
Review: deliveroo doesn not take covid serious. I work in a restaurant as a chef and when drovers come they never bring their carrier bags. They always stretch out their hand wanting to grab the bag. We ask them to please bring in their carriers, they sigh and hiss and many of them cant be bothered so they cancel the order and the customers have to wait for another driver. Personally i dont order from deliveroo and recommend my family not to as they can be a serious spreader of the virus.

Title: cold food
Review: cold food, and riders who are too stupid or lazy, to find my flat even though they're given detailed instruction.

Title: Literally the worst company ever
Review: Literally the worst company I have ever dealt with. I have ordered with them maybe 3 or 4 times and every single time I have ordered with them something has been missing or wrong. They initially credited back for missing drinks on first order but since then have basically made out that its me trying to get money off them or something. I've never had to complain about anything like this before, especially to get money back from any other company. Deliveroo is awful. So bad. Their customer service is just ridiculous. Last night ordered from five guys and ordered a bacon burger which came with cheese. I sent them the review advising incorrect item with a photo and then proceeded to order the same burger again but rang the five guys shop to make sure they didn't put cheese on it again. Deliveroo is saying they won't credit me for it. Why when there is clear proof that the item was wrong? Literally the worst company ever, hate them. I have said this before but I 100% mean it this time, never again.

Title: Zero customer service, charge for items not delivered
Review: Charged for item not delivered emailed as requested and provided detail response received stating they were unable to give me a refund.  Emailed back and generic response said I‚Äôd get a reply within 24 hours....that was 6 days ago......will not use again rip off merchants

Title: Terrible experience
Review: Terrible experience. Three times this month my order never showed up. Compensation was always laughable. Really bad service.

Title: Deliveroo is done
Review: Deliveroo is done. It‚Äôs horrendous. 1hr20 and several unhelpful people later we are waiting up not because we hope any longer for food ... but because eventually the door bell will ring and we have to answer it or the foxes will eat the food

Title: If you are business owner keep away. CS doesn't exist.
Review: We are a restaurant who wanted to join deliveroo. The guy called Mike called me up 3 weeks ago we agreed on terms and conditions asked me to pay up front ¬£96 which I did straight away. He told me that they would copy my menu from just eat in 2 3 days time. Its been a week I texted the guy he told me it would be by Friday. Nothing happened. I tried to contact deliveroo itself they told me by Wednesday it would be done. Nothing again. I emailed them again this week they didn't even reply. They gotta learn the business before trying to sign up takeaways? We are trying to get our money back now as we won't be using them.

Title: Terrible.
Review: Awful. Never ordering again . My order didn‚Äôt even come !!!

Title: Terrible terrible terrible !
Review: Terrible terrible terrible !! Deliveroo should do everyone a favour and stop operating. Placed an order, kept being delayed, an hour later contacted them via the app, received a number to contact the rider, rider had no idea what I‚Äôm talking about, contacted deliveroo, was informed the rider unassigned himself from the order, found another rider, again unassigned himself from the order. After over an 1hr 45min cancelled the order. NEVER AGAIN !! Will give my business to Uber Eats next time !! If you want to eat the same day, don‚Äôt use Deliveroo, not worth it!!

Title: Rubbish Company STAY AWAY!!
Review: i had ordered food via the app for lido noodle bar in hendon, the deliveroo driver went to wrong address due to system error, i asked him if he is able to make a deliver to my address he said he is speaking to deliveroo and he will get back to me...he never did...i called him again asking if he can deliver to my area, he said he it won‚Äôt be possible as he doesn‚Äôt have any delivery in my area i contacted deliveroo and they said they have given credit to my account and i can order again but it won‚Äôt allow me to order...i have requested my money back! I called them again yesterday and got that stupid response:‚ÄúAs we previously let you know, we are unable to offer you compensation for this order.Deliveroo monitors user activity and reserves the right to deactivate accounts found to breach our Terms of Service, which includes repeated unreasonable complaints or applying for undue refunds or credit, or any other good reason.Based on your activity, we will be suspending your Deliveroo customer account immediately and it will no longer be possible to order with us.We will not be responding to any further correspondence related to this matter‚Äù. Best wishes,Never using them again!Delete my account as I am NEVER using such a rubbish company again! ü§¨ü§¨

Title: Missing items and no refund
Review: Missing items and no refund, just credit that won't be useful since I'm never ordering through deliveroo again

Title: Terrible
Review: Terrible . Took nearly 2 hours for my order to get here and refused to cancel the order and give me my money back. Don‚Äôt order from Deliveroo

Title: Cold food, missing items and incorrect items.
Review: Cold food, incorrect items. They refunded me after pushing but they missed their chance.

Title: Ordered food that never arrived but said it was delivered
Review: Ordered food from deliveroo and the service is shocking, the food was apparently delivered but to who I don‚Äôt know. There was no number for the driver and the restaurant said they could not help as the food had left the shop. Delivery drivers give deliveroo a bad name! Will never use this service again. MY ADVICE DO NOT USE DELIVEROO.

Title: NEVER AGAIN
Review: NEVER AGAINwaiting nearly 2 hours for food for it ti then be cancelled. Absolutely appalling service. Never ever again!!!

Title: Bought 2 pizzas from Il Bianco today
Review: Bought 2 pizzas from Il Bianco today, via Deliveroo. I was very disappointed. Not only did the food arrive after one hour, only one pizza arrived, and the delivery man had a very poor attitude. In addition, I was not refunded for the missing pizza by Deliveroo, instead a credit was added to my account. I don‚Äôt believe that is legal, not providing a full refund if a service/ product isn‚Äôt delivered. Why should Diliveroo be pocketing my money. I called Il Bianco who said it‚Äôs not their problem, bad attitude, I should sort it out with Deliveroo. Dreadful service provider. If I could I‚Äôd give them a big fat zero. I‚Äôll only be using Uber Eats going forward. Suggest folk stop using Diliveroo!!!!

Title: Deliveroo tracked my food being‚Ä¶
Review: Deliveroo tracked my food being prepared and delivered. Turns out I was waiting for nothing (!). Deliveroo never delivered my food. They refunded me the money but that's it. No credit for going to bed hungry or for the inconvenience. I wish restaurants would just go back to doing their own deliveries.

Title: Cancelled order after TWO HOURS
Review: I ordered my food. An hour later it still wasn‚Äôt delivered. I followed up twice with Deliveroo who then promised it would be delivered within 10 minutes, 15 minutes. After TWO HOURS I got a call to say the order was cancelled. I was given a full refund and 11 euro credit. Really poor

Title: Food never showed up
Review: Food never showed up. The app said delivered and when questioned they couldn't find the address. Didnt try to ring. We will get a refund in 5 to 10 days, but at 8pm already and over an hour wait on deliveries how does a refund help with dinner?

Title: Ordered food and it never turned up
Review: Ordered food and it never turned up. Good at taking money terrible at delivering!

Title: Food arrived 23 minutes after leaving‚Ä¶
Review: Food arrived 23 minutes after leaving kitchen so was cold when I took delivery, don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll be using again üò†

Title: The app won‚Äôt recognise my address and‚Ä¶
Review: The app won‚Äôt recognise my address and won‚Äôt let me put in credit card. Gave up and didn‚Äôt have dinner.

Title: Disappointing...
Review: First and only time I've used Deliveroo and what a disappointment.Just ordered a few essentials milk breads and toilet paper ect because they now deliver from our local Morrisons.. Anyway the toilet paper was the main thing ordered for the convenience anyway, this is the one thing they didn't deliver on topping it off with the rider just saying "the only thing missing was the toilet paper" no apologies or replacing for a different brand, just get a email saying we don't even get the money back, we simply get the amount credited to my account that has to be used by January.For a service that's supposed to be for convenience and ease all just seems pointless, considering this is my first experience with Deliveroo I can safely say it's also my last.

Title: An alternative service would wipe them out.
Review: I mistakenly ventured back to Deliveroo in a moment of weakness but NEVER EVER AGAIN. Food was burnt and cold and late, some achievement. Offered a credit, why do I want a credit from a company that cannot meet its obligations. Don't bother trying to get in touch with customer services, non existent.   Absolutely shoddy company who at the moment are more or less operating in a vacuum, the lack of competition means that they think that they can treat clients poorly. WILL GET NO MORE MONEY FROM ME. EVER

Title: Poisonous Snakes
Review: If I could give less of a rating I would do so in a heartbeat. Order was never delivered. Accessed Live Chat and was told that it was delivered Contact Free and has been left beside the doorstep by the driver before he left. (It wasn‚Äôt)I asked them to clarify the SOP for contactless deliveries to which they responded with the following: 1. You‚Äôll receive a notification that the rider is near by, reminding you That your orders is to be delivered contact free. (Did not happen)2. When the rider arrives they will place your order in a thermal bag open at the place you indicated when placing your order. (Did not happen)3. Your rider will step back at least 1 metre and wait nearby for you to collect it. (Did not happen) By their own admission, their policy was not followed but despite this they still refused to accept responsibility. I reminded them that the order they claim to have left by the doorstep contained Alcohol and that as a result of not completing the delivery my age could not have possibly been verified. Advised me I‚Äôd be contacted by someone which never happened. Called a number I found and managed to get a refund after fighting for the best part of an hour.

Title: Disgraceful customer service
Review: We ordered food and the delivery driver didn't turn up. We could see him on the GPS but he wasn't even close. Then it said he failed to deliver the food, without calling or messaging. We called to find out what happened and they said we could have a refund, we thought they would redeliver the food but instead they didn't do anything and we were left hungry and wasted so much time. We called to explain what happened again and was put on hold for over ten minutes then disconnected and we had to call back again! Eventually they said they would give us ¬£2. This doesn't even cover the cost for delivery. Terrible customer service especially considering how expensive food is through Deliveroo. I will not be using them anymore.

Title: DELIVEROO PLUS been paying for something I wasn‚Äôt even aware of!
Review: I have just been looking at my bank statements and noticed that you have been taking money from my account for months on ‚ÄòDELIVEROO PLUS.‚ÄôI have no idea who/when this was supposedly signed up to or how I was tricked into it but I had absolutely zero idea that this was happening. I would never willingly sign up to something like that as I use DELIVEROO about once every two months. I‚Äôm pretty disgusted that there is nowhere to tell me I‚Äôve been signed up to this/ a confirmation email etc and that you have been taking my money for god knows how long- at 11.49 a month, something I would NEVER agree with. I would like my money refunded (as I can see you‚Äôve been taking it since at least August) I will not be using this service again. If my money is not refunded I will be taking this further.

Title: Awful service - would not recommend
Review: We ordered Humpit on my birthday and although the food was excellent deliveroo's service was awful. On the day we ordered there was a shortage of drivers. Although we understand that occasionally there are logistical issues, we think it is extremely bad that they do not make you aware of the issue before you place your order. We ended up going to Humpit and collecting the order ourselves as it was over an hour late. If we had known about the issue prior to booking then we would have gone into the restaurant and placed the order there. On top of this, when we contacted deliveroo they said we were 'too late' (more than 2 days) making a complaint so we did not receive any compensation for this. This nearly ruined my birthday because if we hadn't gone to collect it we would have been late for all other activities. Awful service and will not be using again.

Title: Paid twice
Review: Paid twice, never received order. Con artists.

Title: Had the wrong order sent to me 3 times‚Ä¶
Review: Had the wrong order sent to me 3 times tonight and totally fobbed off by staff on chat.Will not be using this useless service again

Title: Ordered pizza and it was stone cold‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered pizza and it was stone cold when we got it. Contacted customer service and they just said they can‚Äôt do anything about it because it was delivered within the expected time. Yes it was. But I got a message saying that the delivery guy was delivering other orders first and when we got the pizza it was so cold. Very disappointing when you pay delivery fees and service charge. Feels like Deliveroo is just getting worse every month...

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service. Quotes a time and then is consistently one hour late. 3 times ordered, 3 time waiting for an hour past their latest estimated time.

Title: Law breakers
Review: Their moped riders are law-breaking scum. Always illegally using infrastructure designed for cyclists, riding on pavements, parking illegally, using their mobiles while riding. The police don't give two hoots. Problem is, it's going to take a serious accident/death for anyone to start taking it seriously. But hopefully that will at least bring the company down.

Title: I can not be sure but when alcohol is‚Ä¶
Review: I can not be sure but when alcohol is delivered and date of birth taken by non English driver, along with your already registered bank details - fraud on your account happens. Are drivers registered?  They already have your bank details then they acquire your date of birth This needs to stop

Title: YOU SHOULD BE A LOT BETTER BY NOW!
Review: Good heavens! KFC accepted my order at 11:35 and it was delivered at 12:43. In a car!! There must have been so many orders in one go because the estimated delivery time kept going up and up.The food was absolutely stone cold when it finally arrived and there was an item missing (this will be KFCs fault, they NEVER remember to put everything in!). Very disappointing experience.

Title: Thieves
Review: Myself and my partner have been using Deliveroo quite a bit since lockdown, but won‚Äôt use ever again. We ordered a meal for 2 from Nando‚Äôs with extras that weren‚Äôt delivered. We went through the process for a credit refund and was advised it would take 48 hrs to receive. 2 weeks later when we were going to order again I noticed there was no credit so complained and asked where it was and was told they weren‚Äôt going to honour it. So, that‚Äôs basically theft and lies.Both accounts cancelled never to be used again!

Title: Customer service is appalling
Review: Customer service is appalling. Had Deliveroo deliver shopping from Aldi. I have had a few times when items were missing. Usually got a credit but the last time just got an email saying sorry but they can't offer a refund. I didn't get the items, I shouldn't pay! Emailed customer service and no reply. Have cancelled my Deliveroo subscription and won't be using them again.

Title: Pat saved the day... even despite my cold pizza
Review: My food (pizza express) arrived STONE cold and later than expected. I called pizza express who told me to call deliveroo and get a new order sent to them so they could send a HOT pizza....Apparently that‚Äôs not a service deliveroo offer so I‚Äôm unsure as to why the restaurant told me to do that.. probably fobbing me off so they didn‚Äôt have to deal with it. I joined the deliveroo live chat and spoke to someone called Pat who was apologetic and was eager to get the situation sorted. He was polite and professional and understood why I was not happy. I won‚Äôt give you the boring details but the overall outcome was positive and Pat saved Deliveroo what could‚Äôve been another bad review to add to their ‚Äòcollection‚Äô on here. Pat needs a raise! Hope you‚Äôre hearing this @ Will Shu

Title: Diliveroo are basically crap..
Review: Diliveroo are basically crap... They always deliver late, but how late is a lottery. Customer service is unresponsive and frankly more about customer obfuscation and customer frustration. I am going to stop and collect better for me and better for the firm I'm buying from... Will use them to discover  outlets and order directly.

Title: Theives
Review: Ordered a meal for one and a chocolate cookie from KFC when the deliveroo delivered it to me I found out the cookie was missing contacted customer service and told them about an order is missing they did not believed me told me every order gets checked out by the restaurant and then they give the food to deliveroo driver to be delivered to the customer. So my advice is the deliveroo driver must have eaten my cookie straight from the bag. Customers beware some deliveroo driver are theives this company doesn't even deserve a 1 star

Title: My order didn't arrive so called the‚Ä¶
Review: My order didn't arrive so called the shop who said to contact Deliveroo; very unhelpful and said that my order was delivered and the delivery guy had called me, but then said they had the incorrect number on their system!!  I will never use Deliveroo again - rip off!!

Title: Ordered for a high street chain
Review: Ordered for a high street chain, food was delivered 40 mins late as deliveroo wasn't able to find a driver. Restaurant also provided much smaller portion sizes then if you ordered direct.Deliveroo simply not interested to accept blame or resolve the issue. The most irritating thing is this was a treat for us and if we had known they had issues with staff numbers we could have made other plans. It's quite frustrating dealing with companies that don't respect their customers so have deleted the app and will order direct from restaurants or eat less take aways. I guess Deliveroo is making me healthier in that regard! Seriously give your hard earned money elsewhere

Title: Ordered food from KFC the mash and‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered food from KFC the mash and chips were cold which made it inedible and they missed off our dips that we ordered, i emailed deliveroo and have been ignored.

Title: Ordered pizza from pizza express
Review: Ordered pizza from pizza express, it was not sliced and it was stone cold, Im talking as if it had come out of a fridge cold!  complained to Deliveroo below is their response, it seems as long as it arrives before expected time it doesnt matter if its cold!!!We‚Äôre sorry to hear your order wasn't as warm as you expected We're working hard to improve our service ‚Äì for example by reducing the time it takes for your order to reach you, and improving our insulated delivery bags.Unfortunately, we're not able to offer compensation in this case as your order arrived within 10 minutes of when it was expected.

Title: Refund overdue. now delivroo refuse to answer my emails
Review: Always used delivroo over uber eats as when a restaurant mess an order up or any issue at all with my order or delivery they have always 100% off the time fixed it normally by voucher credit.But this time it wasn't an order issue it was a delivroo plus issue which got taken on weeks after the payment date so I emailed too cancel this and was issued a refund by email I have the proof. The refund states it will be in my bank within 10 working days this was the 9th October 2020.we are now on the 27th October and still no refund has gone into my bank. Six emails have been sent since the 10th working day has passed and every single one off these emails has been ignored with no response what so ever. I am now waiting for Wales lockdown too end too launch an legal case against delivroo for not compiling with promises made and also now I've spent far too much effort and time off mine on this case. The money is small but at times like these every penny counts and when I have an email from delivroos escalation team stating a refund has been issued I'm a little confused as too way I have not received this payment

Title: I will never order food from Deilveroo‚Ä¶
Review: I will never order food from Deilveroo again, specially from Bunsen. Burger never arrived and I was charged for it. On the chat they will review my experience in 48 hours. Horrible service!!!!!

Title: i will never order from deliveroo ever‚Ä¶
Review: i will never order from deliveroo ever again , customer service is so bad , they dont want to help , they dont help when something goes wrong , very bad service all in all

Title: Wrong order, terrible support
Review: Gave me a completely wrong shopping order and wouldn't offer a refund or any compensation, don't waste your time with these fools

Title: Customer service is appalling they‚Ä¶
Review: Customer service is appalling they don't handle individual complaints and send generic emails. I would not advise you to use this company. They sent me food that was 'BAD' BLACK chicken wings. Then offered me a ¬£5 voucher to use on their service again !!

Title: As a new user...
Review: I've used deliveroo only a few times, because as a New User they gave me 14 days of free delivery.I will never use Deliveroo again. Very disappointing experience, definitely not worth the time or money.Encountered so many problems, food never showing up and wrong orders, several times in the span of 10 days.

Title: Used Deliveroo for the first time‚Ä¶
Review: Used Deliveroo for the first time tonight. Easy to use app, very quick delivery and hot food. Couldn't have asked for more and will definitely use again.

Title: I have placed an order at 20:23 it is‚Ä¶
Review: I have placed an order at 20:23 it is now 21:55 and no food only a phone call to tell me that the order was canceled.Last time I use them

Title: Drivers from hell
Review: Totally useless. Drivers are almost always totally careless with food, I don't think I've ever received a delivery from them that wasn't at least partially destroyed, and most have turned up totally inedible. When asked about the ruined food, every single driver has been rude, sometimes even outright aggressive, and blamed the restaurant. The most recent one yelled in the face of my 13 year old brother who had opened the door, when he asked about the food being soaked in coffee. Customer service is basically nonexistent, complaints either take weeks for a response or are just ignored completely. If you're lucky enough get a response, their policy seems to be to never refund more than half of the cost of the order, no matter how ineible the food is. Since I want my food to actually be edible when it gets to me, I'll never be using Deliveroo again.

Title: Riders from Hell
Review: Getting fed up with rude delivery riders who clearly don‚Äôt care what condition the food arrives in - no toppings left on pizzas etc - and have no regard for social distancing. Deliveroo then ask you to write a review, but it‚Äôs not the fault of the restaurant/takeaway that the food arrives in a scrambled mess. Take responsibility for your riders. Let us review them, not just the food establishments.

Title: Avoid deliveroo at any cost
Review: Order a food from dar marrakech Stratford Broadway, first they changed two drivers then finally driver driving around the area suddenly got notification food is delivered mile away called customer services was asking for double the refund of order as we are still hungry waiting for food .still waiting for their manager to call me back and issue the refund. Wouldn't use ever again in my life and make my friend circle on social media won't use it again. Biggest scammers in London. Cheap service

Title: DISASTEROUS SERVICE
Review: Placed order..& was delivered somebody else's food !! Contacted deliveroo & asked for refund, she was going to refund me ¬£26 when I had spent ¬£35.90..!!  She agreed I was right...I asked what should I do with the incorrect delivery...I was told to throw it away or give it to homeless... DO NOT USE DELIVEROO...  COWBOY OUTFIT..!!!

Title: Waited over two hours for food   Had to‚Ä¶
Review: Waited over two hours for food   Had to contact the live chat.   Eventually got refund Deliveroo need to rethink there SLA.  With Burger King.  I have got very hungry and disappointed kids.   Will not be using this service again.

Title: Deliveroo are scammers !
Review: The guys going around delivering the food just tap delivered if they can't find your house and you lose your money and your food that your ordered. Deliveroo also don't refund you when this happens. They make up excuses that they can't find the order or they just keep promising you that they will look into it. I have ordered food from deliveroo three times now. All three times I have ordered the guy delivering it says he delivered it and he actually doesn't and I have lost all my money and I will probably never be refunded for this scam. This company is an absolute scam. Please do not use them.

Title: Refused to refund missing items!
Review: I have been a regular user of Deliveroo and rarely have any issues. Last night I had an item missing from my order. I sent a request for this item to be refunded and got the following message:"We‚Äôre sorry that not all of your items were delivered. We can‚Äôt offer you credit right now."How on earth are you allowed to keep money for missing items? I will be researching consumer advice now as it might only be a few quid but if you do this to many people, it all adds up. I know it might be the restaurant that made the mistake but my transaction was with you and you should honour refunds on missing items. You do not expect this from such a well known company.I also use Uber Eats regularly and they promptly refund if there are ever mistakes which is rare but it does happen.For anyone else in the same situation, have a read of the citizens advice webpage about missing items and report to trading standards as the more complaints received, maybe action will finally be taken. This is not about the money but the principal of making good on a transaction by a large company.

Title: I payd for shopping and delivery ¬£31 on‚Ä¶
Review: I payd for shopping and delivery ¬£31 on 10 October and don't have my shopping or manny refund I claimed 3 times and they just promises will get manny back

Title: If I could leave less than one star, I would
Review: If I could leave less than one I would. I ordered nandos through deliveroo and it wasn‚Äôt delivered. No call, no knock on the door. I called up support who told me the driver attempted to call me and as the call didn‚Äôt go through he was allowed to leave with my good and do whatever he wants with it. Despite not receiving my order and not reviewing any form of communication - no phone call or knock on the door, I‚Äôve been told I won‚Äôt be compensated and I‚Äôm not entitled for a refund. I was charged for food I didn‚Äôt receive. Bare in mind when using this dreadful service that they do not believe the customer is always right and do not care about building loyalty with their consumers. I will never use this service again.

Title: No refund for missing item
Review: Like others on this site I did not receive an item I ordered. Support told me I couldn't have a refund as I had had many refunds before. I asked them to send me details of these requests for refunds; before this meal I had had only 2 previous orders! I am still waiting for the details of these many refund requests. Surely this situation is covered by Consumer Legislation; paying but not receiving an item? I intend to find out.

Title: My experience was excellent every‚Ä¶
Review: My experience was excellent every single time I ordered something with this app, from different restaurants.My last delivery was from Thai Restaurant in Portsmouth,  the delivery person was beautiful lady,  I believe Lisa, Luisa...or similar, on her bicycle, in the middle of the heavy rain..on 24.10. 2020. Saturday  evening in Portsmouth,  UK.. ....She was lovely,  kind, on time, apologising not being on time, when she was,... I simply must tip her. I gave her my max for tips that I can afford,  5¬£. At least this is one meal for her. I love this app, and using frequently.

Title: We had an order that wasn't delivered‚Ä¶
Review: We had an order that wasn't delivered which was by frustrating. Deliveroo should have processes in place to ensure that riders are delivering the orders they are supposed to - other companies force the drivers to take photos as evidence.Whilst this wasn't a good experience I did speak to the customer call centre and they were very apologetic and as helpful as they could be. On balance it was a 3 out of 5. Poor from a delivery standpoint but appreciate the help from the call centre.

Title: Terrible customer service went looking‚Ä¶
Review: Terrible customer service went looking for help and ‚ÄòMonica‚Äô ended the chat after me typing for 15 seconds because she ‚Äúhadn‚Äôt heard from me in minutes‚Äù went to reconnect and I was 99th in que so basically busy evening and she couldn‚Äôt be bothered doing her job - lazy, poor standards - avoid.

Title: Order didn‚Äôt arrive when they said it‚Ä¶
Review: Order didn‚Äôt arrive when they said it had.No explanations,nothing.Spoke to them on live chat,hoping to get a refund...

Title: Bad service always spilled my food
Review: Bad service always spilled my food . Or some restaurant can deliver to next door building but not mine. What a weird system. Lousy. I hope ubereat takes over them buy over the company. Cause Deliveroo is so bad.

Title: Order arrived very late and cold
Review: Order arrived very late and cold, the driver took a long time delivering other orders before getting to us. Instead of a refund we got a promise they'll try to improve.

Title: If you want to starve, order via Deliveroo
Review: We ordered food - received nothing. Don‚Äôt bother

Title: Missing order
Review: We ordered food tonight. The delivery left the restaurant but then never arrived. The customer support made a second order for us. This order arrived with only the dessert and the drinks, no main dishes as ordered. Then, when we called again, we have been told we couldn‚Äôt get the order gain because it was too late. We have waited 2 hours in the end for nothing. It is not the first time than we have an issue. First time I was really sick with the food that was no longer good, and the second time there was hard plastic in my order. I‚Äôm aware all those issues are shared between the restaurant and deliveroo. But this is too much. Not sure I‚Äôll use deliveroo again...

Title: Small delivery charge is a joke
Review: Small delivery charge is a joke. Boycott this sh it company.

Title: Delivered late, food cold, really disappointing
Review: Previously I have given Deliveroo 5 stars for delivery of Nando‚Äôs, but the last two food orders I have received have just wiped that out.  I let the first one pass, as businesses do have the odd hiccup, but deliveries need to be sorted out please.Early this evening I ordered Burger King chicken nuggets, fries and onion rings.  The online delivery time was pushed back twice, I watched the driver on tracking, delivering miles away in the opposite direction to my house, so no surprise when the order eventually got to me that every single bit was cold.  I‚Äôve had to heat the whole lot up to make it edible.  Not good, Deliveroo!

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service! Placed an order from KFC in Feltham at 17.28. Driver picked up at 17.46. Meal delivered, cold, at 18.27.The driver called me at 18.20, telling me she was outside a business. Meant nothing to me. She said she used the postcode. Told her where I live, didn't know it. Finally delivered at 18.27.I live less than 1/2 a mile from the restaurant. I mention the name of my road, and the road it's off, in my delivery notes.I called the number to use when you have a problem with your order. Message that agents were busy, maybe I'd like to call back later. Errrr... NO. I didn't have to wait long, far be it for me to suggest they don't want to take the calls.They said they can't request a deliver, I can have a refund or credit on my account. Obviously I want my money back.What's the point of a system that let's us add notes that don't get read? Do you train your drivers to read the notes? What's the use of a delivery company that doesn't take ownership of what is clearly their problem.Take that 1* as a 0*!

Title: Bad customer service
Review: I have a problem every time i use this app wether the food is cold or taking forever to get to me or food being left off that I ordered or even I drink that has been opened and drank from before it has got to me during the mits of covid 19 which is a serious threat and messing with consumer goods. When ypu ask them to do something or cancel or refund the order the simply say na cant sorry and good luck and then end the live chat.

Title: Have been using for over a year now and‚Ä¶
Review: Have been using for over a year now and it‚Äôs safe to say Deliveroo are the worst out of the main 3   Food has always been cold unless it was Chinese as that stays hot for ages the last order everything was cold and a burger was missing and they just refunded the missing burger, with it all being cold if you were at the restaurant they would replace all of the food and/or refund you, I have had enough of them now and doubt I will be using them again and it‚Äôs just more trouble than it‚Äôs worth

Title: Left in front garden... I live in a flat
Review: So having left clear instructions, correct address. Even confirmed when the driver arrived. And was apparently left in my front garden even though I live in a flat. Top floor flat. Front garden. Come on. Obviously no reimbursement of the delivery charge even. Warning you don‚Äôt use this app. Uber eats or just eat all the way

Title: I received stone cold food, and no refund
Review: I received stone cold food, and wasn't able to contact deliveroo as they weren't accepting calls. Emailed adn it took 3 days to get back to me, only to be told that because it was more than 48 hours after the order I wasn't eligible for a refund.

Title: Completely Incompetent!
Review: This is my second review on here. I wouldn't usually do this but I need to stress the incompetency of deliveroo. I did no receive my order yet again because I watched the driver circling an address 2 miles from the address I provided them. This wouldn't have even happened a second time had I known Nandos used deliveroo as their delivery service.

Title: Awful
Review: Clicked re-order via the login feature on the website. Everything seemed very easy however, the delivery was a shambles.Received an update saying it was delivered, it wasn't. Rung Deliveroo who rearranged a new delivery. It arrived but was completely wrong (3x meatball footlongs ordered and they redelivered 1x tuna footlong???).Rung again and Deliveroo cancelled and issued a credit so placed a new order again and all of the tracking information is messed up and the ETA keeps getting pushed back, still waiting on the third attempted delivery 2 hours later.

Title: Soggy Pizza
Review: I ordered three pizzas from VIP via Deliveroo and they all arrived soggy, a total mess. The problem was that the box was lined with silver foil. Hot pizzas make steam and if that steam can't escape it saturates the food. I visited VIP and they blamed Deliveroo - saying that the boxes (which were printed with the VIP branding) actually came from Deliveroo.

Title: Absolutely appalling service with a‚Ä¶
Review: Absolutely appalling service with a cavalier disregard for customer service, their legal obligations under the Consumer Rights Act it even basic food hygiene. Our food was old, cold and inedible. You could see the surface of our food congealing. Deliveroo offered a partial account credit and refused to respond to our complaint, stating they‚Äôd delivered food on time and fulfilled the terms of the order regardless of whether it was safe or appetising to eat - even in the face of photographic evidence. Suffice to say we‚Äôll be escalating our complaint to consumer rights groups and probably the FSA. Steer well clear - even when Deliveroo have clear evidence that a meal was unsafe to eat and unhygienically old and cold, they‚Äôll still try to cling onto your cash. Truly shameful.

Title: Waited and food never arrived but yet‚Ä¶
Review: Waited and food never arrived but yet got a text got sent to me saying the food had arrived. I'll not be using them again. Appalling service!

Title: Also only giving them a 1 cause 0 stars isn't an option
Review: Having ordered from Deliveroo many times before we didn't think much of ordering Wagamas through the service again. We ordered waited and then went downstairs a couple minutes early to collect our food only for a bike that may or may not have been the driver to turn up and ignore us, as well as the polite request to ring the buzzer for the flat that was attached to our delivery. We didn't approach cause social distancing in the middle of a pandemic is always sensible and then he drove off, he call and we answered only for him to hang up immediately, and fail to pick up despite multiple attempts to call him back. We got in contact with Deliveroo only for them to tell us that since we'd answered the call they would not be refunded or offering any sort of compensation for the ¬£40 we were charged, even though we'd explained the situation. Honestly really disgusting behaviour from a service that has delivered to us dozens of times without incident, and a startling display of rudeness on their driver and the company and ill be using Uber eats or just eat in future.

Title: Only giving this 1 star because 0 stars is not an option‚Ä¶
Review: Only giving this 1 star because 0 stars is not an option!! First time customer, used a voucher I had won through SKY VIP to order a meal from GBK Bracknell, paid ¬£20 of my own money as well, nothing has arrived and the company firstly cut me off in live chat saying we‚Äôll look into it, then customer services completely dismissed me, saying we‚Äôre not sending any more food and we‚Äôll get back to you in 48hrs or so!! So they‚Äôve taken my money, I‚Äôve lost the value of the voucher I‚Äôd won and we‚Äôve no meal! Thieves! Absolutely disgusting will never use again and will certainly not recommend to anyone. Give them a wide berth!

Title: Absolutely disgusted
Review: Absolutely disgusted! I ordered a few bits from a local shop for the kids as I can‚Äôt go out due to covid! The rider drove back and forth outside the house for 10 minutes before coming to door. I finally got my order to find ¬£10 worth of food missing out of a ¬£18 order! All on receipt and sent out on delivery but didn‚Äôt get to my house... I‚Äôm fuming never again will I use this service first and last unfortunately. Doesn‚Äôt even deserve the one star. To top it off the app is so good and useful that I can only get a refund to the deliveroo account which I‚Äôm never going to use again!!!!!

Title: Normally not to bad but this time order‚Ä¶
Review: Normally not to bad but this time order was late driver got lost twice  and phoned me twice. had kfc chips were cold there really bad now anyway kfc chips. Wont order again what a pain

Title: Never again food was freezing cold and‚Ä¶
Review: Never again food was freezing cold and no sorry or anything. The Driver is not capable of delivering food from 10 minutes away it took him 35 minutes driving round and round. Foos was from Pho Balham and their response was shocking re order. no thanks never again

Title: Usually top quality food, but not any more and delivery was stressful
Review: Usually great food from Man v Food but this time not so great. The sloppy salad at ¬£3.95 was a tiny box of limp salad with one tiny gherkin. The chicken burger was tough. The delivery driver couldn‚Äôt find us and then drove past me on main road whilst I was talking to him. Too stressful to do that again.

Title: Gone down hill, incompetent riders
Review: Used have great service with friendly riders, however the last month or so it‚Äôs gone down hill badly. Rider take forever to deliver (im guessing either delivering for another service or have more then one Deliveroo account) watch the rider the other day drive 10 mins in the wrong direction to stop for 5 mins turn around and make 25 min drive to my flat and even then failed to read the instructions I left on how to get to my flat and then moaned at me. Tonight I got the notification the rider was near by I open the app and watch him go completely passed my flat, then he was going backwards and forward so tried to call him but no answer left it another 5 mins tried again, no answer. Get notifications from Deliveroo asking me to meet the rider (which I had no idea where he was) I go and find him just standing at the bottom of my stairs in the rain with my food just in the paper bag. Food was stone cold, chip was having a swim in rain water. Food ended up in the bin...Oh and just to add to it, neither of these 2 rider could be bothered to wear a face mask properly.Deliveroo please start check the driver you let deliver for you, at least give them some basic training. Because half of them either don‚Äôt know how to use you app or are to lazy to read basic instructions.

Title: Terrible
Review: Firstly, the driver left hand the food at nandos and outright lied. I quote "nandos only gave me half the food" Nandos head office called an informed us that the store gave the driver all the food who then left with only half, when the store called the driver he refused to return to collect the food

Title: Why does a moped rider have a deliveroo‚Ä¶
Review: Why does a moped rider have a deliveroo coat on together with an obscured "just eat" box AND an obscured licence plate? Awful! Don't you check your staff? Those (zero hours????) mopeds cause noise nuisance and also rid across pavements and communal areas. Needless to say that "just eat" moped rider on scooter LC65CXW had his licence plate obscured, so it could read anything. Also, he had a "just eat" box on the back and wore a "DELIVEROO" coat. This does not instil trust but makes one think that 'just eat' is dodgy. Photos taken.

Title: Appalling
Review: Appalling.  Never again. ¬£23.00 for a KFC that never arrived. Nobody was interested.  Just take the money and run.

Title: Rude and unhelpful staff
Review: Deleted my account yesterday by mistake, wanted to delete UberEats. Went to re-instate it but can't because the phone number is still used for the other account, which I have deactivated.Deactivation means no longer in use.. I should be able to use this phone number.Spoke to customer service and she said it was my fault and to add another number.. I am not going to buy another phone just so I can order!!Had issues with their staff before.. deactivation can now be permanent, I'll order our staff's food from a better alternative delivery service.. one where they actually value their customers.

Title: WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!!
Review: WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!!! My first order with Deliveroo... I ordered ¬£31 worth of food from Nando‚Äôs... the driver couldn‚Äôt speak English when i called... I NEVER received my food at all! I‚Äôve now made roughly 5/6 calls to find out when my money is being refunded, & each & EVERY SINGLE TIME i get told to wait another 48hrs because it‚Äôs still being reviewed... i have now waited A WEEK & still HAVE NOT received my refund!! Absolutely ATROCIOUS!!I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!!

Title: thieving drivers
Review: worst service, with every delivery something is always missing or doesn't get delivered. I am so sick of these thieving drivers. this company needs to be dissolved, cancelled, scratched because they are all thieves.

Title: Driver crashed his car into my garden
Review: Delivery driver thinks its okay to park on my driveway when dropping off to another house, then gets his car stuck in my flower border. Some damaged caused but they failed to knock on the door but they thought they got away with it, all caught on CCTV.

Title: Fraudulent Takeaway Orders
Review: They need to increase their payment security. I have been charged 40 pounds for food I did not order.

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. Delivered the wrong dish. When contacted about it they said there was nothing they could do at the time and to wait 24 hours for a response. I was then credited without option of a refund for the wrong dish which was cheaper than the incorrectly delivered dish. The dish that was delivered contained chicken which we were unable to eat due to religious beliefs. When emailed about their second mistake I got no response back.

Title: Just had a rubbish service
Review: Just had a rubbish service, my delivery did not even turn up. Contacted via app on chat. After long back and forth of confirming it did not arrive and wasn‚Äôt due to me given incorrect details. They admitted it was due to driver issues. All they wanted to do was credit account money of order no care towards fact we were waiting for a delivery that was late and then never turned up and now can‚Äôt reorder due to shop being closed on app for deliveries. Pushed to get refund not credit and when said I was not happy, showed no interest reported they had already given refund and was ending that chat.

Title: Worst customer service ever
Review: Worst customer service ever! Delivery arrived damaged, both myself and the driver both reported it to Deliveroo, soup had spilt all over food as wasn‚Äôt sealed properly, driver took pictures and binned damaged food. Contacted Deliveroo to say I had heard nothing back, first they tried to deny reports and then admitted the reports had been made but still refused to do anything. Avoid this company

Title: Some inside information for everyone‚Ä¶
Review: Some inside information for everyone using the three main food delivery companies.Firstly, ALL the drivers are self employed and work for Uber Eats, Just Eat and Deliveroo.Food is handed to driver upon arrival (App tells restaurants time of arrival) and handed to driver hot. The drivers then take the food without any insulated bags despite restaurant insistence and assurances from delivery company.  The food is delivered with no urgency as the drivers get paid upon collection of food and not when customer receives food. Missing items are taken by drivers and if it‚Äôs a late order the complete order is not delivered! Cold food is not the restaurant fault, yet the delivery companies will not pay them for cold food caused by their drivers. My advise is please please collect wherever possible and stop these big companies ruining small businesses who can‚Äôt afford to not get paid.

Title: Useless customer service!
Review: I've had 3 rubbish experiences in a row. First was a Cyclist took 25 mins to deliver food which was stone cold. Deliveroo offered me ¬£5 of my money back! Second and third delivery had two missing items that I had already paid for and they just state that they'll look into it within 48 hours!? So I'm out of pocket. They never apologise and they never offer to get you the items on a free delivery. Thus business should be shut down.

Title: Resturant gave me wrong order
Review: Resturant gave me wrong order. No way in Deliveroo to assist with issues if orders are in correct. Rating system is rubbish and loads of resturants over rated. Absolute last time I use this crap service.

Title: Drivers are useless
Review: Drivers are useless, they don't read the building name. My orders were delivered to my neighbours multiple times. Defeats the whole point of delivering to the front door.

Title: Absolutely useless service
Review: Absolutely useless service. Ordered a meal on website for a Nando's. Waited an hour. Website kept saying really busy but will deliver a little late. Got a call after an hour to say Deliveroo has messed up and actually failed to process the order correctly and my family and I weren't getting any food now because Nando, like all over eateries, was shut!All you get is a 'promise' to refund your money. Wouldn't surprise me if deliveroo fail to process that either

Title: Incompetent driver - powerless customer service
Review: After 2 hours the driver rang to say that a road is closed so he can't reach my house. There are plenty of alternative routes he can take to reach my house in 5 minutes. He refused to take an alternative route and cancelled my order leaving us with no food for the evening. No bother......customer service offered me ¬£2!!

Title: This would be zero if I had been able‚Ä¶
Review: This would be zero if I had been able to! Wish I had seen these reviews. Disgusting service. Ordered for my friends sons 15th birthday to deliver food for his birthday as has a vulnerable sister at home. An update advised delivered and left on the doorstep which was not the case as we were sitting by the window waiting for it!! Called immediately to only be offered a possible refund in 24 to 48 hours and can't help anymore. Had to then go out and pay again (alot of money for 5 people) to collect the food after waiting for it to be cooked. So 2 hours later we had food!! Incompetent is not the word for the driver Anna in Hove that either stole the food or can't read an address that's round the corner from the delivery depot.

Title: Omg! Disgusting Service!!
Review: Omg!! I wish I had read these awful reviews before we used this company today!! We have waited in all afternoon from 12.30 pm, starving hungry, we gave strict instructions to ring the flat doorbell!! After hours have passed we were told he had been and gone as no response!! What an idiot, we have tried to get through to Taco Bell in Bournemouth who never answer the God Dam phone!! Just ridiculous and incompetence service throughout ..Never Ever Again!! Would we use,  Deliveroo!! Stupid Name, Stupid Staff, .The worst Service!!! Their business deserves to go down tho toilet if this is how they treat their customers!!. we just better get our money back!!

Title: Avoid! Try JustEat or go direct!
Review: Have used them many, many times but last night the driver drove off after the our local Japanese restaurant asked him to wait a couple of minutes, it was then shown as a 'rejected order' when neither us nor the restaurant rejected it. We'd been drinking so had to get a taxi to collect and pay for our (cold!) food. Deliveroo completely unhelpful. Will never use them again and the restaurant are going to look at alternative providers.

Title: Worst company ever, AVOID!!!!
Review: Worst company ever. Please avoid at all costs. There are other services that will deal with your disputes more effectively than Deliveroo. They automatically opted me into their monthly subscription of ¬£11.49 last August 2019. As someone who usually buys things online I barely check my bank statements, I only found out last week when I saw a charge for ¬£11.49. I contacted my bank and got that refunded. However, after raising the matter of what I deemed that somebody was using my details which they acquired from Deliveroo, nobody responded. Fast forward to a few days later, I come to know that they have been taking ¬£11.49 for a total of 14 months without my permission! Trying to get into contact with them was a hassle, constantly getting ignored and then came and said they can only ‚Äòcompensate‚Äô me 6 months‚Äô worth of refunds. I was confused as to what they meant by ‚Äòcompensate‚Äô considering it‚Äôs my money they have been taking my account without my consent to sign up for this so called ‚ÄòDeliveroo plus‚Äô subscription. Of course, I wasn‚Äôt having that. I was still short of ¬£90! I was calling up to their ‚Äòcustomer service‚Äô line for days on end as they kept telling me to email and that is the only way I can resolve the issue. They persisted that they cannot refund me any more money back. They illegally opted me into a monthly subscription without my consent on an account I had not even used since October 2019. I sent multiple letters to them via email asking them for proof that I had subscribed to Deliveroo Plus and a copy of the emails sent to me (of course I never got any as I never subscribed) and they were unable to provide the proof. THEY EVEN CHANGED THEIR TERMS AND CONDITIONS ON THE SAME DAY I RAISED THE DISPUTE FOR THE CHEEK! Totally illegal and dodgy to opt someone into a monthly subscription when they place one order with you guys. The customer service is none-existent. PLEASE AVOID. Not worth the stress they cause. Also, if they get your order wrong or items are missing, they add the amount as credit form to your Deliveroo account and not refund you the money to your card. Conveniently. Please look up all the complaints from hundreds of people on Twitter, Trust pilot if you want further proof. THE WORST!

Title: Absolutely garbage
Review: Absolutely garbage. Delivered me someone else's order. Customer support apologised, agreed to refund and redeliver. Attempted redelivery... Half the items missing. Phoned customer support again, no record of agreeing a refund and unable to help get the missing items. Left without food, Saturday night ruined. Can't leave the house because I'm self isolating so this has been a total disaster for me.AVOID THIS SERVICE AT ALL COSTS!

Title: Wrong order received
Review: First time using Deliveroo and we received someone else's order! Driver rang doorbell but by the time my husband opened the door, he had got back in his car and was driving off so no chance to see if the order was right. Deliveroo said we could keep the order and would redeliver but very late so we ate the wrong one and put the right one in the freezer. Amazingly one dish was one we had ordered but it was hardly the treat we had planned.

Title: I ordered burgers from five guys
Review: I ordered burgers from five guys. At the time when my order been ready they called me because the rider didn‚Äôt show up for collect my order and After that I contacted with deliveroo to sort this out. Nothing happened so after 2 hours I tried again and cancelled my order they offered me ¬£10 credit for the inconvenience. I told him that‚Äôs the minimum and Im very disappointed, and he left the chat...

Title: Absolute joke
Review: Food didn't turn up despite the app saying it has been delivered. Their solution is basically to just put the order through again and start the whole process over. I wanted them to speak to the rider, find out what happened and get them to fix it, not to wait another hour.Had to argue with them to get some sort of credit, put me on hold for a few minutes and come back offering ¬£2.50. What a joke.Restaurants please move your business to Just Eat or Uber Eats.

Title: Awful customer service
Review: Awful customer service. Not helpful and leave you hungry with no solutions when food doesn‚Äôt arrive with no reasons or solutions.

Title: they should give there drivers a‚Ä¶
Review: they should give there drivers a reading test so that they can get the right address

Title: Usual Poor Performance
Review: As usual, the order was very late and very cold. The food was a total mess as if it had been kicked around the park. As usual, Deliveroo offer a hopeless service! BTW, don't ever get fooled into taking their Plus subscription service! I did once - what a mistake.

Title: Warning - payment taken no food delivered
Review: Warning - First time using and the driver never showed up but app on phone said delivered. Called delivery to complain and got nowhere. Be very very careful as there is no comeback once you have paid.

Title: The customer service person is always‚Ä¶
Review: The customer service person is always rude and sarcastic. Why are they still keeping such rude staff to answer customer's calls?

Title: Ordered plenty of times and food has‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered plenty of times and food has been disgusting from various restaurants. This time around the chicken was raw and they refused to give me back my money. Me and my family had food poisoning and they still refused to do anything about it. It even passed on to my 5 month old baby through my breast milk

Title: DONT BOTHER!!! I gave 1 star because there is no less
Review: DONT BOTHER! 1h 20 minutes from ordering still no food.  Advertised delivery time was 15 minutesHOPELESS CUSTOMER  SERVICE they can‚Äôt wait to close the chat they take no responsibility over the conduct and failings of their partners irrespective of taking payment for the order    took over 1 hour of arguing via the chat to get the food refunded  forget about raising a complaint. I am left hungry and angry. Too late to order elsewhere

Title: So disappointed
Review: So disappointed. Not only did I receive the wrong items, but 2 other items were missing. Customer service via live chat genuinely didn't seem to care. Thank you for the 'helpful' 2¬£ credit, but all I really wanted was the right food to get delivered. Won't be using Deliveroo again.

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service. Never received my food. Got to wait to see if they give me a refund. They said the driver delivered my, which is not the case. Im not happy.

Title: Three times in a row they‚Äôve not‚Ä¶
Review: Three times in a row they‚Äôve not delivered after we paid. Not at all easy to resolve either as money paid isn‚Äôt refunded - it‚Äôs on credit.

Title: When Deliveroo first arrived in my‚Ä¶
Review: When Deliveroo first arrived in my town, I was  so pleased. Take away went from being the prospect of a greasy meal to a nice chilled evening at home. Orders would arrive within 30 mins and food was piping hot. Over the last few months, the orders can take anywhere from 45 mins to 3 hours!!! Customer service is rubbish - a ¬£5 credit after they‚Äôve ruined your evening by not delivering when they said they would and not being transparent about why. The delivery charges have also gone up. I‚Äôm now considering reverting back to calling the restaurants directly. Deliveroo has no utility if they can‚Äôt deliver on time, every time and without making you wait more than 30 mins.

Title: Disgraceful customer service
Review: I ordered 2 pizzas, one gluten free for me as I‚Äôm allergic. Another Margherita for my toddler. Took over an hour and a half to arrive and it when it did it was someone else‚Äôs order. Tried to tell the delivery driver, he really didn‚Äôt care and said to call pizza express (no number Or direction was given). Called head office. Very luckily I hadn‚Äôt bitten into either of the pizzas delivered being allergic.......... after 15 minutes on the phone they finally agreed to refund me and redeliver my order (within 3 hours of placing it). But only due to my allergy. If I wasn‚Äôt gluten free apparently this level of service is acceptable and you aren‚Äôt entitled to a refund alongside a complimentary meal as an apology. My experience was disgraceful customer service on practically every level!!!!

Title: Terrible Service
Review: My account has been suspended as I tried to contact them on multiple occasions to find out about an order that ended up taking 2.5 hours to arrive and also enquired about receiving a refund.According to the restaurant, Deliveroo drivers have been mixing up orders and also appear to be stealing food on occasions.I have had terrible experiences with Deliveroo as of late. I have placed close to 50 orders in total with Deliveroo. Even though plenty have been late, I believe this is the first time I actually contacted their support team (usually the UI prompts you to contact the restaurant). It is quite clear that I am not someone who tries to get refunds at any given opportunity.It looks like a lot of people are having bad experiences right now.

Title: Food hadn‚Äôt arrived 2 consecutive weeks
Review: Ordered food. It never came. Now have to wait 24-72 for a refund.

Title: Rubbish.
Review: Rubbish.. Order missing.. Complained and was told nothing they could do.So your just paying for something and do t get it.This was my first order.. Never using them again Where is the customer service and your rights...

Title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
Review: I tried ordering a McDonald's. The app showed the driver on the my street for 10mins. Then it said the order was delivered. I called the restaurant who said the order was collected by the driver. I then tried to contact customer services at Just Eat. An impossible task. There is no way to call the driver and no way to speak to an actual human over the phone. Spoke to two customer services people on the chat function, although needn't have bothered. It doesn't look like I will be getting a refund.

Title: Absolute no customer service or care of‚Ä¶
Review: Absolute no customer service or care of the customer. Missing food from kfc delivery. No contact number, just have to do it online. Go through the process to say whats missing and told nothing can be done at this time... well im missing food and they can't do anything.

Title: We order a pizza from chick pizz in‚Ä¶
Review: We order a pizza from chick pizz in seaton deleval and it was terrible it was all cheese hardly any filling didn‚Äôt taste nice at all usually don‚Äôt have any problem but last night was not hood

Title: Want missing food? Half an order? Then use just eat
Review: Absolutely shocking Last 2 orders, 1st a subway, and the sandwich was missing all we got was a bottle of sprite and a bag of walkers ü§£ .... DRIVER NOWHERE TO BE SEEN, ONE SMALL BAG ON MY FRONT PATH - ON THE MAIN ROAD IN TOWN. 2nd a Greggs, marked as delivered at 6.01pm... hello NO FOOD HERE!!!!!! NO SIGN OF THE DRIVER ANYWHERE. KIDS OUTSIDE FOR TEN MINUTES HAVE SEEN NO ONE. You cant call anyone If you call the restaurant they say call just eatYou call just eat and it tells you to go online You go online, complain, just eat refund the money... as a credit to your account. So no choice but to spend again.. with just eat. SHOCKINGDONT BOTHER
