Title: Just eat customer service is impossible‚Ä¶
Review: Just eat customer service is impossible to contact. we've spent days trying to make contact via phone, web page and email, without success. It's clearly deliberately set up to stop people making contact.

Title: Diabolical
Review: Diabolical. Whenever we place order it's 50/50 as to whether we get it. By the time you get through to 'speak' it's an hour later and they say it's been delivered.it bloody well hasnt

Title: Couldn't care less about the customer‚Ä¶
Review: Couldn't care less about the customer or customer service unfortunately when they make an error with order. No goodwill discount or anything at all which is a shame. I've only seen this kind of thing with Sainsbury's as well, which makes me weary of ordering in the future as it will be the same disinterest and indifference.

Title: I took them to court
Review: I took them to court. I'm disabled and I'd had a fall. Wasn't able to shop so ordered food. 2 hours of waiting and the same excuses as every other review. Food missing, driver lost signal. Oops, sorry...delivered elsewhere. Where? No idea.I took them to the small claims court. They rang me and offered me money back if I would close the case. I told them no.I've heard nothing. I hate them. They are scum.

Title: Worst customer service I've seen
Review: Worst customer service I've seen. Took me far to long to actually speak to someone and when I did they were rude, very unhelpful and couldn't solve anything for me. How this company gets away with it I don't know! Never usally write reviews however this was way to bad to ignore! Use uber eats far far better then this rubbish!

Title: Order never arrived and appalling‚Ä¶
Review: Order never arrived and appalling  customer service experience

Title: My food was sabotaged by the you eat‚Ä¶
Review: My food was sabotaged by the you eat driver.  I've been buying food from Koz. Turkish food for 5 years. Never had issues.  Just eat. Said its s taste issue. Restaurants have different taste. RUBBISH. The driver pulled up by a lake. 10min. The got back on track 10min later.

Title: Bunch of thieving bastuds,closed the‚Ä¶
Review: Bunch of thieving bastuds,closed the justeat account,dont bother making an account ,all the restaurants are kebbab curry kebbab curry kebbab curry kebbab curry it's a fatties paradise

Title: Awful company absolutely awful terrible‚Ä¶
Review: Awful company absolutely awful terrible customer service don‚Äôt know how they get away with it

Title: Dreadful. Driver probably stole the order
Review: We ordered a McDonald‚Äôs from home after my partner and I had both done 11 hour shifts. It didn‚Äôt arrive. It was marked as dispatched. Then the driver conveniently lost signal with the app around 300 yards from our home. An hour later. Nothing. Must‚Äôve been a quick snack for the thieving b*stard. Always had trouble with dodgy drivers and cold deliveries in the past. The customer service is slow and not proactive in solving issues. This is the last time we‚Äôll bother using this service. Uber eats is much better.

Title: Order took over 2 hours and didn‚Äôt‚Ä¶
Review: Order took over 2 hours and didn‚Äôt arrive. I got told the order arrived and they cannot provide a refund.Had to provide my details to several members of staff on the same chat, all kept leaving, rejoining, asking the same information. One advisor couldn‚Äôt explain where the delivery driver was, he disappeared from the map. My food actually arrives when I order with Deliveroo and Ubereats.This business won‚Äôt last. Remember to keep leaving reviews. Goodbye Justeat!

Title: I ordered a pizza from Pizza Hut
Review: I ordered a pizza from Pizza HutI ordered a pizza from Pizza Hut, same pizza I always ordered but this one arrived and was vile !! Had a weird sauce on it, It was so bad I had to throw it away as was un edible.. I spoke to someone in the just eat chat who was so unhelpful and said basically could not help and just leave a review on Pizza Hut.. I am not happy to pay for a pizza I could not eat!! It‚Äôs not like I hadn‚Äôt tried it before and didn‚Äôt like it!! I had many times but this one was not edible!!! It was vile!! I won‚Äôt be using just eat again if they don‚Äôt even help. I‚Äôll use my money else where in future.

Title: McDonalds Just Eat
Review: Ordered McDonalds through Just Eat. Order turned up. The order was completely wrong- clearly wasn‚Äôt our order. We called the delivery person back- they said they couldn‚Äôt help and suggested we call McDonalds and complain to them. We rang them and were told that they couldn‚Äôt help as it isn‚Äôt their policy to talk to us and to take it up with Just Eat. Just Eat then insisted we send photos of what we received. The whole process is a joke and has left us without the food we paid for this evening!

Title: So now if you order and they don‚Äôt have‚Ä¶
Review: So now if you order and they don‚Äôt have what you ordered you get sent nothing or an alternative- you then have to call just eat ( and pay the phone charged) to have the single items refunded, which is pretty much the cost of the call. Really rubbish service now and I hope restaurants step away from it as 48 hours and phone calls, with holding funds is not acceptable. Just eat needs to be more accountable and quicker to respond with free phone services.

Title: ¬£18.80 delivery didn‚Äôt arrive
Review: ¬£18.80 delivery didn‚Äôt arrive, contacted just eat and they said it had been delivered and must have gone to another house, refund in 48hrs, that was months ago. Somebody is scamming here, I guess not everyone will be bothered to pursue a refund , so they pocket cash. From reading other complaints I see I‚Äôm not the only one. If I could rate them zero I would‚Äôve but rating was 1 to 5. 91% bad reviews

Title: Correct food order turned up on the‚Ä¶
Review: Correct food order turned up on the time stated.

Title: Ordered McDonald‚Äôs tonight for my‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered McDonald‚Äôs tonight for my family‚Äôs treat tea order came but was all wrong wasn‚Äôt even our order. My child was starving hungry luckily for me chippy is only at top of street. Contacted just eat and McDonald‚Äôs both useless got to wait 48hours to be contacted not good expecially if people didn‚Äôt have the luxury of having a alternative or even if they had no money to get other food. Better contact me in 48 hours for a refund  poor

Title: Minimum spend and delivery expensive
Review: A meal shouldn't cost 15 because of extortionate delivery prices and minimum spend. We're in a pandemic and many of us can't go out due our health risks. Scam artists. I ended up just calling restaurants and saving anywhere from 2.50 to 6.50 on meals due to delivery prices and minimum spend.

Title: Please read previous reviews and DO NOT‚Ä¶
Review: Please read previous reviews and DO NOT USE ! 3 orders from Mac Donald‚Äôs over the past 6 months all were wrong , customer service useless and no money back .. get in your car and pick up yourself surely this company will go out of business soon with reviews like this, one bad review you could argue it‚Äôs the customer but I‚Äôm struggling to find a good one 91% bad this is a pattern of poor service .

Title: Total scammers will never use them‚Ä¶
Review: Total scammers will never use them again ripped me off for over 20 pounds now my kids don't have easter. Drivers should be vetted.

Title: Absolutely disgraceful company
Review: Absolutely disgraceful company, I have ordered 3 times using them, the first was delivered within 10 minutes which was great, but the second time the driver got lost and only contacted me 20 minutes after the delivery was due, this the third time is the final insult, the delivery time has been put back TWICE, I will never use this joke of a company again

Title: Shop staff get the stick... not justeat‚òπ
Review: Working in retail, I know how this works, please dont ring the shops kicking off because your foods cold... it certainly isn't when it leaves the shops that have made it.....

Title: Over 2 hour wait and poor customer service
Review: I ordered mcdonalds, waited over an hour for a driver to be assigned, then waited 45 minutes for the driver to say its on the way even though the driver never said they were at the restaurant.Then I got a notifcation that my food had arrived before they even knocked on the door.  The food was freezing cold, showing me that he had my food in his car for ages as mcdonalds keep the food warm.In a queue of 500 people! for the customer service, then got put into another one as they said i needed to speak to somebody elseThen they said they would give me a refund, but not to my bank, to my jussteat account. how scummy, making it worse I had to tell them that this wasn't enough for them to give me a pathetic 5 pound added onto my refund.terrible company.

Title: Being a devil for punishment
Review: Being a devil for punishment, I ordered from Mcdonalds again, after having waited over an hour three times before, this time the status bar has been stuck on 'driver assigned' for half an hour, I ordered something else from Deliveroo and it was ordered and delivered within ten minutes, I expect the Mcdonalds order will arrive at some point but it is headed for the bin, last time I order from Just Eat

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. They end conversations when they get board or don't have an answer, I suffered an severe food allergy from and misplaced food order that I am trying to resolve and can't because of the lack of human presence

Title: Order 1219193865
Review: Disgusting! No help from customer service ! I have placed and order and it says the drives is on its way an hour later no order, I have called Mc Donald and the employee said that drivers stormed of the shop without taking the order ! Customer service try to lie and said the order was delivered when it never happen they are telling to wait 48 to 72 hours for stupid investigations !!! No support at all.

Title: This service is disgusting
Review: This service is disgusting. I ordered a delivery that was cold over half hour late and unexceptable. The cheese cake was half like scrambled egg it had obviously took all the heat in the bag. Shame that heat wasn't evident when I got it. Everything was cold. So I phoned the restaurant said I wasn't happy with the quality of the food I paid ¬£20 odd pound for. He came to collect it and was cheeky at the door told me I was wanting his food and money and I won't be receiving a full refund as I wasn't allowing him to amend the order. So I speak to Angel mae on the live chat on just eat and I get a forum explaining that every resteraunt has different ways of making things and unfortunately will not be receiving my money back. No, I was seething by this point. I ordered through just eat as I always do. I order mostly from this shop as its my local and I never complain. I've never asked for a refund in my life with just eat and I have o food to show for my money. So I asked Angel mae for a number to speak to some regaurding this. I get a recording of options I press 2 then 2 again then 3 and I think great I'll be through to someone the now to speak about this terrible order mix up and the recording tells me to query on the problem page and hangs up on my so I'm dialing again cause I'm past hangry now. I press 1 I'm not a business owner but I am sure as the sky is blue having my say. So I get through and I said this is completely unacceptable and rabbit down that phone like I was ready to say heads will roll. I get told I am refunded ¬£18 they aren't refunding me in full cause of charges aren't refundable. There is no talk of a voucher or anything for my wasted time and money. Absolutely disgusting. I ordered my meal at 6ocklock from a 2 minute walk down the road but I'm thinking say safe cause of the virus order in,my food comes over an hour and a half later unedile korma had an oily layer on it was cold, chips were chewy like they had been regeated and the cheesecake like scrambled egg. This was clearly because everything was left in the bag too long. And the way the man spoke to me like don't expect your money back when I am a loyal customer never having a complaint before was despicable. He was acting above me and neither wonder because just eat clearly only care about the business side of things not the customer as I spent most of my night having to fight tooth and nail for my money back and now even still I give my time to try and make people aware not to use this service and go through the distress I have. I haven't even eaten anything since because I was treated like I was stealing my money back. I didn't even get my full money refunded and my bank is not showing the money yet. Please  please do not use just eat they have not got good customer service in place and you could be left with no meal and no refund as the shop will just say contact justeat they have the money and just eat will try to act like your taste buds are the problem. I was 4 hours of my night in total and left with no meal and a word of a refund that I have still to recieve in my bank account. Heads will roll if its not there by the time the full amount I paid goes through. Its still a pending payment to them, so this may correct itself on Monday. But I paid 21 pound odd and only getting 18 odd back so I paid for a night ruined unable to eat from then and we are now at half 2 the next again day. Just unacceptable. I am traumatised by my experience with them.

Title: Order number 1216561478
Review: Order number 1216561478Friday 26th March I ordered from McDonald‚Äôs Ipswich on just eat. ¬£39 order for my daughter‚Äôs birthday as there‚Äôs not much else to do to celebrate in lockdown but order arrived late with only the drinks and wrap of the day. No meals, burgers or chips after calculating the missing items was ¬£31.80 worth of our delivery and four attempts of trying to get refunded today they transferred only ¬£20. Not only was we robbed of our food we was expected to be ¬£11.80 out of pocket still! Obviously the driver has stolen our order. Just eat customer service is shocking to think this is acceptable. I will not be using them again neither will my friends or family. I will also make sure I put this on all social media platforms to make sure it will not happen to other people. I wouldn‚Äôt of even gave this service 1 star.

Title: Ordered food
Review: Ordered food, delivery driver didn't deliver to my address. Marked order as delivered and didn't receive it. Contacted Just Eat support and they apologised many times but did nothing about it. They kept my money and I didn't receive my order.

Title: Wont be using Just Eats again.
Review: This is the second time I've ordered food and it never arrived, in fact the restaurant never received the order.Definitely wont be using just eats again and I'd advise everyone not to......just call the restaurant/takeaway direct.

Review: Second time this week that the drivers have turned off their location and left with the food and Just Eat just says they need to investigate and you need to wait 3 days for a refund. Their drivers are literally stealing peoples foods (they probably don‚Äôt get paid by just eat to be fair) and then just eat is keeping all the money. This company is a scam

Title: Refunded
Review: Refunded my brother the full price. I don't know if it was their fault or the kfc but kfc pointed down to just eat but they paid back ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èThnx

Title: Food never arrived 3 children waiting‚Ä¶
Review: Food never arrived 3 children waiting two hours excitedly for there McDonald‚Äôs.App said delivered nothing arrived Had to cook pasta instead probably more Healthy Won‚Äôt be ordering again

Title: Food never arrived!
Review: Food never arrived, was delivered to the wrong address, I saw this from my window and driver was gone before I could make it to the front door. Tried calling just eat for over 2 hours in a cycle of being kept on hold before the call is eventually just dropped. I am deleting just eat and will stick to uber eats in future. Just eat is an absolute scam. In defence of Lula's restaurant I called them up and they were friendly and understanding, but unfortunately since the issue was with Just eat, there wasn't much that could be done from Lula's end. I will try ordering from them again but through uber eats. Please avoid these scammers, the other reviews say it all.Update. After sending a stongly worded email to just eat. They did end up issuing my refund, so, I will give them that. Still won't be using them again though. If u do decide to use them yoursel, I would suggest you pay at the door, so this won't happen to you too.

Review: Ordered 2 mcflurrys and 2 milkshakes at 18:50. Still sitting on driver is ready to pick up since 19:15. Looks like I won‚Äôt be getting my order.

Title: McDonalds delivery never arrived
Review: McDonalds delivery never arrived. Despite trying 3 times over the course of an hour to get through to a human to get a full refund the app just kept chucking me out. Extremely frustrating. Will NEVER use just eat for a delivery again.

Title: thieves
Review: thieves , i ordered 2 hrs ago and still haven‚Äôt gotten my order . suspiciously the caller couldn‚Äôt hear me when i was talking to her about my order just a moment ago.

Title: We ordered a ¬£20 meal from Burger King‚Ä¶
Review: We ordered a ¬£20 meal from Burger King and waited for 2 hours and it then showed delivered but nothing came. Burger King never answered their phone and just eat has put us on hold for an hour with no one answering. Never use them!!!!!

Title: FOOD NEVER ARRIVED!
Review: FOOD NEVER ARRIVED!We ordered from a local restaurant and we then received a text to say  the food had been delivered - it had NOT! We were advised by the restaurant to call Just Eat so we did and they refunded us. However, when the operator asked us if she could do anything else to help, she very mysteriously 'couldn't hear' us. After waiting on the phone for 10 mins and sorting out the refund, she couldn't help us after that. So she hang up on us.

Title: Thieves and a fraudulent‚Ä¶
Review: Thieves and a fraudulent company.......I am so shocked to read all these reviews AFTER I have been robbed by just eat placed an order at McDonald‚Äôs for 2 burgers never arrived I heard the scooter arrive went outside called out to him asked if this order was mine he said no turned his bike around and sped off down the road however prior to him doing so he was messing around with his phone which I thought was suspect but when he denied it was my order I thought it weren‚Äôt mine, he had on a deliveroo outfit deliveroo saddle for the bike when I Went back inside my house I checked the app to see he marked it delivered without ever getting off his bike not only that I waited 1 hour 22mins for this order only to be robbed anyway I called just eat and was told that it would have to be investigated which will take 48hours now I‚Äôm no fool and can sum up the outcome of that ‚Äòinvestigation‚Äô by all these reviews steer well clear of any company that doesn‚Äôt vet they‚Äôre delivery drivers who in this situation is a thief I‚Äôve basically paid for him to eat how disgusting and disgraceful my money like all of ours is hard earned and now I don‚Äôt eat but he does and nothing at all for me the customer made to feel like I‚Äôm a liar why would I lie for a tenner beware British public be very aware

Title: Great to see how the service and app‚Ä¶
Review: Great to see how the service and app has improved over time.Love the plenty of choice compared to competitors.Also (I know from restaurant owner friends) they don't squeeze businesses as much as competitors.I will keep using the service

Title: If i could rate lower than this I‚Ä¶
Review: If i could rate lower than this I could. Ordered Mcdonald's breakfast as I work early mornings a lot at home asnd had no food in the house. Doesn't turn up. No way to get a refund on the app before being hounded with questions as to whether I'm the account holder. Where was that same energy when you're taking money from my account to feed your starving drivers?

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service, delivery never arrived but marked as delivered. Driver instructed to enter the building never followed what was requested. So the delivery method of contact free the drivers are not completing any identification checks to make sure they are delivered to the correct people. The order was likely stolen as it was delivered to the wrong person.Customer service team disregard anything said by the client and just say 48hours of investigation they may be in contact. There is no telephone number to contact these other teams or anyway they will transfer the call over. Refunds are slow and they cannot replace any order once it has been marked as delivered on the system and you have to wait 48 hours to see a response.

Title: WARNING- PLEASE DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM THEY ARE THIEVES!
Review: PLEASE DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM.... I placed a order ¬£33 pounds worth of food and the food NEVER ARRIVED although the driver marked it as delivered. When I called customer services to report this they had the worst customer service ever, very rude and unapologetic saying they will need to investigate and that it would take 48hours, no one contacts you to let you know what's happening with the investigation unless you call up and even then no one could give me a answer on what happened. In the end they stole my money, no food was actually delivered and all they could say is no further action to be taken. Absolutely the worst company ever and they steal your money and your left with no money, no dinner!! So upset!! I will never order from them again! Avoid JUST EAT!!!

Title: Jokers take your payment before‚Ä¶
Review: Jokers take your payment before confirming the restaurant are going to make your order then if the restaurant rejects your order they give you a message saying rejected try somewhere else whilst not informing you you have been charged and won't receive a refund for 2/14 days meaning they expect you to pay twice for one meal in order for them to pay you back for the meal you don't get when they get round to it quite frankly after an experience like tonight I'd rather cook . I'm fuming that you think this is OK now unless I get my money back sharpish I won't use just eat again !! I didn't have enough in my account to order from somewhere else so now just going hungry nice one Just eat .

Title: Missing parts of my offer and customer‚Ä¶

Title: Victim of the ‚ÄúDriver No-Show‚Äù scam

Title: Food was never delivered
Review: Food was never delivered, customer service agents extremly rude! They said it was deleveried but still active on my account. Still waiting to see if i get a refund not holding my breath at all. Happy to take your money with out giving you the product you have paid for!

Title: Terrible service no covid19 measures‚Ä¶

Title: Even 1* is 2 much
Review: Even 1* is 2 much! This company are thieves! So many people having probs with them! The takeaway was closed, (but was unaware at the time) but still take ur order & money!!!!! Hope this company go bankrupt! They r a disgrace! Customer service is appalling!! I've mesaage them on many occasions & been totally ignored!!!! üò°

Title: Seems the general trend is ordering
Review: Seems the general trend is ordering, not receiving anything and then struggling to receive a refund. JustEat needs to do better.

Title: Bad customer service from just eat
Review: I ordered a McDonald‚Äôs and when I ordered it it was two hours late and they said they was ringing us but I had no calls or anything so they took it back to the shops and as I called customer service just eat They refused to give me a refund and when I spoke to Justeat people over the phone they was really rude

Title: Just read other people‚Äôs reviews and it‚Ä¶
Review: Just read other people‚Äôs reviews and it seems that I‚Äôm not alone. Order never delivered despite what APP says. Spoke  to customer service and the woman said the driver couldn‚Äôt find the address. It‚Äôs a hotel 0.5 miles from the restaurant!!!Asked for an immediate refund so I could order again but was told it has to be investigated first. Said they will answer within 48hrs. Not much good for my hunger then and there eh?Find a more reputable delivery company and save yourself the hassle and hunger.0/10 are you reading this ‚ÄòJust Dont Eat‚Äô ?

Title: EMBARRASSING CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review: I ordered my food from Greggs on the app, I was told by Greggs that they didnt have the items in stock and that they would cancel the order. This was not done, but by the time i spoke to Just Eat, they only gave me a 50% refund. Honestly embarrassing when none of it was my fault.

Title: Fraud and common thieves...Don't order from them
Review: I complained because my pizzas from "Parma Pizza" came cold and the delivery was very rude. Justeat offered me a refund of 20pounds into my account (not the bank account) but when I ordered after 20 days , there wasn't refund on my account and they told me that it was only for 72 hours without writing that to the email. I did an order and they told me that they will investigate it but I have never received an answer:"Daniel I. (Just Eat UK)4 Mar 2021, 21:38 GMTHi Panos,Thanks for getting in touch today regarding order 1193979410, I'm sorry to hear that the food wasn't as you expected.As compensation, we would therefore like to offer you ¬£20 in the form of account credit to use on your next order.For us to proceed, please reply back to this email and we will get the account credit added to your account for you to use on your next order as soon as possible.We look forward to hearing back from you soon.Kind Regards,Daniel G.Customer Operations Advisor"

Title: Did somebody say just üí©üí©üí©
Review: Just eat are the worst online app / store available. Never have I given so much information to an organisation to just be told 48hours later. (take it up with the restaurant) 3hour delay because the app was sending faulty information. Cheaper and faster to go direct to restaurant

Title: JUST THIEF
Review: I am beyond furious. They are utterly useless when it comes to refunding money, and their customer support is just inept in every way imaginable. They are quick to take your money but will do everything to avoid contacting them and getting the money back. I have been waiting for the supposed call from a manager / supervisor for a week now and have requested it almost every day. NOBODY HAS EVER CALLED ME, NO VOICE MAIL EITHER. The customer support will lie in writing (I have the transcripts) and tell you that you will receive a follow up email and case reference nr and chat reference nr. IT NEVER HAPPENS, because they can't be asked to deal with this and rather be lazy and just keep messaging you with their bloody automated responses. FYIThey said the driver was on the way, then lost signal, then marked delivered but nobody ever came round or any food.

Title: Customer Service call you a liar when you've not received the correct order
Review: Just Eat used to offer great service but over the past couple of months their customer service has become shocking! They put nothing in place for restaurants to be honest about delays BEFORE you order and pay. And nothing to help rectify a situation if the wrong item has been received, or something is missed off the order and it's impossible to contact the restaurant. Yesterday I ordered sandwiches for lunch and received two wrong items with what I'd actually ordered missing. I applied for a refund through my account but a Just Eat supervisor called Martin sent me an extremely smarmy email calling me a liar, despite the fact I've emailed photographic evidence of the wrong order. I'm trying my best to support local businesses during lockdown but with this attitude I'll rethink where I'm spending my money.

Title: Order cancelled after 50 minutes
Review: Had my order cancelled after waiting 50 minutes. Tried calling but pointless as they don't answer. No reason given for cancellation either.

Title: 2 hour waiting time should be specified‚Ä¶
Review: 2 hour waiting time should be specified before you place a ¬£50 order for food. I had to call the restaurant to arrange a collection who advised me they wouldn't refund me the delivery fee and I must go back to just eat. Just eat are refusing to refund me the delivery fee. Although no delivery was ever carried out. So not only did they cost me money in having to go and collect they have stollen money from me which is not justifiably theirs to keep. I will be pursuing this matter further. It isn't about the money, it is the principle.

Title: After waiting an hour for my order‚Ä¶
Review: After waiting an hour for my order which was shown as a minute away, the order wasn't delivered but marked as delivered, and this isn't the first time. There is no option for me to contact the restaurant (mcd) or the driver. Just eat only allow you to email through the app or if there's another way I cannot find it. After sending email I was informed that a customer service representative will call me back in the next 72 hours. This shows how just eat regards it's users, with total disregard and extremely low level customer service. I will avoid using JUST EAT in the future and advise you do the same because it's a lottery with the delivery and you could be left hungry and out of pocket with no recourse as mentioned in the other reviews.

Title: Shocking service!
Review: Shocking service!! After trying numerous times to direct the driver he kept arguing with me about the location of my own house, even sent him my location via maps! He gave up and ticked it as delivered! Drivers either need local knowledge or some very basic language skills!

Title: The company that offered to deliver ‚Ä¶
Review: The company that offered to deliver  your food but your food never arrives, but hold on! They still take your money!! Then they tell you 3-7 days before you get your money back! Meanwhile, you‚Äôre left hungry with money taken for services NOT rendered! Like how does that even WORK??? Inhuman at this time where most of us have lost our jobs so money is rationed tightly! Only for this blasted company to come along and deprive you of the very money that is lacking! Utter disgrace of a company, utter disgrace! Ordered my food at 9:46pm, by 01:22 AM they were still telling me a driver hadn‚Äôt been assigned like what the actual fook?!!!! I AM LEFT HUNGRY WITH NO MONEY TO EVEN ORDER FROM ANYWHERE ELSE!!!!!!!!!

Title: Just eat just the worst!!  Lately just eat is on the bottom on‚Ä¶
Review: Lately just eat is on the bottom on delivery Ordered with them last month the driver came with half of my order.... tonight order with just eat, the app send me a message that the delivery on its way... 1 hours pass no delivery and no call from driver, contacter costumer service, driver marked my order as delivered but I never got my delivery and no body can help with the issue for 3 days until investigation ( its didn't took them 3 days to take my money ) worst company and customer service ever #boycottjusteat

Title: Drivers either get lost or don't show up
Review: Lord have mercy. The first two times I ordered got delivered no problems. Ordered last week, driver went to wrong address, called, explained that our address shows up perfectly fine, he said he was on his way, never showed up. I did manage to fet customer service to refund.Now tonight thought one more chance. Driver went to completely different address, he called and gave thorough instructions and it appears he is on his way with our very cold dinner.I don't know why drivers struggle, google maps has our address, its all correct when placing an order.Dont bother with Justeats, too much hassle

Title: Crap delivery driver
Review: Got my order mostly fine but didn‚Äôt get my sweet and sour sauces at all. Problem is the delivery driver - rudely speaking on the phone and held only one hand on the bag. Didn‚Äôt say anything to me at all and once I got the food out he just walked away. Absolutely crap delivery driver

Title: I wish I could give no stars
Review: I wish I could give no stars! Placed an order, it came wrong. The restaurant was more than happy to change it and send me another and couldn't be more helpful. Justeat told me it would be put to an investigation team and lied to me on the phone twice! Now I have to phone them back for my refund, keep being told I'll be put to a specialist team.. Been on hold for over an hour.. they are a JOKE!

Title: Food Never Arrived
Review: What an absolute joke, the food never arrived, the driver delivered my food elsewhere! And justeat won‚Äôt issue me a refund, I have NEVER experienced such awful experience in my life, I would advise people NOT to use justeat platform. Uber is slightly pricier then Justeat but much better customer services where you can actually speak to a human and not an automated bot.

Title: Worst customer service ever
Review: Worst customer service ever. The reps have no authority to do anything or make decisions. Just eat DON'T even deserve minus a 10,0000 stars, The restaurant messed up the order,but Just Eat used a 3rd party driver. They missed off the the food I ordered for the kids.I was working from Home and had contracts to close,so I didn't have time to cook. Just Eat said they would refund me for the missing items however I stated that for me to then order MORE food for the children would cause me to be out of pocket Because I would have to spend a  minimum amount PLUS more for delivery just to get food for the children.  JUST  EAT said they would not send the driver back even though the restaurant said they would send out the missing items.FURTHER MORE I had to speak to 3 so called customer service reps who promised a manger would contact me 4 days later no call has been received.

Title: Unfortunately the driver didn‚Äôt deliver‚Ä¶
Review: Unfortunately the driver didn‚Äôt deliver food but marked it delivered. They lost the signal of the driver. This is stupid because since the app says it‚Äôs been delivered, CS can‚Äôt do anything about it. I don‚Äôt know what happened but it‚Äôs not good. I should have looked at the reviews from the restaurant before I made my purchase :/

Title: Do not use,use uber eat,ordered‚Ä¶
Review: Do not use,use uber eat,ordered mcdonalds twice through these,1 order all wrong amd stuff missing,second order didnt arrive but still took payment ,customer service don't care ,useless,15 pound and no food or refund

Title: Driver & his companion maliciously ripped KFC bag & contaminated food!!!
Review: Awful delivery experience and secured KFC bag was maliciously ripped in three places exposing food. There were many failures with this delivery service. 1. The driver was reluctant to drive to my flat door after I let him in through the security barriers. 2. After being rude to me on the phone whilst at barrier,  he and a female pulled up outside my flat. 3. He did not maintain any social distances and did not have a food bag which drivers usually leave on the floor so the customer can retrieve once they step away. 4. Driver just came over and handed a KFC bag and can of fizzy drink which I was absolutely shocked by. Later I had walked away and entered the flat entrance I discovered that the bag had been ripped in three places and that the food was exposed. The KFC security strip had remained untouched. I have made a complaint to Just Eat and made KFC aware of this issue. However due to being in a pandemic situation I will be contacting  the police and getting advice on steps so this driver cannot do this to other people. This is a highly unusual issue but so is Covid 19 and maliciously exposing food and contaminating it is a crime. Fortunately due to camera's being on the premises and at the barrier this delivery driver and his companion will not be hard to find!

Title: Do not use this delivery service!
Review: Do not use this delivery service. Abysmal. We've had too many issues with them and after giving it one more go, decided we're done with Just Eat. With the latest order, our food never arrived even though it said food was delivered. We're going through a lot of stress to try to get our refund. Customer service just gives canned answers and promises an investigation with nothing being done. Don't expect to get your money back if Just Eat screws up. Drivers don't confirm they're dropping your food off at the right place with a name and address check, so thieving people can get a free meal off you. You're better off ordering from the restaurant directly or just making something at home. Listen to the negative reviews, they're all spot on.

Title: I've ordered many times before and the‚Ä¶
Review: I've ordered many times before and the majority of the time I'm satisfied with my orders and with the customer service received on orders that have gone wrong. Today I was horrified with the customer service. I ordered from here and had to contact just eat 4 times. My order was 2 hours late and the status said delivered which it was not. I was told by customer service to cancel the order then I enquired as to why would I do this? Then the response was, "Then, kindly wait." This was after the third time I contacted them. I asked for confirmation that my food was going to be delivered but no awnser or attempt to look into the issue despite me asking them to contact the restaurant to make sure they had my order. I asked to speak to a manager and how to log a complaint and no awnsers were given. The food arrived over 2 hours late missing items. I have to wait 48 hours for them to address this and no doubt the refund is going to be credit on my account.

Title: Awful service and disgusting management
Review: Awful service! My delivery didn't even arrive, instead they kept us waiting for 2 hours, stating that the order was on the way. Then finally told us the order has been cancelled. The service is awful and Just Eat should be bought out by one of their competitors as the service and management is disgusting. This is not the 1st time this has happened to me but it will definitely be the last!People should just stay away from Just Eat and use Uber Eats or Deliveroo.

Title: Absolutely shocking customer service
Review: Absolutely shocking customer service, after receiving what I assume is somebody else's order....  the team that deal with refunds can not be contacted through online chat or phone, they offered me ¬£20 credit for a ¬£30 missing order.... shocking so what is the point of them? had to open PayPal dispute to get my money back

Title: Ordered from Pret a Manger and the‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered from Pret a Manger and the order was collected but never arrived. Even the Pret person said in future not to use Just Eat...***Update: I have amended the rating for a prompt reimbursement...

Title: Wish I had read the reviews before I‚Ä¶
Review: Wish I had read the reviews before I ordered !! 1hr 40mins waiting, when we called the restaurant (Prezzo) no driver had collected our order , despite the app saying ‚Äòon its way‚Äô !! Prezzo kindly remade our order and we collected but won‚Äôt be using JustEat again !!

Title: -0 stars if I could rate so
Review: Got food poisoning from a restaurant called London Chef and Co in Sidcup, this was the only food I ate that day and the following morning i got aggressive vomiting and had an ambulance team coming over. The restaurant supervisor was rude and refused to give a refund. Just Eat have been completely useless passing me to an organisation called FSA, claiming that only they can help with refunds. FSA emailed me back a few times to tell me that they don‚Äôt handle refunds and that I should contact Just eat and when i told this to just eat again they play dumb and tell me to contact FSA.. horrible service, I had to issue a dispute with my bank for scam. Avoid at all costs!

Title: No delivery! and customer service is shambles.
Review: Ordered from KFC and app said delivered but no sign of delivery. I have CCTV to prove it. Just-Eat have a rubbish 48 hour investigation period (today is day 5 and no sign). I want all the money in my bank account, not as store credit as I don't intend to use them again. And the store credit minuses the delivery charge which is unfair for a non-delivey.

Title: Just Eat customer service is abysmal‚Ä¶
Review: Just Eat customer service is abysmal and non-existant.  On the rare occasions I have had issues, Just Eat are not interested. They always refer you back to the restaurant who were the reason you contacted Just Eat because the restaurant refused to help. They are totally on the side of the restaurant regardless of the complaint and their main priority is to take your money. Once that transaction has taken place, they are no longer interested in you as a customer. I have now de-activated my account and requested them to delete all my details from their systems. I want no further communications with them. My advice is to order directly with the good restaurants and let them have the profits.

Title: 1 star is far too good for this‚Ä¶
Review: 1 star is far too good for this service, ordered kfc turned up with half the order missing and what did turn up was cold. Its been 2 weeks and im still waiting for this to be resolved.

Title: Never Delivered. Delayed Refund.
Review: It flicked through - picked up-driver on way-delivered within seconds. Physically impossible. The delivered was a time in the future on the website. Then got a text saying picked up after this. Then an email with a different time saying on way.No food arrived. Contacted customer services said they arnt the team to do refunds they say, as it says delivered.No food. No money. AVOID.Update: Refunded next day (had tried to claim back through PayPal) - I still avoid.

Title: Unfair and hard to reach
Review: When I tried to phone to sort my order that was sent through to the wrong store and couldn‚Äôt get to talk to someone. Then when I finally got to speak to someone they told me they could only give me 50% of my money back.

Title: Kept sending out the wrong address to drivers
Review: Terrible. Kept sending out my address wrong to drivers. To various random addresses. Massive data security issue if you ask me. The people on the chat box were not helpful at all. It happened on 10 orders. I have had enough of using them.

Title: I would give them 0 if I could
Review: I would give them 0 if I could, for the third time no order arrived, even though it showed delivery, called CS for help, they admitted that the driver took it back and never bothered to deliver! Still owed ¬£30 back, so going through resolver and PayPal to get all my money back. Pure theft by this shower, use Uber eats in future !!

Title: Disgusting service
Review: Disgusting service, will never use again, order directly from takeaway or restaurant much cheaper less hassle

Title: Food never turned up but marked as‚Ä¶
Review: Food never turned up but marked as delivered seems to be a common thing at Just Eat! Same happened to me yesterday. No customer service - the hotline is a joke and the chat service is not able to call drivers or restaurants! 48h investigation instead of giving the driver a call what makes the whole process 2 minutes. Rediculous! Still haven‚Äòt got my refund! Never again.

Title: Do not order from this company the‚Ä¶
Review: Do not order from this company the service is shocking! I ordered food that never turned up. The driver had marked it as delivered so will not issue a refund. Needing to wait for investigation. Only ordered from Just Eat as they have the free delivery option for Mcdonalds. I've now had to spend extra ordering from Uber Eats. Atleast I know that my food will turn up.

Title: Food said delivered but never arrived‚Ä¶
Review: Food said delivered but never arrived at my address. Now I have to wait to get my money back yet here we are with no food and my money taken! FIND BETTER DRIVERS, your service is an absolute disgrace. Won't be using just eat again!

Title: Just Eat cancelled my order over an‚Ä¶
Review: Just Eat cancelled my order over an hour after accepting my order. Ended up going over to the restaurant myself to collect the food. Just Eat refuse to return the money, they charge 20% mark up + delivery. I just want the difference refunded back. Never use these people, terrible customer service.

Title: AWFUL
Review: Food never arrived! This happened twice! Up to 7 days for ‚Äòinvestigation‚Äô total rip off awful customer service they shouldn‚Äôt be allowed to keep going

Title: Ordered McDonald's and for 1.5hours‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered McDonald's and for 1.5hours they couldn't assign driver.  Phoned McDonald's to be told they have 6 orders waiting for Just Eat and they are now on bicycles only! Tried cancelling order which I thought I did and got 2 email cancellations.  The app messed up which then I assumed order did get cancelled.  Half hour later guy on bicycle turns up with food.  Chat conversation with their so called customer services was no win.  Anyway I would not recommend using this app it is rubbish and service even worse.  Only went to just eat as they are cheaper than Uber.  At least I know Uber deliver on time and you can track driver.

Title: Food never arrived
Review: Food never arrived. I will never use again, do not use, use deliveroo or uber instead.

Title: Ordered macdonalds order number‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered macdonalds order number 72069148 As a back to school treat for the kids. App said would arrive between 16.10 & 16.39. Then the driver ‚Äúlost signal‚Äù but 17.00hrs I contacted the online help only to be told the order was marked as delivered! & that I now have to wait 48!hours for investigation before they can refund !! Absolutely appalling has put me off ever using them again

Title: Really annoyed.
Review: Really annoyed.I've paid ¬£2.49 for chippy to be delivered. The place is about five minutes up the road. The driver called and explained where he was, which I could see from the GPS. In all my food was about 15-20 minutes late. I could have walked to get it myself.Spoke to JE who only refunded me the cost of the food. Not the drinks or delivery.I asked for it to go to my bank not as credit on JE as I don't plan on using their service again after this.I have an email saying its going as credit despite the customer service assistant stating it would be in my bank. Let's see what happens.Totally let down and awful service tonight.

Title: The service is less than 0 stars not‚Ä¶
Review: The service it's less than 0 stars not responsible at all and of course if they make  your order wrong don't expect for good customer service or refund you just waste time to try it.

Title: Didn't even get my order as they‚Ä¶
Review: Didn't even get my order as they delivered to the wrong house. There's no checks or confirmation from who they're delivering it to so it makes it that much easier for it to be stolen. The investigation team emailed and said I wouldn't even be getting a refund because it was marked as "delivered" which they had no proof of either and had no way of contacting the driver to question him or offer a redelivery. Flawed service and utter scam.

Title: ORDER DIRECT TO RESTAURANTS
Review: Restaurant took 2 hours to send our order so was nearly 3 hours late, restaurant was helpful and offered full refund but said it had to be by Just Eat as was ordered on the app. Just Eat are refusing to honour this, have been backwards and forwards since January still no refund, offered credit for (missing items??) we didn't have any and will also not be using their app so credit is useless. Order direct, the restaurants are much more helpful than the Just East Customer Service team.

Title: Shocking company
Review: Shocking company! The delivery drivers need to get their act together.  TWICE now they have delivered my food to the wrong house! Absolute joke! Will never be using just eat again.

Title: Shocking service
Review: Shocking service, ordered a mc Donalds and after nearly 2 hours of waiting nothing came, went on live chat only to be told I have to wait 48 hours for a refund, no replacement order etc, used a 20% off code and they wouldn't even re issue so I could re order. Shocking company

Title: Two hours late, no apology
Review: Order placed at 18:03. Status updated to 'driver at restaurant' at 18:15. Food arrived at 19:57.Tried online help who told me to wait longer, then advised to call the restaurant. I called and couldn't get through. Food arrived 2 hours late, no apology from driver.

Title: No Delivery - 60GBP lost!!!!
Review: Delivery took 6 hours with no explanations from KFC Grays - was told by Just Eat to leave a bad review for the restaurant the day afterOrdered from Greggs  a few days later and the driver marked it as delivered when he never turned up- RING video camera had a clear view of my street - still have 60GBP not refunded after 24 hours!! Just Eat app said signal lost with courier then delivered!!no contact, no email, no food, no refundhad a call from a number that never called back after the line cutwhat a service!! never again!!Restaurant - Greggs in Grays (didnt have to) but phoned up JUST EAT to help but had no result with all their effort- THANK _YOU Greggs - wonderful TeamJUST EAT uses its Investigations Team as an  alibi

Title: No food. No help.
Review: No food arrived after two hours later. Passed from person to person on a ‚Äòchat‚Äô. No chance to speak to a real person. More personal details required to ‚Äòchat‚Äô than my bank needs to access my accounts. No resolution. Going to bed hungry. Thanks Just eat. ‚ÄòDid somebody say Don‚Äôt eat!‚Äô

Title: Waste of time!
Review: Waste of time!Every time we order!The food either late or cold!We will make a point of ordering direct or collecting in person from now on!

Title: Driver assigned...
Review: Driver assigned.... but he never collected. Ordered form Greggs Oldham. The store I have no issues with it is not there fault the driver never collected the order. Justeat however only agreeing to issue a 50% refund because the store may have cooked the food. It was all cold food which is prepacked and already made up and the store had closed. A bunch of cowboys never again avoid like the plague

Title: Thieving driver!!
Review: You'd think it would be simple. Order some food and it gets delivered to you. Well not with Just Eat. The drivers steal some of your order!! I spoke to the manager of the take away and he confirmed the food was all packed. So where had it gone?? Doesn't take me to be a rocket scientist to work that out. It was also very odd that what was taken, the accompanying item disappeared too!! To make sure nothing gets taken out the bag the restaurant/takeaway should put seals on the bags. (A sticker would do). That way if the seal is broken you don't accept the food as it's been opened. A complaint has been put in but it's being ignored. Just wait until I get the police involved as it's theft.

Title: So many times we have ordered to get‚Ä¶
Review: So many times we have ordered to get cold food late food food that hasnt turned up to be ALSO charged for taht non existant food. These scumbags are just that, AVOID!!

Title: Impossible to contact the company
Review: Impossible to contact the company. Ordered ¬£150 worth of gift cards but not all of them were received by recipients. I have been trying to get hold of someone at Just Eat to find out why they didn't email it and I can't get through to anyone. The customer service line takes you through the options - and it doesn't matter which option you pick, you always end up with being told to go to the website and the automated line cuts you off. The web chat option never works. They have taken the money and are offering no way of contacting them to resolve the issue.

Title: NEVER AGAIN
Review: NEVER AGAIN ! Around 3 weeks ago I placed my order and they made me wait over 3h when I decided to give up and cook for myself while that I did call the restaurant every 30m and they always come with excuses, on the next working day when I left home to go work I found the food at my door steep, i went straight to just eat chat to see if I could get my money back since the food was delivered in the middle of the night without any notice and the guy was so dumb to understand what I wanted.Today I made another order from another restaurant and here we go again no food, driver hand accident and etc etc Better pay more for delivered and be protected on Uber eats

Title: Incompetent or dishonest - disgraceful business
Review: No food, no credit/refund or offer to re-order.  They say the food was delivered and you have no leg to stand on!  You go through to a 'chat' to raise the issue and Just Eat's records are non-existent.  They don't even know which one of their deliverers was assigned your order.  They say it will take 48 hours to investigate but I've been waiting 6 days to hear from them! So my only night off from cooking for the kids was totally trashed.

Title: JUST EAT ARE THIEVES
Review: I placed an order and never received it, after an hour of looking at the screen saying assigning a driver, way over the expected delivery time, the screen went blank, then I received an email saying delivered. You phone to complain but no answer, had to call in the morning to be told it would be investigated, after 2 days I received an email to say the food had been delivered! And they proceed to take ¬£26 out of my account, you get no help from anyone over the phone and apparently there is nothing you can do about it, if there was ever a company that deserved to go out of business it‚Äôs just eat, absolute disgrace of a so called company, they stole money from me and you cannot do anything about it.

Title: Horrible
Review: Horrible! Worst experience ever! They are never available to talk to whenever you have a problem. Placed an order that made me wait for ONE HOUR AND FIFTY MINUTES and that I never got being charged for. Time is gone same as my money and dinner for me and my family . Sending an email only to be replied back that they will look into my request in a couple of days?!?!?! My family needs dinner NOW not in a couple of days and  I need my money back into my account not a stupid voucher or credit!

Title: Once again robbed by this absolute joke‚Ä¶
Review: Once again robbed by this absolute joke of a company , so if it ain't cold food, half the order turning up! its now fake deliveries ,take your money but leave no food but say they have..I really don't understand how a company get away with such bs. Funny how they won't tell u who the driver is who supposedly deliverd it

Title: Only half the order arrived
Review: Only half the order arrived - rang Mcdonalds only to be told to go through the chat app on just eat.  Small refund given - although by the time I had sorted this out my food was cold.  Will not be using just eat again.

Title: Just Eat charged my son
Review: Just Eat charged my son, who is disabled, twice. He uses Just Eat a lot. I am trying to persuade him to stop using them. I have been trying on his behalf to get the refund since the 18/02/2021. I went to Resolver and have an open case file. JE just keep giving apologies and twice said they will refund.  I do t think they ever will. They do not care one iota. I cannot reach anyone on phone and emails r impossible. I am now going to write to the CEO. It‚Äôs so frustrating that nobody wants to help I do not think they are even reading the messages I keep sending.  Terrible company.   üò©. Susan.

Title: Avoiding Refunds and Acting Illegally
Review: I ordered food and waited over 3 hours chasing the restaurant to deliver my order before they tried to say a final time they needed 'another hour'. I told them to cancel the order and refund me. Contacted JustEat the same night and the next day to complain, was told I had to wait 72 hours for someone to contact me. I have tried this a further 3 times for a refund and today was told I hadn't complained in time, which is false - I complained on the night the next day. They have everything transcribed, and all of the evidence is there to support my claim. They have told me I need to wait a further 72 hours for a supervisor to call about a refund. This is in breach of my legal rights and I will be pursuing this further out of principle, especially on behalf of those who choose to spend hard earned money on their services during difficult times.

Title: A total shambles
Review: A total shambles. Said they‚Äôd delivered my food and hadn‚Äôt. Then half an hour later it turned up. In between it was impossible to get any information and since not possible to talk to anyone, the customer helpline, isn‚Äôt one, and just tells you to go to the app... having used deliveroo for two years, just eat are a disgrace, unreliable and best avoided... beware...

Title: I think it should be no star
Review: I think it should be no star, I ordered Mcdonald and the driver called to say he was downstairs. I told him I'm on a wheelchair, that I will let him in, and he disappeared with my food. I called Mcdonald they told me to call just eat. I told just eat, I just got discharged from the hospital and I'm hungry and I need that food reordered, and they said I should give them 48 hours to investigate before refunding me. Just trash üóë

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. Order went missing and instead of a replacement order or a refund we got told that they would 'investigate' with a conclusion in 48 hours. This leaves me both out of pocket and hungry. F*** Just Eat.

Title: Orderd mcds got a KFC who do this‚Ä¶
Review: Orderd mcds got a KFC who do this people employ all bag all ripped couldn't eat any of it

Title: The worst service I ever had..
Review: The worst service I ever had... I ordered food around 6:30pm at around 7:10 recieved a call from driver who said "how much is this, what's the number" I waited further 10minutes when no one turned up I went to check website tracking saw the food was delivered. I was shocked bo food was delivered. I messaged online asking for whereabout food they said wait 48hours for investigation. Is this a joke? Or fraud? I had to order same food again using uber eat. Terrible system terrible customer service

Title: Absolutely Awful company, Never received my refund
Review: Absolutely Awful company! They‚Äôre customer service is atrocious! Made an order on the 16th January, missing half my order, called just eat for the women to just refund me & when I asked about if she had re-ordered my food she said yes. I called back an hour later to then find out she hadn‚Äôt ordered it, then had to drive to the nearest McDonalds drive thru just to get the rest of my food. Finally ate my food nearly 2 hours after the food originally arrived. Still haven‚Äôt received my refund, I‚Äôve questioned them through customer service multiple times about it, but they just keep saying it‚Äôs been authorised & I need to check with my bank, which I have done multiple times. I‚Äôve deactivated my account & never using them again.

Title: Order a foot long veggie sub and‚Ä¶
Review: Order a foot long veggie sub and toasted bread for ¬£8. This is while I was self isolating with COVID-19. I was told a resolution would take anywhere up to 48 hours. Very poor customer service over the phone. What a complete joke.

Title: I would give none stars if I could
Review: I would give none stars if I could. Just eat with McDonald's a waste of space!! Ordered for my boys didn't receive the food but was shown as delivered so phoned up to say we didn't get it so now in 72 hour investigation so basically we are liars... I personally think that mcdonalds are taking on too much and can't keep up with the demand of deliveries.. Couldn't even send out another meal absolute Joke!! Wont be using this service again.

Title: Deliveries are always late and little‚Ä¶
Review: Deliveries are always late and little apology from Just Eat. Most of the time they blame he restaurant but often when you contact the restaurant directly, they say Just away have not sent a driver to make the delivery. They charge ¬£3 for delivery and then don‚Äôt deliver. Very poor service

Title: I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever had a just eat‚Ä¶
Review: I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever had a just eat order arrive on time.  They quote 1.5 hrs and often food arrives a good hour late with repeated phone calls to the restaurant.  I don‚Äôt know how Just Eat works but ordering direct from the restaurant seems to work much better.  Just Eat service is to effectively delay your food, nothing else.

Title: Trash company
Review: Trash company. Disgusting

Title: Very unhelpful when something goes‚Ä¶
Review: Very unhelpful when something goes wrong.

Title: If I could give no stars I would
Review: If I could give no stars I would. Absolutely disgusted with the service, driver helped themselves to food, delivered half a meal in an open bag!!!Not even given a full refund. Customer service is ridiculous no care for customers at all. AVOID!!!

Title: Just eat ruined my life
Review: Ordered McDonald's 2 hours ago, still not received, spoke to customer service who have said that the food will not be coming now and they will pass it over to see if we can be refunded ü§£ now it's too late to get a McDonald's breakfast. Thanks just eat for ruining my life üòÇ

Title: Delivery left outside for an hour
Review: I waited nearly 2 hours for my curry in Whitstable.Contacted takeaway Herne Bay Tandoori, told they were running late. It was due to arrive at 10.05 pm.I called again at 10.45 put through to delivery driver, who said she had left it outside at 10 pm!?I distinctly put on the notes to ring my mobile as bell not working.No calls.Nice cold dinner!Don't use them.

Title: Shocking attitude from just eat!!!
Review: If I could leave zero stars I would!!! 2 1/2 hours and STILL no food! Store sent it out twice and the driver whose a magical genius seems to have vanished into thin air!! Just eat customer service was shocking! She was actually muting the call because of the chickens clucking in the background!!! And the scripted resolution was to a courtesy refund for food that NEVER turned up twice!!!! The store was great and sorted the food out itself and I went to get it myself! We'll NEVER use just eat again! Uber eats ONLY from now on!!!

Title: Absolute disgrace..AVOID AT ALL‚Ä¶
Review: Absolute disgrace..AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! customer service team is a shambles and when they do refund you, it‚Äôs account credit that forces you to have to order again. And then when you go to use it, doesn‚Äôt even work!!! Spent an hour talking to them on live chat and got nowhere...asked to take it higher and was told I‚Äôd receive an email, not holding my breath. DO NOT USE!!!!

Title: The drink stained my carpet and duvet. 0.99p refund.
Review: The food was 10 minutes late. The drink was on it's side and leaked on my carpet and duvet which was damaged, stained. By the time I soaked up the drink my food was cold off course. One hour chat with customer service resulted in a 0.99p refund. I won't be using the app again.

Title: Omg make UBER EATS Look like child‚Äôs‚Ä¶
Review: Omg make UBER EATS Look like child‚Äôs play!! Arrived in time scale, was hot and all good, total opposite to UBER!! Bet if I had issue they would resolve it too and not swear at me!!!! TOP service, credit where it is due!!

Title: Charged fee when no food prepared or received
Review: Order - 1189407808 Website took me to a restaurant with the same name as a local establishment a 100 miles from my postcode. I noticed wrong address immediately after ordering and was able to let the restaurant know not to make meal.  I contacted Just Eat straight away and was told I could only receive a 50% refund - even though the error was a website issue and no food was prepared.  I even offered to rebook for the correct restaurant using original  funds but this was ignored. Firm took money when no food was prepared or received.    (Also disappointed email address given to me by customer services to raise complaint resulted in a mail delivery failure)I will not be using their services in the future and will advise friends and family to do the same.

Title: Never using again!! AVOID AT ALL COSTS!
Review: I ordered McDonalds to arrive for 17:15 yesterday (26/02/21) and by 17:30 it had not arrived, so I contacted customer support. They told me the driver had been contacted and he said it was out for delivery and would be there in 10 minutes (I live 5 minutes drive from McDonalds), however, I still gave him 10 minutes and it still had not arrived! Due to this I contacted customer support again who said "rest assured your order will be delivered by the time provided" however I had informed him that this time just kept going up and up. By the time it was around 6, I asked to cancel as it had been 45 minutes since my order was suppose to arrive and I was told that there would be a cancellation fee (what a joke!). I refused to pay the cancellation fee, and told them that I should not have to pay half of my order value because their drivers are incompetent. When the time finally got to half 6 I was told that the driver had marked it as delivered, however, it still was not here! He told me that I can now reorder and they will do an investigation. So I told him that he must be joking, why would I reorder from just eat after the terrible service I have received! I am a uni student and as a result could not afford to order my meal again without receiving a refund. The company is a massive joke who clearly don't care about their customers. I only ordered from here because of the free delivery but it is worth it to pay the delivery fee on Uber as at least you receive your meal and even if there is problems their customer service actually deal with it.

Title: So to update after order from just eat‚Ä¶
Review: So to update after order from just eat never turned up.Macdonalds were absolutely useless and would not help. Just eat customer service we're absolutely useless aswell. Was on hold for 1.40 mins then when someone answered transfered me to another number on hold for further 40 mins before giving up. I had ordered a happy meal and burger for my kids at 19:00 they didn't eat until 21:00 so my 8 Yr old was very distressed! We ended up driving to macdonalds and picking extra food up ourselves and never got money back, DO NOT USE JUST EAT!!!!!!!!! THEIVES!!!!!!!!0 stars given

Title: Order never received
Review: Ordered takeaway at 7.30pm yesterday, expected delivery time of 8pm - 8.20pm after 10 minutes of waiting after 8.20pm i sent a Just Eat chat message ,which stated i was 99 in queue. At same time tried to call Just Eat but no response after 25 mins so gave up.

Title: Just awful
Review: Just awful. They did not deliver my food. I had to drive to pick the food up myself. Their complaints system is useless. The Resolve complaints process goes round in circles and the same for the online chat where you constantly remain 99th in the queue.

Title: I wish I could leave less than 1 star.
Review: I wish I could leave less than 1 star.The WORST customer service. I ordered 3 hours ago. Just arrived after hours on hold with customer service and on multiple chats. I have been left on chat once I have asked to cancel an order that is 2 hours late. DISGUSTING CUSTOMER SUPPORT. Deliveroo all the way.

Title: One of the worst customer experience‚Ä¶
Review: One of the worst customer experience ever. My order never got delivered and it says delivered on the app. When I tried to contact customer service and ask for a refund they just ignored and cut off the chat. Ubereats is way better.

Title: Ooh, how they lie, these evil people
Review: Any company can make mistakes. But when they hide behind a screen of FAQs so you can't contact them to get a refund or get any kind of resolution, and when their website/app is full of claims that they clearly cannot uphold, you realise they are really just a paper-thin sham of an organisation. That's why everyone comes here to vent their anger. I'm going to do what they all did (or should have done and what you should do too). Delete the app and never use them again. Awful company.

Title: Waste of time and money.
Review: Ordered three burgers a portion of chicken and three portions of fries through just eat, they only delivered two portions of fries, after spending over an hour talking on line to a girl called Mamatha she said they were having technical problems she could not help me and she just left the chat.I spend over ¬£1500/year on just eat but I will now not use them again and just order direct from my favourite restaurants.

Title: ordered at 6.40
Review: ordered at 6.40 , no update , then website collapsed , then says no previous orders , then says order delivered at 6.55 , appalling , now 8.15 and eating cheese on toast !!

Title: Another knock on my door from a just‚Ä¶
Review: Another knock on my door from a just eat driver. Whose in the wrong street at the wrong address, When i pointed it out, and ask him to read the street name  sign which is 6 ft away,  he became abusive and threatening.  Their drivers dont check street names before knocking, this is at all hours. I've had 12 wrong knocks on my door in 3 months. Incompetent.

Title: Poor user experience
Review: I understand that Just Eat is not accountable for late deliveries, granted. However after waiting over an hour extra for a meal with no update from the restaurant I got in touch with their helpline. The assistant on the other end was very helpful and managed to get in touch with the restaurant after my failed attempts to assure me that the order was now on its way. Just Eat also gave me a ¬£5 voucher for the poor experience. Now I go onto the app and it isn't letting me use the voucher at all. I try the helpline and it doesn't get through to an operator but cuts off after the myriad of automated options basically telling us to check the FAQs where there is no information about this. The lack of clarity has made me choose other household names like Uber-eats and Deliveroo. Believe me, you are better off.

Title: Food never arrived
Review: Food never arrived and on the map provided by Just Eat the deliveryman never even came close to my place.I contacted the customer service and the lady I chatted to said the delivery guy signed the order as delivered so she couldn't do anything.What?Utterly disgraceful.I asked her to tell him to call me back and she said she couldn't.Perfect, more than ¬£17 of food I paid and never received has been just thrown away and no one is accountable for this

Title: AVOID AVOID AVOID AT ALL COST!!
Review: AVOID AVOID AVOID AT ALL COST!!! Food never arrived despite the notifications on the just eat app saying it was delivered. Customer support team are useless and unhelpful. Absolute scammers!

Title: Great when it works
Review: Great when it works, soon as something goes wrong they couldn‚Äôt care less or be less helpful. Had the vendor blaming just eat and just eat blaming the vendors. Shocking customer service

Title: The justeat customer service is‚Ä¶
Review: The justeat customer service is extremely rude, they constantly debate you.

Title: The food was open and half of it was‚Ä¶
Review: The food was open and half of it was missing so we ran after the driver to ask him why, he was sitting in his car eating when we asked him where the rest of the food was he started swearing and stuck two  fingers up and drove away. Do not use just eat it's  not safe to eat and you don't know what the driver does to your food before it gets to you.Avoid unless u want to take the risk of getting ill.

Title: Appalling service
Review: Appalling service! Ordered a meal which was never delivered. Just eat claimed that the order was delivered.

Title: Very Poor service
Review: Poor service, chat on customer service is like a repetitive robot, wasting 2 hours of my time!

Title: Ordered mc Donald‚Äôs from just eat got‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered mc Donald‚Äôs from just eat got sent someone else‚Äôs order phoned mc Donald‚Äôs they told me to ring just eat but just eat just fobbed me off saying I‚Äôd get an email from them so my issue can be dealt with but I never go it or a refund!!! I spent over ¬£19 and had to reorder the food again spending  another ¬£19!!! Fuming

Title: Along with all the other reviews on‚Ä¶
Review: Along with all the other reviews on here, the app said it was delivered and it clearly wasn‚Äôt as I and several of my colleagues are key workers through the pandemic and we were waiting for a McDonald‚Äôs order. Tried calling ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù which is a joke and keep getting told that an investigation team will contact me.  Still waiting 3 days later

Title: A terrible company
Review: A terrible company, with no accountability, which really has to change some time soon.My order was cancelled with 1 minute left to delivery...no apology, no compensation...nothing. Customer services didn't want to know, and I also tried using Resolver as a dispute resolution service, but they were equally as useless.

Title: Food never arrived
Review: Food never arrived and I am yet to receive a resolution for a refund... shocking customer services.

Title: Just eat. You'll be lucky if you get to eat with them
Review: I would only give just eat half a star if i could. They are a company that are very quick to take from the customer their money, then they dont care if you get your delivery or not. They hire drivers that are dis-honest and lie to say they made delivery when they havent. The drivers and just eat seem to foreget that customers have cctv and door bell systems which can prove when they dont arrive.  Just eats customer service is awful and they are very slow at giving you a refund if your lucky.  Dont use them

Title: Just Eat is a terrible service!
Review: Just Eat is a terrible service!Our order never arrived, the driver took it back to the shop said he had knocked on the door! A blatant lie!The shop acknowledged the order had been sent back but it is still being investigated with no feedback at all which was promised by the 'Bot' would be within 48'72 hours which has now been 4 days!I cannot justify this people just haven't got spare money to dish out 'just because' a service is incompetent! Awful! Also Just eat sent their apologies on behalf of the restaurant! Why is it the restaurant's fault? They fulfilled their service!

Title: It was my boys 10th birthday and I‚Ä¶
Review: It was my boys 10th birthday and I promised him a McDonald's, really peed off when the delivered it to someone else! Then when I said ok well resend it they said we can't you have to wait for 48 hours for it to be investigated!!! Thanks just eat you really messed my boys birthday up.

Title: Horrible experience
Review: I made an order from McDonald's using the just eat app. I waited for almost 2 hours until I finally got in contact with their customer service team, apparently the driver returned my order back to the restaurant?! I received no phone call and no knock on my door by the driver. I requested my money back which they couldn't do and told me itll take up to 48 hours for the investigation team to get in contact with me. Now I am sitting here starving while just eat have my money and I have no food. Avoid!

Title: Rubbish service
Review: Rubbish service. Incompetent supplier Mcdonald. Charged full money but order not delivered fully. Just eat let me down. Taken my money, but failed to deliver. Careful and make a complaint to office of fair trading

Title: katty
Review: food was never delivered.

Title: LESS THAN 1 STAR SCAMMING BUNCH OF‚Ä¶
Review: LESS THAN 1 STAR SCAMMING BUNCH OF ****** just out to steal your money! DO NOT USE! Even customer services agree that this happens and they are just out to steal the money! Outrageous!

Title: they just stole my money
Review: they just stole the money from my account without ever delivering any food,when you complain they just say tough luck,i urge everyone to slander this company at every chance you get,they have robbed hundreds,personally i am going to see if trading standards can get them shut down.worst company ever who just steal  money from people.anyone reading this report them to trading standards together we might not be able to ruin them but maybe we can hit them in the wallet and destroy their (reputation).LOL

Title: Should have read these terrible reviews prior to using this company
Review: 1 star is not deserved, giving minus stars should be permitted. Another customer's order was delivered to us and we never received our order. Speaking to a supposedly human was useless, might have been better chatting with a robot. Effectively told the only thing they could do was raise an investigation with the appropriate team and we should order another meal for our dinner. Great. Have not received follow up email promised and looking at these other reviews I will not hold my breath. Will ask credit card issuer to put transaction in dispute as my order was not correctly fulfilled and ordered and paid for goods were not delivered. Things go wrong I get it  but when your supposedly Customer Service, note the word SERVICE, adds to the issue, lesson learned. But will a company spending lots of cash on lavish adverts really care?

Title: 10yrs and now no more
Review: Been using just eat for 10yrs. Went to use it tonight, waited an hour, no driver assigned, order cancelled by driver. Spoke to CS, they don't care, no compensation, no guarantee it won't happen again. So now to be a customer you're beholden to whether the driver wants to go to your address. Reminds me of uber and black cabs. CS just stopped talking to me. That's me out. Never using them again. By the looks of these reviews they'll be under in no time.

Title: The App said the food was delivered but‚Ä¶
Review: The App said the food was delivered but no food turned up! Now in the hands of an 'investigation team'????? Company is outrageous! Do not use!

Title: Would have given less than 1 star if I‚Ä¶
Review: Would have given less than 1 star if I could. My order never arrived despite the app telling me it was on its way and been delivered. Don't use thos company it's a con!

Title: Had two payments taken from just eat
Review: Had two payments taken from just eat. Two live chats apparently I wasn‚Äôt charged twice according to there system  I also provided proof of payments... again they refused to acknowledge saying I have to contact my bank witch I done before. Also they told me to contact my local police as it‚Äôs theft and not there issue... 3 hours later still on the phone and still waiting for a awnser even told I have to wait on hold for a manager witch will be two hours cause I refuse to accept a call back cause I‚Äôm still waiting for one call back from 6 months ago. Shocking service and disgrace.

Title: To be investigated by watchdog
Review: To be investigated by watchdog! Cancellation of order 15min after being placed, literally when you're expecting it to be arriving! Reason: they didn't manage to find a delivery man to pick it up from the restaurant! A real joke! Customer service unreachable or non existing probably. A claim placed through their system was never answered. From a day to another, the comment box disappeared, so you can't leave any note to the restaurant anymore regarding variations in the product ordered. Briefly, they have it all wrong.
