Wonder how they're still working with all the bad reviews i've seen here!!!

Title: Dreadful company so disappointed
Review: Dreadful company. Food arrived cold and was wrong. Told to complain by phone which was an automated service and it just cut off answering all the prompts. Complained online for 45 mins and then they ended the chat! Won‚Äôt be using them again so disappointed

Title: Just Eat 50p extra charge
Review: Since Just Eat have decided to add 50p to their cash orders to avoid regulation on credit card charges they can get stuffed. I‚Äôm ordering direct in future so more fool restaurants that stay with them.

Title: Worst customer service ever
Review: Worst customer service ever. I just cannot believe it can be so bad compared to competitors like deliveroo.I ordered food, paid money and saw the order tracking data on their website.The delivery driver went to the opposite direction of my location and turned off gps tracking and then marked the order as delivered.This is all the while I was on chat with the customer service. I was told that the issue is serious to them and escalated to a team who will investigate and get back to me.So I had to arrange alternate dinner plans, my card already charged.I did not receive any follow-up email yesterday nor a complaint reference number to follow-up with them.I received their email to review the order(which I never received).Today, I got on chat with them again and repeated the whole issue and asked for the complaint reference number to be given to me and they refused to do it and was kind of rude to me when I asked twice.They just repeated, it should have arrived in my email inbox and to check spam (I did check spam and I received order confirmation email and order review emails from just-eat all fine), so definitely not a wrong email address or spam.They just refused to give any details or reference number. When I asked on how long it will take for them to investigate, they rudely told me "You were told it will be 48 hours or it may take longer."Then they just closed the chat immediately after saying "Don't worry, you will receive an update once the investigations is done."Again no way for me to track the investigation or ask for update.This is the worst experience ever.

Title: Worst customer service ever!!
Review: Worst customer service ever. Sent me a voucher that magically ‚Äúdisappeared‚Äù without me using it and won‚Äôt send me another!! ‚ÄúWe never done that must have been someone else...‚Äù think I can tell the different between Just Eat and other retailers thank you.

Title: Nothing but bully's
Review: Nothing but bully's, if they fail to meet the delivery that you have paid for and for no fault but theirs if you dare  cancel the order rather than wait hours for your food  they fine you an absolute fortune and blame you. they take your money instantly but refuse to refund it with the same speed a three to seven day wait for a refund approximately? , be warned if your diabetic and you have too eat they can delay your order as many times as they like. Buyer beware in my case my blood sugar became extremely low they claimed I was informed that my food was massively delayed they did not Inform and I was left waiting untill I contacted them. This company are a disgrace there so called customer help is callous and awfull, ps type as fast as you can or they become very restless and send cheeky messages

Title: Terrible/non existent customer‚Ä¶
Review: Terrible/non existent customer service!!!! Absolute waste of time this app and company

Title: I never received my order from mcdonald‚Ä¶
Review: I never received my order from mcdonald I ordered a long time ago and it has been 2 hours and yet nothing has happened. DO NOT USE THEM

Title: Absolutely appalling service
Review: Absolutely appalling service! Delivery is refused to my door,by an extremely rude girl! Nowhere to complain, will never use just eat again!

Title: Very poor customer services
Review: Very poor customer services Last time I ordered , the order took 2 hours Asked for a manager but been advised a manager will call back in 72 hours but never happened Very poor service , completely different not like Deliveroo and Uber !

Title: Just Eat's customer service has improved remarkably
Review: Although the service at the restaurants can be questionable, I have to say Just Eat's customer service has improved remarkably. The consistency of the restaurants on their service needs to improve as quality is variable, but I'm happy using the just-eat service once agian.

Title: Would give less than 1* if I could
Review: Would give less if I could. We prebooked a valentines meal for 5pm delivery and because there was no driver available at that time they emailed me to say it would be delivered at 12:45 instead. I immediately upon receiving this called f and b who said we understand it is no good 4 hours early we will put the food on hold and not cook it if you Call just eat and let them know that time is no good and if they cannot bring at 5pm it needs to be later and not before.Got through to just eat who said it was not possible to change my time as they had already allocated a driver and all they could do if we didn‚Äôt want 4 hours and 15 minutes early, is to cancel the order and receive only a 50% refund. We called f and b back whose manager was furious that they were trying to offer only a 50% refund when it is them who is unable to provide the food at the time I had requested. The franky and bennies manager called just eat himself and got us a full refund but it is amazing the way this company think they can flout consumer rights laws. I have now made a subject access request for the call recordings with both advisors and will take this further

Title: 3rd time no charm
Review: In fairness it is only the 3rd time I have used Just Eat on Friday evening. I placed an order with a local takeaway was given an estimated arrival of 18:20 which was then revised to 18:35. The app advised a driver was assigned, driver was at the restaurant, driver was on his way and then the map was unable to update me on the location. I thought perhaps the driver was doing several deliveries before mine. As my house is less than 10 mins drive from house after 40 mins I contacted Just Eat. According to their system there was no driver assigned. I understand there can be delays and on previous orders I was kept informed of the delays but this time I was provided with completely false information from the app with no updates. This doesn't work for me I am not interested in their apology or credit offered after my refund was issued. I will not be using them again and have already deleted the apps off my devices.

Title: This was my worst ever customer‚Ä¶
Review: This was my worst ever customer experience when ordering food. I will never use just eats again. They do not care about making you wait. You will probably die before you get your food. Plus, they will still charge you full price for it! Seeking a tasty meal on valentines for the whole family, my sister ordered an ¬£84 dinner at 17:45. She waited from 17.45 until 20:30 for a driver to be assigned. Heavily frustrated, she used the just eats help chat multiple times, but they repeatedly stated: " it would be a 15-minute wait to assign a driver". What a pack of lies. Then, she spoke to Stella Marina, who was incredibly unhelpful (I think my nan could have been of more use and she‚Äôs dead). Stella just told my sister to wait for 15 minutes again and again. Abruptly, Stella left the chat and the order changed to delivered. It had never been delivered! We panicked, tried to get an answer to this, but it took them ages to reply to my sister's messages. We felt like we were going to lose our money and get no food. I guess this is how Iran felt when they order tanks from the UK, paid for them, but they never arrived. After two hours and half of waiting and useless chatting, they managed to assign a driver. We asked for money off, but just eats told me as they had assigned a driver, we would lose 50% off if my sister cancelled. That was a kick in the teeth. Sorry, we cannot deliver your order on time, its two and half hours late, plus you are starving, but we will steal half your money and make you stressed. They were not even apologetic. Like a serial killer, they showed no remorse. This placed us in a difficult position. After, two and a half hours our family was starving. We wanted our food. We did not want to lose ¬£40. So, we did not cancel because who wants to lose half their money? In the end, we waited forever for the food and it arrived at five to nine! Funny, as they said it would arrive at 18.10. All I can say is, WORST SERVICE EVER! (Disclaimer: This is all JustEats poor service and nothing to do with the restaurant). Just eats do not do anything fast, they just mug you off. Should rebrand to JustStarve!

Title: Shambolic and disgraceful
Review: Why isn't zero stars an option?My last order was placed at 7pm, by 9.30pm they still hadn't allocated a driver. When I called for support I was placed 639th in queue, this number did not get smaller. The app then marked my order as being delivered! I ended up having to drive to the restaurant and collect my own food. Shambolic and disgraceful service.

Title: Would give zero stars if I could. Placed an order, paid for it and the money was taken from my account only for the restaurant to cancel my order without giving a reason. Still waiting on my refund.
Review: Would give zero stars if I could.

Title: Robbed on Valentine‚Äôs Day
Review: For Valentine‚Äôs Day we ordered from a local restaurant (Shish on halfway street) that we have used several times via a company called just eat. We placed an order for ¬£83.43 at 2.37pm on Valentine‚Äôs Day. We were then advised the food would be with us shortly. My husband noticed a bike pulled up and sat outside for several minutes, before then darting off. I then checked the order status which had changed to delivered. Panicked, I called the restaurant who advised it has nothing to do with them as it is just eat we ordered through. I have contacted Just Eat and an investigation will take place in 48 hours. It was very difficult to get through to them and I have been advised I will receive an email regarding the investigation, I have still not received anything at 7.23pm)This is a large order and we have spent a lot of money and have been robbed and let down and especially on a special day like Valentine‚Äôs Day.. We have had to now go out to marks and Spencer and spend a further ¬£20 and our day has been ruined. I feel we are not the only ones this is happening to with companies like this.Just eat are failing customers and word or mouth and customer service experience is king. Get your act together and build in protocols and punishments for YOUR drivers who STEAL and are breaking the law.

Title: What a shower
Review: What a shower. You only get one star cos I can't give none. Ordered a Chinese takeaway for Valentines evening, giving plenty of time. Checked with restaurant 30 mins before delivery due and guess what they had done received it. Did you know you can't actually TALK to anyone to resolve issue. Eventually managed to cancel meal and now having to wait 90mins for meal. Do NOT USE this pile of poo

Title: Taking orders they can't fulfil...
Review: They seem to take orders for restaurants where Just East do the deliveries, such as McDonalds, even when they have no drivers available. I have twice waited up to 40 minutes with no driver assigned, and then to cancel the order you need to jump through hoops with online security checks. Surely the system should know if there are drivers available.

Title: Consistently bad service
Review: Took two hours waiting for food. None came! 72 hours to wait for investigation team to decide whether I get my ¬£16 back. I have lost count of how many times so else things like this has happened recently with just eat. I will not be using this service again after all these mistakes. Joke of a company

Title: Ordered breakfast at 1020 ..‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered breakfast at 1020 from the Wandsworth Road mcds - it's now 1130 and driver still to be assigned before meal is prepared. Called just eat customer service and was told order should be due SOON They refunded me ¬£5 for the inconvenienceAs I type this still no knock on the door I live 20 mins from the restaurant ü§îüôÑI usually use uber eats if I order a takeaway but the delivery prices are higher so of course why not go with the cheaper option. I've never had this issue with uber eats but will continue to use them in the future I wonder if Snoop Dog gets his delivery on time Oh nearly 1140 and not hopeful my breakfast will be hot let alone warm and I'm pretty sure they will be preparing the lunch menus nowWOW!!!!!!!EDIT :whilst I had my face pressed up against the window watching for the moped with my soggy sausage and egg muffin in tow and an eye on the tracker page I received a I'M SORRY YOUR ORDER HAS BEEN CANCELLED üò≥üòì and a refund will be issued Not wanting to shout at the cat in anger I then clicked on the uber eats page at 1225 (no breakfast of course but a very grumbly belly) and ordered my meal but also got free nuggets üëåüôÇMy meal came at 1255 and the coffee was still steamingAll is well with the world again and the cat even got his dreamies!!Sorry just eat big thumbs down for you!

Title: Justeat take your money
Review: Justeat take your money, dont give you food and then don't give refund.Seems fair

Title: Zero stars deserved
Review: Zero stars deserved, ordered food at 6:30, delivery was for 7:30. Never arrived called the restaurant at 7:45 and they said the driver will be here any minute. Driver still hadn‚Äôt arrived at 8, called the restaurant again and they told me they will call me back one they‚Äôve called the driver. The food arrived at 8:07 no phone call from the restaurant. Food was freezing cold and had to reheat in the oven. I called the restaurant again to complain and they told me to contact Just Eat, after speaking to Wayne for 45minutes I finally got 80% of my monies back for which they refused to refund me fully.

Title: Just had a driver do a 3 point turn‚Ä¶
Review: Just had a driver do a 3 point turn over my lawn. Total lack of respect.

Title: #didanyonesayjustdon'teat
Review: Said they delivered it which was not true. The sandwich shop confirmed it was picked up as I went and got a new order myselfCalled Just Eat , they did not email me to action a refund. They are scripted and they will not check. Beware !!!  #didanyonesayjustdon'teat

Title: Just Eat? More like Just Rubbish!
Review: I placed an order through Just Eat last night the order took over 2 hours to arrive from point of order which was around 45 minutes later than the given delivery time and it was stone cold. I called the restaurant but they were less than helpful so I contacted Just Eat to discuss my experience however all I got were automated messages then hung up on so utterly pointless. I thought maybe it was due to the time of evening so attempted to call again this morning but still only getting pre-recorded messages. All in all very poor customer services from both the restaurant and Just Eat. They have the money to pay Snoop $5m to appear in their ad but can't seem to be bothered about getting people to answer phones to appease customers. The service from just eat has left a very bad taste in my mouth. I think I'll be going direct for my take away from now on.Reading the poor reviews left by people about just eat, a MASSIVE 90% giving 1 star I think people should follow my lead an boycott Just Eat. They have been the big cat in their field for far too long and have become complacent. Maybe they would sit up and listen if people started going direct to the take away like we used to or by using another company that offers the same service and then vastly improve on their clearly failed customer service.

Title: Not able to resolve any issues with‚Ä¶
Review: Not able to resolve any issues with delivery. Not able to give any answers at all. Customer support no better than a chat bot.

Title: Please AVOID at all costs.
Review: Please AVOID at all costs.3 hours waiting for an order which was supposed to take 30 mins. A further 30 mins spent on the phone with customer services trying to cancel and get a refund, being disconnected and reconnected with multiple agents having to explain my issue again and again to no avail. Each time being promised ‚Äòthis person has solved your issue I am connecting you to them now‚Äô only to be met with yet another agent with no knowledge of my order. AWFUL. Please avoid, use other delivery services even if the price is higher, what is going on here is akin to a scam; they will take your money, provide no food, and fail to issue a refund. Just terrible.

Title: Food arrives hours later and sometimes‚Ä¶
Review: Food arrives hours later and sometimes never arrives, I don't know what happened to them.This has been going on for a while.They say reviews are fake, but they are not.Many times I have to go to pick up the food myself.They also don't answer the customer service phone.They have become a joke.The people in charge of this company needs to be sacked.I only use them because my favourite Indian in Wimbledon uses them otherwise I would never use them again.

Title: Half the order missing!
Review: We‚Äôre informed there were no delivery drivers available after we placed our order so had a long wait. When it finally arrived we only had half the order. 3 of 5 people had no food!! Tried to deal with restaurant and just eat and couldn‚Äôt get any kind of answer, just a lot of running around. Never using them again.

Title: Utter crud
Review: Once again, placed an order....no order arrived. called helpline, apparently food was marked as delivered. Now have to send to "investigation team". Out of pocket, no food, useless service. Never again

Title: The worst!
Review: The worst customer services and the worst food delivery service. Avoid.

Title: Such a joke company...
Review: Really don‚Äôt know why such a joke business is still alive till now. 1 hour waiting for a KFC order and then telling you they can‚Äôt find a driver. You are not allowed to cancel but to to chat with a robot, then you find there are 547 people in the queue. Finally you googled and called the customer service team, they promise you to cancel, refund and a 5 pound voucher, which will never come to your account. This is just eat, a such rubbish company with rubbish service...

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. Driver missing from JustEat and they refused to refund only offering 50%.I will never order via JustEat again

Title: Such a crappy food delivery service
Review: Such a crappy food delivery service - missing food in my delivery AND they did not come on time. When I spoke to customer service I get the money back to my JustEat account - I don't want credit with JustEat I want the money back into my bank account - why is this not an option??? Stop forcing people to continue using your rubbish delivery service! Let's try and get orders correct first!!!!

Title: Food didn't turn up despite leaving the‚Ä¶
Review: Food didn't turn up despite leaving the restaurant

Title: Extremely poor customer service and missing food
Review: Extremely poor customer service, the food didn't arrive and the helpline put me on hold for ages before answering (and then hanging up, twice!) - nearly two hours later and the food still hasn't arrived and I have to go through a whole security check to cancel it. Then they sent me an email trying to blame the restaurant for their error. Avoid.

Title: If I could give negative stars I would
Review: If I could give negative stars I would. Justeat have taken the side of a lying driver and left me out of pocket! Driver called to say he didn't know how to get to the restaurant expecting me to know how to and do his job for him, I told him I don't know and maybe contact the restaurant yourself so they can help.What did he do? Marked the order as delivered and left me ¬£15 out of pocket.Just eat took ages to investigate and then decided refund was ok then an hour later said nah actually we think you're the liar so we won't be refunding you.Had enough of your rubbish service and your drivers are terrible. Id have more luck risking a fine driving to the restaurants myself!.You get 1 star because your appalling service at least has the silver lining of making me so put off junk food so I doubt ill be spending any money on junk anymore so thanks but no thanks!

Title: If I could give no stars I would!
Review: If I could give no stars I would!! What a load of rubbish!! I ordered on just eat and it sent my order to a restaurant hundreds of miles away and now I‚Äôm being told they will only refund me 50% of what I paid.. absolute joke of an app!! We will not be using this again!

Title: Food not delivered - no refund
Review: I ordered a delivery, the app said it had been delivered. After speaking to the online chat I was told it would be investigated and is get a response within 48hrs. 3 days later and still no response. Again made contact through online chat and was just told to wait.

Title: JustEat perform scarcely above UberEats‚Ä¶
Review: JustEat perform scarcely above UberEats and Deliveroo but their customer service is just as shocking. It used to be great but nowadays customer support is just like talking to a brick wall. For over two hours I have been trying to redeem a gift card. Two hours of giving support the two codes I had (order ref and batch no) because that was all the email had. Two hours of telling them its not the pin and two hours of them telling me to enter it in the redeem gift card section. Two hours later (plus an email telling me to redeem) and two hours of me asking them to check my order number and they magically send me the right code. WASTE OF AN EVENING. I wish we could bin these companies off - they are the worst of the worst.

Title: If I could give them zero stars I‚Ä¶
Review: If I could give them zero stars I would.Horrible experience! They never delivered my food. I contacted them and they kept repeating it will take 48 hrs to process the complain then they‚Äôll contact me back. It‚Äôs been 4 days now and no one has contacted me. They‚Äôre absolute scammers and thieves

Title: Ordered just eat 4 days ago
Review: Ordered just eat 4 days ago. They sent me the complete wrong order. Have never ordered what they sent. Filled out the online automated form thing. Said will get back within 48 hours. Still waiting to hear from them. They are robbers. Avoid this company. There are better out there

Title: Terrible company
Review: Terrible company, incompetent and money-grubbing. Do yourself a favour and download Uber Eats instead. It‚Äôs a little more expensive, but you know what? You get your food, if something goes wrong you can easily resolve it, and you can track your delivery with ease.I only ever use Just Eat when Uber doesn‚Äôt have any couriers available, and even then only when I‚Äôm making a simple order to a nearby residential address. Even THEN, I did this recently and of course the straw was missing from my McD‚Äôs drink, which has never happened with Uber but happens 9 times out of 10 with Just Eat.Their bizarre inability to put a straw in a bag is the least of their issues though. I twice tried making a group order to my workplace. Never do this. At best the order will be late, cold, and mostly wrong.At worst it won‚Äôt show up at all, the driver will mark it as delivered, the customer service agent will talk to you like you‚Äôre lying, refuse to do anything about it beyond arranging an investigation that will take a month to complete (because they outright refuse to call drivers and restaurants), refuse to refund you or set up another delivery, and this entire process will take HOURS.Just an awful, greedy, unethical company. Someone on their hilariously-crammed-with-angry-customers FB group said it best: ‚ÄúJust Eat: we take your money but don‚Äôt fill your tummy.‚Äù

Title: What a terrible company
Review: Imagine treating your couriers like scum and giving terrible service to your customers. Welcome to Just Eat

Title: Ordered KFC driver rang to confirm‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered KFC driver rang to confirm where house was. Which is super easy to find. 20mins later nothing.Rang customer service. Next to useless, just kept repeating it will take 48hours to investigate as its marked as delivered. They refuse to contact the driver to get an answer then and there.Customer service woman, couldn't care less attitude Wont use again

Title: Absolutely shocking customer service
Review: Absolutely shocking customer service. Phoned to alert them that we had been a victim of a phishing scam requesting information over the phone to verify our partner account. Customer services had a terrible line and just said disregard the phone call and when asked did not direct me to their complaints procedure. How did the scammers know we where in the process of setting up a partner account? They obviously do not keep their customer data safe and they do not care that their company name is being use to scam people out of their personal details.

Title: Absolute scam
Review: Absolute scam, Ordered food it never came, customer service are just scripted robots, no help what so ever. Felt robbed

Title: I mistakenly clicked on collection‚Ä¶
Review: I mistakenly clicked on collection instead of delivery. I quickly tried to contact JustEat and the restaurant. The restaurant did not pick up the phone! JustEat said they can't change collection to delivery! if I want to cancel they will only refund 50% to me! How difficult it is to arrange for delivery? Who ever developed that app never thought of this?

Title: I had credit went to place order
Review: I had credit went to place order, didn't go through, my credit vanished ,placed another order didn't go through got charged no refund .costumercare are tragic 5 times i got told I'll get a call back nothing, scumbag thieves

Title: Rubbish company don‚Äôt no one ever Order‚Ä¶
Review: Rubbish company don‚Äôt no one ever Order of just eat they just cancelled my order without me noticing and never refunded my money back they robbed me gonna call my bank tomorrow to do just eat for fraud

Title: Ordered from here and never turned up
Review: Ordered from here and never turned up. Couldn‚Äôt get hold of anyone to sort it and restaurant wouldn‚Äôt help as they said I ordered through just eat so need to go through them üò°

Title: Disgusting customer service
Review: Disgusting customer service, not helpful one bit!! Won't be using them for sure, being a regular customer, complained for the first time and was left with no help, absolutely shocked!!! Was told il be given a ¬£5 refund well guess what another lie!! Bet these call centre workers are pocketing the money!!!

Title: Chat advisor lied about giving me ¬£5 credit for complaint
Review: Generally good, except after making a complaint regarding not being able to use discount code and pay using account credit the 'chat advisor' said they would credit my account with ¬£5 for my trouble.  This didn't appear so when I 'chatted' with another advisor they stated that they were not able to do this.  The first advisor lied, I believe, to get rid of me! appalling behaviour and should not be allowed to continue.

Title: Delivery Areas Don‚Äôt Make Sense
Review: The only way to get a McDonalds at present is by delivery, I live within the area for delivery according to the McDonalds website but if you try to order using the supposed delivery partners just eat or Uber eats they say I live too far away, I am 2.3mls from the Walton on Thames store and am unable to get a delivery yet, they will deliver subway to me and fish and chips from the fish tank both are almost next door to McDonalds, the will also deliver KFC from Hampton which is even further away.I find this totally stupid, I have contacted McDonalds customer service to make them aware of this ridiculous situation asking why they use delivery partners that can‚Äôt deliver their food but will deliver food from companies next door to one of their stores.

Title: Order got given to another house on‚Ä¶
Review: Order got given to another house on another street. I‚Äôve got to wait 48 hours for someone to investigate. No worries, il just wait hungry till then. Don‚Äôt worry about my money at all.

Title: Totally disappointed justeat.
Review: Totally disappointed in the service and response. Ordered from subway which has never been a problem before spent ¬£19 for 3 subways, hashbrowns and cookies after waiting an hour for delivery which never arrived. I went to subway with the order number and was told by staff the order had been delivered. Contacted justeat to talk to a robot who advised an investigation would take place. Where is my refund justeat?

Title: Once used never again
Review: First time of using the just eat app.And I will not use it again.I ordered McDonald's three meals and one out of the three did not arrive and the remainder were cold.I complained through the on line chat and was given a refund for the missing meal.The on line chat experience was not the best I assume its not based in the UK as the grammar was abysmal.My advice stay well clear its not worth the hassle.

Title: The rudest delivery driver I have ever‚Ä¶
Review: The rudest delivery driver I have ever experienced. I did not receive my order and yet to receive a refund

Title: Verbally assaulted by delivery driver
Review: I really feel Just Eat need to hold restaurants accountable for horrible food /delivery service. I was verbally assaulted by a delivery driver after he called to tell me he had arrived at my address (the delivery was already over 30 minutes late at this point). I told him he had arrived at the wrong address and  gave him directions to my correct location as per the address given on my order. The driver got aggressive over the phone and proceeded to use disgusting foul language, he then swore at me before hanging up the phone on me. No food was delivered so I then called the restaurant who were clueless as to what to do, they said they would talk to the driver and that I should take this up with Just Eat. I of course took this up with Just Eat immediately and let‚Äôs just say 24hours later I‚Äôm still waiting for a refund on an order that never arrived and action to be taken on the driver.

Title: Ordered food
Review: Ordered food. Food was collected by driver according to takeaway. 2 hours later cancelled by Justeat . No apology or phone call to takeaway or client. Just a status update 1hr after pick up.Terrible and dissappointing service. Children were very upset.

Title: Avoid    Just eat had to be the worst site‚Ä¶
Review: Just eat had to be the worst site ever,have had a few problems over time with just eat  but tonight final straw, wont ever be using them again,placed an order which was then cancelled and just eat charged me for it spoke with customer service pure waste of time ,

Title: Driver accepted order
Review: Driver accepted order, then cancelled it and marked it down as delivered. Everyone on the chat kept entering and leaving without helping basically seeming they couldn‚Äôt be bothered to deal with it. They wouldn‚Äôt send out another driver because it was marked as delivered and said I would hear from them in 48 hours.

Title: I had ordered from burger king
Review: I had ordered from burger king. I waited 1 hour and 10 min and my order is still on the way. I call the customer service they tell me the order might have been delivered to another adress. Even if all my details were right. All they say is sorry. Poo company that makes money charging delivery fees for drivers to eat the food on the way to the customer then mark it down as delivered.I had this happening to me 3 times before today. I might as well jump back on ubereats. Just fee not just eat.

Title: Worst customer service
Review: Worst customer service, that doesn‚Äôt rectify problems until 48 hours later. Left with no dinner and just canned responses from the chat option

Title: Wouldn't even bother using these as‚Ä¶
Review: Wouldn't even bother using these as burger King never delivered my food after I paid online ¬£27 and these won't do anything about it because apparently it was marked as delivered but definitely never came as we was watching live map all of a sudden it said we lost the drivers signal

Title: AVOID - FIND ANY ALTERNATIVE other than JustEat
Review: Despite a promising start, I cannot condemn this company enough.24-48hours just to increase 1 price on my menu, ZERO assistance from any sales rep. A 6 to 12 Hour wait just to speak to a supervisor who cannot speak proper English because of the time difference between UK and India (which is where the entire call centre is based). Menu team who add whatever they want to your options, completely screwed up my whole menu when asked for a couple of basic changes which caused me to be off-line for 3 days during local lockdown due to COVID.AVOID!!There are PLENTY of BETTER services out there that won't take nearly 30% of your takings... YES 30% when you add everything up. DO NOT BE FOOLED by their "low commission" offerings - As a side note, my shop has had over 50 COLD CALLS from SCAMMERS claiming to be JustEat and offering me a lower rate of commission. When I eventually got hold of my sales rep his answer was "Just ignore them..." THEY CALL FROM A JUSTEAT NUMBER!!!! I cannot wait to move my customers over to our own branded website and do away with JustEat for good!

Title: Absolutely fuming!
Review: Took over an hour for me to find out that my order has been allegedly delivered (absolutely untrue) and now they have charged my card and I have no food. Suspiciously the driver lost signal a few minutes after picking up my order. I feel like I‚Äôve been made to feel like the one in the wrong here. Shutting down my account and never using them again. If I could give zero stars I would.

Title: Please read! Terrible
Review: Ordered off just eat. Food did not arrive but said delivered. It shows the driver on the map came to our address and left so looks like he delivered. Rang just eat, absolutely no help just put it through to investigating department who will be in toutch within 48 hours. And no guarantee of refund as we have no proof we didn't have it. Disgraceful system they need to have proof they actually delivered. Will never use again. Took money and no food. They even said just order again, ha yeah right!!!

Title: Did Somebody Say 'Just Cheat'
Review: These crooks claim that my order was delivered at 18:43, which is nonsense, as I had to call the restaurant direct to cancel after waiting near 2 hrs beyond expected delivery time. They're currently refusing to refund.DO NOT GIVE YOUR MONEY TO THESE THIEVES.

Title: Please don't use Just Eat
Review: Please don't use Just Eat. Appalling company. I'm not sure how they are still allowed to trade. I ordered a Pizza Hut delivery Saturday afternoon. After 5 minutes of the order being place, it was marked as collected and on its way. Alarm bells started ringing, as, how could 3 pizzas be built and cooked? I thought that maybe a miracle had occurred and gave them the benefit of the doubt. Nothing arrived after an hour. Contacted Just Eat but got a generic, useless bot through their "chat" feature. I then called Pizza Hut who informed me that they wanted to get in touch with me but Just Eat refused to give any contact details (fair enough with the data protection act I suppose), as the Just Eat driver had marked my order as collected and delivered but the driver had not turned up at the restaurant. They asked Just Eat to warn me of this but they didn't. It's now Friday after countless unfuitful chats and calls with agents that can't do anything for you, still no refund, although I have just been informed (after yet another call) that a full refund has been issued. I just have to wait and see if this is true as I have zero faith in this company. This is by far the worst experience I have had with a take away delivery service. So frustrating and disappointing. I will not be using Just Eat again and I urge you all to avoid at all costs. Thanks for reading.

Title: Food was stolen by a delivery driver
Review: Food was stolen by a delivery driver, the driver said it was delivred but it wasnt. I am waiting for a refund if i dont get it I will delete my account.

Title: Orders cancelled with little or no notice
Review: Was brilliant March 2020, now awful.  We've had 4 out of 5 orders cancelled with little or no notice.  Justeat just don't have enough drivers to service the restaurants.  The restaurants are cancelling orders that cannot be delivered due to sheer volume. I have deleted the app. This business does not deserve my money. In future, I will be ordering directly from the restaurant  and collecting my food myself.

Title: Yes it has got that bad!!
Review: People please pay attention and not your money. Don‚Äôt be the pathetic minority who ‚Äòjust don‚Äôt care‚Äô or feel they won‚Äôt be heard. UBER EATS I personally think are far superior and trustworthy. Snoop dogg should be ashamed of putting his name with these terrorists. JUST EAT are conning people and no one seems to be reporting them. We are compiling enough evidence to show how the company and site have no customers rights in mind at all. Please join our fight to save our money from these Nazis thieves.

Title: Order was cancelled by restaurant. STILL no refund
Review: I ordered from Mcdonalds using Just Eat. They accepted and confirmed my order. The restaurant were unable to assign a delivery driver so the order was cancelled. Just Eat tell me that they have issued an immediate full refund that should arrive back in my account within 20 minutes. That didn't happen. Instead the transaction was debited with my bank and after multiple attempts to chase this up with Just Eat (offering to show them my bank statement to prove this) they simply said "Your transaction would not be on your statement as when the refund was issued JustEat wouldn't have accepted the payment and therefore would be returned to you. The refund would not show up on any bank statements". Okay? So why is that order amount debited on my statement? I contacted my bank twice giving them the apparent "refund reference number" and HSBC told me twice no such refund was made and JustEat did confirm the payment and had taken it after it was in a pending state. So JustEat are liars, theives and have broken the law. I have began talks with my solicitor in regards to this. I have also had an issue where some of my order was missing and again, was offered a partial refund that never actually showed up in my bank account. This company is a scam. Beware. I have reported them to trading standards. They should be shut down.

Title: Appalling Service
Review: I ordered from a takeaway that I hadn't ordered from before. The order was CONFIRMED and there was a 45 minute wait for delivery. After about an hour I looked on the App. and saw that a driver hadn't even been assigned. I tried to contact Just Eat, but an auto messaging service was singularly unhelpful. I tried to get to speak to someone and it took me a further 40 minutes to get anywhere with Just Eat. They then informed me, (after nearly an hour and a half), that the restaurant didn't have drivers that delivered in my area! Why confirm the order? Why not inform me when the issue was discovered? Instead of eating at about 18:20 it was after eight when I eventually ate and Just Eats' attitude was "oh well"!I will never use their service again. There are plenty of others to choose from, but never Just Eat from now on.

Title: Absolute worst customer service‚Ä¶
Review: Absolute worst customer service experience of my entire life. They lie, they're irresponsive, they give you wrong information, they're unreachable, they hang up at you. It's honestly the absolute total worst. Uber Eats and Deliveroo are saints compared to Just Eat. I will never ever order through Just Eat again and you should certainly do the same.

Title: Food never turned up refused a refund.
Order never arrived. Apparently "Service" is not refundable...
Review: Order never arrived, took nearly a week of chasing to get any outcome on this. They only refunded me the cost of the items, not the service fee etc. So I basically paid them for a service I never received. a joke. When I questioned this, they just responded "I am sorry we are not allowed to provide you with service or delivery charges". That is LITERALLY their part of the business that they get paid for. They are the ones providing the service and delivery, yet that's the part they won't pay back? I really want to be able to use JustEat but now I have lost all confidence.

Title: Should avoid from this company
Review: Should avoid from this company. Food never arrived and it‚Äôs marked as delivered. Asked for refund and they said they will send email in 48 hours . Which I have wasted my time and money.

Title: FOOD NEVER ARRIVED!
Review: Food did not arrive after being marked as delivered. Told by Just Eat that it was our word against the restaurant!! How is this any way to operate a business. No refund and no food to show for our money. Disgusting service. This company should be shut down

Title: Just Eat - do not bother. The restaurants are pretty awful.
Review: Used Just Eat for the first time when I was staying in a hotel in Scotland. First night delivery the food was good. The second night, the food was nearly 1 hour late and pretty awful. No apology or compensation offered.I ordered tonight from a restaurant in County Durham called Tuk Tuk. Food was very overpriced. ¬£20.95 for 2 dishes. Calamari was previously frozen and dunked in oil so was soggy and stunk to high heaven with garlic (I cook with garlic so this was really bad). Delivery was late despite me giving the driver some specific directions so the food was nearly cold and needed microwaving.I wrote a review about tonight's service and food and even called the restaurant to give them a heads up - response? uh, ok. That was it. Zero customer service or effort to make things right. I tried to contact Just Eat. That's a laff. I called and got recorded messages. No real person to talk to so no idea why they say they are there until 2am.I would rather starve than order from any restaurant using Just Eat. Absolutely awful.  And Just Eat and the restaurants using them do not care.

Title: Company is a complete joke
Review: Company is a complete joke. Ordered food through just eat the delivery driver turned up rang the doorbell and ran off without delivering food or waiting for us to answer, phoned the restaurant for an explanation to which we were told the order was successfully delivered and would need to speak with just eat, they claimed they would email us a investigation number but after several tries still have not had any response, the driver was recorded by our cctv and we are going to spread over social media to show people how this company operates DO NOT USE THEM

Title: No attempt of delivery and no refund
Review: Ordered at 12.43 driver didn‚Äôt even attempt delivery, just eat customer service non existent. I‚Äôm ¬£30 out of pocket no email to confirm refund after multiple chat sessions, once I get this resolved (if) I will never use just eat again. Poor poor poor.

Title: the worst service
Review: the worst service - dont expect your food to actually be delivered! and definitely dont count on a refund

Title: Do not use..food never arrived
Review: What is going on? Someone needs to be looking into just eat right now. Taking payments for food. Driver disappeared off GPS and never showed up. Rang customer service said 48 hour investigation. App also said later on food was delivered. LIES! It seems this is happening to alot of people right now. Im reading from others they are not getting issues refunds because it says delivered. Shocking service that needs investigating.

Title: useless assistance
Review: useless assistance. I told the customer service rep that the app and site had a banner that said they were delivering the vegan burger from KFC but it was not on the phone app or website. I tried multiple times and asked if this could get escalated. He just kept saying to try again later or restart my phone - things I had already done. it was not on the phone or computer so clearly it was a glitch. He was basically trying to give me the standard options which I had told him I'd already done...he was basically doing anything to avoid doing extra work and escalating the issue. clowns.

Title: No compassion and unjust greey large business
Review: After second time of missing items and no compassion from justeat the food also arrived an hour late. We Will use other competitors as this company is a greedy one and isnt just at all. No refund for missing items and no compassion for the lateness of the food. Will not use again

Title: I have had zero resolution to actions‚Ä¶
Review: I have had zero resolution to actions agreed by restaurants and asked to call Just Eat. I‚Äôve spent so much time trying to get through to them I never eat a meal and then even though the restaurant offers it.. just eat don‚Äôt do it.. take away is a small pleasure for a lot of money... awful exploitation

Title: Pay ¬£24.54 and get ¬£12.12 Refund
Review: I placed an order but I picked the wrong address I payed almost ¬£25 but I put in the wrong address so I had to cancel but they only payed back ¬£12

Title: Two days in a row I have had issues‚Ä¶
Review: Two days in a row I have had issues with food orders , sadly the point of contact is clearly not dealt with in the uk and outsourced to another country as the phone lines are awful to say the least , but getting back to the point I have been informed it will take 3 days for a supervisor to contact me about the issues !!!!!Honestly how you are allowed to trade is beyond me the boss of just eat must love seeing The Trust pilot rating !!!!!

Title: Wrong food delivered
Review: Wrong food delivered, I contacted them, send the proof of our order and what we received, waiting for the refund. No redelivery option. At least the operator was helpful.

Title: We completed a order on the app‚Ä¶
Review: We completed a order on the app subsequently cancelled within 5 minutes. Just eat confirmed cancellation by text  Within  30 minutes the restaurant delivered the order of food we had cancelled. I contacted the restaurant because this wasn't their fault and didn't think it was fair to return  so much later  I ended up paying them an extra ¬£20 for their inconvenience!! just eat appears not to care and its impossible to speak to somebody   the online chat kept saying they cant apply any good will gesture

Title: WARNING to anyone considering ordering‚Ä¶
Review: WARNING to anyone considering ordering from Just Eat. Please please don‚Äôt use their service. Worst company EVER!!!! They take your money, get your order wrong, make you jump through hoops before they will even consider giving you a refund. An let‚Äôs be honest when it‚Äôs to do with food most people would just like to get a replacement order fixing the mistakes of the first order but that‚Äôs never an option and after 2 days of messing about doing nothing with my complaint they offer to refund which takes a further 3-7 days. Absolute joke, I have taken my complaint to trading standards now not that just eat will care as they are a bunch of thief‚Äôs!! Please never use them they need to get closed down

Title: Appalling company on all levels
Review: Appalling company on all levels. Ordered from them 2 weeks ago and food never came. I had to wait a week for a refund and their costumer service is beyond terrible. Thought I‚Äôd give them one more chance but similar experience again. Will definitely never order from them again. Stay well clear of this company!!!!

Title: Stay away
Review: Placed order at 6.15... first time given: 6.55... then 7.05, then 7.25... then 7.55... I had to speak with 4 different agents that did NOTHING. I asked to cancel my order and they didn't... I should have received an email to confirm case would be escalated... nothing... They told me I would receive a credit .... NOTHING.

Title: Stay away! Avoid at all costs!
Review: I honestly wish I could give zero stars!This is the 4th time I have ordered off just eat and its stated that the order was delivered and we never received our order! Absolutely appalling and all the driver need to be re trained or fired! Won't be using just eat again! Taking money and then not delivering the food, they should be ashamed of themselves! Stay away!

Title: shocking service from just eat order stolen
Review: shocking service from just eat, driver stole our food  no help from customer service at all intact they were beyond rubbish,refuse to let me speak to a manager or superior and won't refund. the driver lied said he returned he food to restaurant but didn't and restaurant confirmed he didn't. and yet still no refund. app deleted I won't be using it ever again

Title: Love justeat but delivery guy was so rude!
Review: So I don‚Äôt usually leave reviews but I was so upset, I‚Äôm a carer and don‚Äôt always get chance to eat at work so I thought I‚Äôd order breakfast when I got in. My phone was on silent due to just getting in from work so I didn‚Äôt notice that the driver had tried calling me. Which to be honest is my fault but he rang the doorbell and by the time I got to the door in around 30 seconds he was gone so I contacted justeat saying that it‚Äôd said it‚Äôd be delivered when it hadn‚Äôt. They were extremely apologetic so I ordered the same food again as they said they‚Äôd investigate it and I should get a refund. In the meantime that number called again so I answered and he was asking where I was located and to come collect the food. He start complaining asking if I was sleeping which I said excuse me I just got in from working 12 hours I‚Äôm hungry and whatever and then he went on about how he ‚Äúwas waiting in his car for half a f***** hour‚Äù and that he has better things to do and he was trying to argue with me. I‚Äôve never had anyone talk to me like this and I‚Äôm sorry justeat but I won‚Äôt be ordering from you guys again also the food was cold because obviously he was sat in his car for half an hour because he was a idiot.

Title: Ordered food last Friday
Review: Ordered food last Friday, total balls up and not had a response to my 25 emails, twitter and facebook complaints. NEVER USE THIS COMPANY, give the money to charity as you may never see it again

Title: I had an Horrible painful experience‚Ä¶
Review: I had an Horrible painful experience last night . We ordered pizza from local pizza shop after working 13hrs in Care. Driver was very abusive and vulgar because he couldn‚Äôt find my address in time. üòü

Title: Using Justeat less often since other‚Ä¶
Review: Using Justeat less often since other companies have expanded to my area, as the others offer a greater selection of daytime deliveries, which due to working from home is become more the norm

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service! It will not allow me to publish any negative feedback on website you cannot choose to publish with a sad face ONLY a happy one. I have been waiting to use a gift card since Boxing Day and have been in contact 4 times and promised that money will be added to my account. I cannot get through by phone just get fobbed off with an online chat WHO CANNOT help with the matter (so is very pointless) and told to wait 72 hours (for the fourth time) to receive a phone call. I am now 5 days into waiting for the phone call I was promised 72 hours from Saturday!

Title: OMG Such poor service i cannot believe‚Ä¶
Review: OMG Such poor service i cannot believe they still get customers i urge anyone who reads this to never use Just eat again. because if you don't receive your food you will never see your money again they will just claim they have delivered and this is after the 48hours has passed giving them time to investigate absolutely disgusting and you just cannot contact them by phone or email. or even get a refund when they have not delivered you food. you have all been warned

Title: Absolute shocking service I will not be ordering from just eat again!
Review: If I could give no stars I would the service is just unacceptable. I ordered from just eat and although on the app it said delivered I had not received my order from McDonalds so obviously it got delivered to someone else at the wrong address which is ridiculous and the people that took it are in the wrong to if they never even ordered it! So I called them and all they had to say was we will investigate within 48 hours they couldn‚Äôt even redeliver what I ordered as they are not ‚Äúauthorised‚Äù to do that I was like what are you kidding me?!! How they treat their customers is a bloody disgrace I will never ever be ordering from them again they shouldn‚Äôt get away with it! They shouldn‚Äôt even be still going they should be shut down for good!

Title: I wish I would have read the reviews‚Ä¶
Review: I wish I would have read the reviews before. There is no point paying for ads and fancy website if when I order, I get charged but don't get my food! The customer service is also a disgrace. I order food, it's not here yet it's marked as deliver. "Our investigation team will get back to you in the next 48hrs". They are impacting restaurants as well as customers when their drivers steal food or don't do their job properly. Not only there are no commercial gesture, but from what I gather in the reviews, I might not even be refunded!

Title: High rates for awful service they‚Ä¶
Review: High rates for awful service they provide. Wish there was a better alternative. These guys are using their market dominance to exploit businesses..

Title: As the manager of a takeaway I been‚Ä¶
Review: As the manager of a takeaway I been dealing with just eat nearly a month or two over an order pad, Have been trying to contact just eat but always the same answer. Email or partner centre. As if things weren't hard enough for hospitality in January I still have received my order pad. Honestly the worst customer service I have ever dealt with. Poor communication! Poor service! Poor ability to give me answers to the questions I ask, all just smoke and mirrors and no follow through with anything they have said to us. Loyal partner for nearly three years, and never missed any of there payments. They have cost me three weeks of normal trading and if it doesn't get sorted soon I will be forced to close doors.

Title: Complained about an order request a‚Ä¶
Review: Complained about an order request a refund was flat out refused i had to wait nearly 2 hours for my food when it finally came it was cold and had stuff missing messaged justeat who where no help at all won't be using them again

Title: Stole ¬£25 gift voucher went to use‚Ä¶
Review: Stole ¬£25 gift voucher went to use online but they said it‚Äôs been activated don‚Äôt trust them never buy a voucher plus they don‚Äôt do anything about food food quality they only care about the commission they receive end of cancelled my account use Uber eats

Title: If I could give less I would
Review: If I could give less I would. The most shocking lack of customer service. How they can still be trading is beyond me.The usual story from the reviews I have seen on here.I ordered food and waited. I got the notification to say that it had been delivered. It had not. I immediately rang and was told it would take 48 hours to investigate and that someone would get back to me with a resolution. That was on 16 January and despite repeated emails nobody has got back to me and no refund made. Looking at what else I can do to get my money back

Title: Scammers!! They won‚Äôt refund if ur order is cancelled.
Review: Scammers!!! They will take ur money and then refuse a refund after ur order is cancelled. There policy of refund on same day if cancelled 20 minutes after placed is fraud!!! They don‚Äôt follow there own policy 7 days and I‚Äôm still waiting for a refund on a cancelled order. All restaurants have been fab and can‚Äôt blame them for anything. Patrick at customer service just eat today (25/01/2021) I asked him if his company have a duty of care to there customers and his response and I quote ‚Äú yes we are supposed to‚Äù that response told me straight away that they are fraudsters and I won‚Äôt see a single penny back. Facebook is covered in this all over the uk scam scam scam that‚Äôs all I keep seeing about just eat!! Awful please stay well away from them DO NOT ORDER just went onto my last orders and they are now deleting any orders I have made this year from them. That‚Äôs how they investigate things!!

Title: do not use
Review: do not use - do not refund you when they f up your order. Worst customer service ever Been ignoring my emails.

Title: Charged but no food, challenges getting refunded. Awful customer service
Review: I'm a regular customer and have previously had issues in terms of them resolving sincere customer complaints. Last night I saw that the delivery driver with our order was 'nearby' for a good 20-25 minutes. I assumed they were lost but no one got in touch with me to ask for directions. I then rang just eat to try and make contact with the driver/restaurant. While on hold to just eat i had a missed call from a mobile - when i tried to return the call i was not able and they never rang again. The driver then marked the delivery as 'delivered' even though it had not been. The just eat employee on the phone ( i accept it was not her fault, simply following very poor customer policy) then told me that because it was marked 'delivered' they would need to investigate it which could take up to 48 hours. I asked if there were other options to speak to someone senior in the team - as I now had nothing delivered and was out the money - and was told i could escalate to their manager but that this would take up to 72 hours. Their customer service is horrendous - in spite of being a regular customer I can't rely on getting my money back on an occasion when I received no food. And there is no option to resolve quickly. I'm lucky to be in a position where I could afford to place a new order (this time via deliveroo) but I imagine it would have been awful if it happened to someone who couldn't afford to do so, until the refund had been processed. This is unacceptable. I will be moving to use deliveroo only and will be avoiding just eat.

Title: Evil Money Stealers
Review: Evil and needs to be shut down.Liars who steal moneyIf you have to use just eat choose to pay cash on delivery cos the people who deliver it are liarsThe franchises who use just eat are never going to believe you, the paying customer, if your order is NOT delivered.When you go through the headache of communicating with customer service they call you a liar.This has been the best thing to happen to us as we will now never eat takeaway junk food again and strongly urge others to take a stand against companies that use unqualified and untrustworthy workers who do not apply for a job and earn it on merit but merely say they'll do a shift

Title: Just a disgrace
Review: Just a disgrace. This company needs to be driven into the ground.

Title: Experience with Just Eat UK
Review: Just Eat is a joke. Unprofessional and they have poor customer service. THEY ALMOST ALWAYS HAVE ISSUES WITH THEIR DRIVERS and the customers suffer. Deliveroo always delivers.

Title: Just eat scam
Review: Criminals that have wormed their way into the fabrics of the food industry and now want the shirts off the restaurant owners backs, they run a haphazard service, food always arrives cold or with items missing and then they refuse to give you a refund or they compensate your purchase of bad food with the offer of more bad food.All of their customer service centres are based in 3rd world sweat shops probably ten year olds on 22p an hour.Just eat is a tyrant company that has taken advantage of a global pandemic and monopolised on the worlds bad eating habits in the process, advertising diabetes and heart disease to children on TV using gangster rappers like that will ensure the masses are fooled.My advice would be to go direct to the restaurants and cut these capitalist Criminal middle men out of the equation.BOYCOTT JUST EAT

Title: Never again!
Review: Never again!! Placed order for McDonald‚Äôs at 5.30pm at 6:20pm the update was saying that contact had been lost with driver. 7pm I contacted customer service who informed me my order had been delivered??? Is this company for real!?? So, they‚Äôll take your money but in order for you to get to speak to someone you‚Äôre on hold for an hour and THEN they want you to allow 48 to resolve it!??  Really?? I‚Äôve been on hold to speak to a supervisor for an hour!! Disgusting!!!

Title: Pity they don't have a NO STAR option
Review: Pity they don't have a NO STAR option,  2 hours and 40 minutes and stil no drier allocated for my McDonald's order ,eventually had to cancel the order and go hungry a I had to go to work . AVOIT at all costs .

Title: Ordered from mcdonald's Northmoor Road
Review: Ordered from mcdonald's Northmoor Road, through just eat and only some of my items turned up. Not happy as they would only put some of the money back and not the delivery money as. So in order to get the rest of my delivery would have to pay another delivery charge.... Will not be using just eat again

Title: Shocking service!
Review: Shocking service!! Ordered some breakfast from McDonald‚Äôs for everyone indoors never got a driver assigned after 1hour still no driver assigned?? McDonald weren‚Äôt picking phone up and nearly 2hours later had to cancel order and get refund - not impressed won‚Äôt be using again have deleted the app!! RUBBISH

Title: Awful experience with just eat
Review: Awful experience with just eat, my food was never delivered, they said it was even though I had been on the chat thing for three hours trying to get through I‚Äôve sent numerous messages and been told someone will call me and I‚Äôm still waiting. Worst customer service I have ever experienced and I want my money back! Will never use this app again.

Title: Missing items=delivery feeX2
Review: Order food, loads missing leaving people in the house with nothing. No way of getting the missing stuff redelivered for free. Now being charged delivery fee again to get the kids food I originally ordered.Never use again!

Title: My order arrived over and hour late and‚Ä¶
Review: My order arrived over an hour late and I was promised a refund by the restaurant. 4 weeks later and Just Eat refuse to help me and the restaurants still haven‚Äôt refunded me. Just Eat should take responsibility.

Title: I Ordered food which didn't turn up
Review: I Ordered food which didn't turn up, I then called just eat who refused to issue me a refund or compensation for food I haven't received. They kept putting the phone down on me when all I wanted was a simple email confirming their new so called policy where it takes 48 hours to look into my case. I then decided to repeatedly call them and refused to let them keep putting and cutting my phone calls . It took me losing my temper for them to issue me a refund and compensation. üò°üò°Won't be using them again first ever bad experience I've had with Just Eat in terms of refund refusal.Fraudulent company and made up polices to scam people

Title: Ordered three kids happy meals two adults meals
Review: Ordered three kids happy meals two adult big tasty meals and drinks..told order would be approximately 6 o‚Äôclock ..Order delivered a hour later at 7 o‚Äôclock by a young lad on a push bike üò° .. food was Luke warm ... wonder why when the McDonald‚Äôs is about a mile away from the property 3 busy main roads away ! Not the way to deal with business really is it ? One star is because the food finally got here ( my burger and chips went into the bin ) DISGUSTED that McDonald‚Äôs lotbridge drive Eastbourne allows deliveries by cyclists ...if close to the property yes but a mile or so..no!

Title: Paid for a meal
Review: Paid for a meal, showed as delivered even though 40 minutes later there was no delivery made. Contacted them and they wouldn't offer a refund or re-order. Food didn't come and all i wanted was my money back. Seems like a theft or a fraud or some sorts.Also will take 48 hours for someone to look into it. I use them all the time and this happens. It's disgusting, I feel like I've been robbed.

Title: Worst customer service ever
Review: Send wrong food by restaurant when flag that to just eat they reply are busy and I must call myself ..restaurant don't reply so I ask for money back for order..  just eat reply that my ask is rejected and can't help me anymore... crap customer service. Looks like they don't care about customers . Time to change supplier

Title: I ordered food which never came up
Review: I ordered food which never came up I called just eat they said to call the restaurant, then the restaurant said to  call just eat and then the restaurant was rude . And my food never came at all but the app says delivered I spent all day in the hospital with 2 hungry kids, this is UNACCEPTABLE!!!!

Title: Still waiting 3 hours for kfc for‚Ä¶
Review: Still waiting 3 hours for kfc for driver who suppose to be around the cornerUpdate says delivered funny by the invisible man.as I'm still waiting.Updated never got my order in the end was refunded after a few days. Went to local kfc tried to help but not there issue.Any issues must be directly sorted with just eat.

Title: Refunded after poor restaurant service
Review: I had a problem with the delivery of my food (approximately 2 hours late) despite contacting the restaurant and Just Eat's helpline. Consequently we needed to refuse the food delivery and raise a complaint with Just Eat. The company investigated and refunded our order in full. So, not great that the food order wasn't fulfilled, but all credit to Just Eat for refunding.

Title: My food never turned up and after‚Ä¶
Review: My food never turned up and after contacting just eat they sent me an email saying that the food place said it was delivered so case closed!! Then when I contacted them again saying this was wrong they said they can‚Äôt help as it has to be resolved within 72 hours of the order!  Do not use.

Title: Beware - Shady practices
Review: Generally: Such a shame Just Eat took over from Hungryhouse and not the other way around: They take no responsibility when things go wrong and are extremely stingy with incentives.Avoid: Most recent orders were late and cold. Tonight: they didn't even bother delivering at all, after waiting over an hour. They immorally marked my order on their system as delivered and refused to refund me. They seem to be getting away with claiming they have delivered without having to prove it, and shamelessly pocketing the money as they don't have a proper complaints system and are nerver held accountable. Most people would not use JustEat if they were aware of their practices and clandestine refund policy( which is to not issue one) when things go wrong.Trading standards needs to step in.Update: Very shady indeed - removed my review from website and left only one star rating, so a deliberate attempt to censor.

Title: Justeat its justlies I order food never‚Ä¶
Review: Justeat its justlies I order food never arrived they put me on hold for  over an hour never got a refund never got to speak to anyone what a waste of ¬£16 I hope you guys get bankrupt üëåüèæthat‚Äôs my order 1130293905 I am still waiting for my refund

Title: Non Deliverance
Review: When things go well then fine. When things go wrong, then is the measure of a good food provider or delivery.I ordered a delivery via Just Eat from Mr Cod, Shinfield, Reading in good time with over an hour in advance. At the delivery time nothing came. Status¬†on Just Eat tracking the order kept saying "waiting for update". Live information promised on Just Eat was non existent¬†so absolutely rubbish, (Deliveroo is better¬†on this!). Called Mr Cod nobody picking the phone and then I was just cut off. Called Just Eat waited, waited and waited - spoke to someone then the call cut so got nowhere! It was the lack of updating which was bad, if problems had arisen, being kept informed would have managed expectations and empty stomachs. Neither Just Eat nor Mr Cod did that. And I saw that on the¬†Just Eat website it was possible to still order from Mr Cod; they were stating delivery in 20 minutes!!!!¬†The order arrived unacceptably late! It was lukewarm, tasted like it might have been good if hot, but the¬†meal was not successful, so waste of money. I will use other delivery people as my first choice from now on.

Title: Careless Drivers & Cold Food
Review: Sick of all the cold food that we get. The latest the driver sat outside in his TAXI for a full 3 minutes on his phone, then brought the food to the door. He damaged the drinks bag and spilt half the coke on the floor and over my carpet, and laughed, saying it‚Äôs McDonalds fault... Full refund, but now I have a stained carpet - who‚Äôs paying for that???

Title: Disgusting. Never use
Review: Disgusting. Cancelled my order still charged and i had to wait 40 minutes to talk to someone then had to answer the door at 10pm for an order made at 7.45! Furious

Title: My husband ordered food at 6.30
Review: My husband ordered food at 6.30. at 8:20 it stated it had been delivered. Lucky we have camaras around the house. It was not delivered. I called customer service waiting 30 mins to be told

Title: I‚Äôd put 0 stars but there‚Äôs no option
Review: I‚Äôd put 0 stars but there‚Äôs no option! Ordered KFC 18:06 estimated delivery time 18:32 never came left it a bit longer app updated drivers collected food and is on the way this was at 19:07 we live literally 5 minutes away still not here an it is 20:45 My kids have been waiting for they‚Äôre tea for almost 2 hours now Iv had to cook something !! And cannot get in touch with either just eat or KFC east Prescott road

Title: STAY AWAY.
Review: #1129118575 I ordered from Greggs, got a call (no one pressed my buzzer) to come and collect my food from a number based in Aberdeen (01224068156) while I'm based in London. Opened the door and no one was there. I kept calling the number but am constantly cut off. From the reviews here this is a regular grift by Just Eat. Like others I have been told to wait 48hrs but I know they'll say I'm a liar. Feel really, really stupid, pissed off and broke as f.

Title: Terrible company
Review: Terrible company? No customer service numbers or email. Tried searching on google just took me in circles. Was promised a ¬£50's voucher by just eat, and no it wasnt a scam it was legit but have not received the gift voucher or heard from them since last year october! They dont even have a complaints team!?

Title: scammers called today from their number‚Ä¶
Review: scammers called today from their number and asking for details!

Title: Can‚Äôt they contact the drivers??
Review: Ordered 2 orders one came perfect live the company it came from, second order never showed even though they said it had been delivered, obviously they gave it to the wrong house as the driver was coming down our street, contacted them and as everyone else has experienced, 48 hour wait with no food or compensation, awful, won‚Äôt be ordering from them again, we had to order another praying that that would turn up

Title: When i ordered food the delivery driver‚Ä¶
Review: When i ordered food the delivery driver got lost even though it's only 0.5 miles away. I tried to contact Just eat to ask for a refund as the food took 50 mins to arrive and was cold. I've been ignored and after reading some posts it looks like i've got no chance of a refund.I've deleted the app and will never use "JUST EAT" again.

Title: Just Eat Passing the Buck
Review: Ordered McDonalds at their Surbiton branch through Just Eat.The order arrived and only had half the quantity. Wrote to McDonalds customer service and told as it was ordered through their delivery partner and therefore had to take up the complaint with Just Eat.I have been pushed from one company to the other with blame and evading responsibility.Been forced to resort to writing a review.Just Eat response today:I hope you understand that Just Eat is just a platform for you to place orders and we don't have any involvement when it comes to preparing and delivering your food. You are however able to discuss this directly with the takeaway to seek you desired resolution.Not good enough! Be careful ordering through Just Eat and McDonalds as you get no resolution.

Title: my daughter ordered from just Eat
Review: my daughter ordered from just Eatorder number Order no. 1127231097 .my order was not delivered , my daughters app said that the ordered had been delivered , we rang just eat to complain that our food had not been delivered , they said that they would have to investegate and it would take 72 hours, we ask them to escolate this case, because that was unacceptable , you have taken my money , and we have no food. AND CAN SOMEBODY PLEASE TELL ME, WHY ARE YOU UNABLE TO CONTACT THE DELIVERY DRIVER!!!! you can build an app that can take orders from thousands of restaurants, but your unable to get in contact with your delivery drivers, this seems all to convenient if you ask me. and please do not print one of your copy and paste apologies , i want some one to take ACTION, and issue my refund. WE WILL NOT BE USEING THIS PLATFORM AGAIN , SHOCKING CUSTOMER SERVICE

Title: NEVER using JustEat again
Review: Ordered on the 7th December, never received the order as the driver "couldn't find my house" even though I'd ordered several times before. I've been trying to get a refund every couple of days since then, and I've just been told now January 20th that I will not be receiving a refund because I didn't advise them soon enough (I literally rang them as soon as the delivery driver said he wasn't delivering my order). I will NEVER use JustEat again. Just stick to UberEats or Deliveroo, never had problems with them this big.

Title: Never again...
Review: I ordered a meal through Subway with Just Eat. Delivery did not happen. The driver went offline so they couldn't be tracked. Went through to Just Eat and all I got was we will do a 48 hour investigation. How does that help when you want your food?! I will never order through Just Eat again...

Title: I can't imagine this company lasting too much longer
Review: I can't imagine this company lasting too much longer. Really poor. Placed an order, restaurant had it ready within about 20 minutes but the app seemed confused about when it would arrive so I phone the restaurant, who contacted Just Eat and then told me that Just Eat couldn't find a driver for this delivery and that they were working on it. Fast forward to 70 min after I placed the order, they then updated my that they still couldn't find a driver, so I cancelled the order via the Just Eat chat. In a situation like this, one would expect a company to do more than refund the money for the food and services not received, but to compensate the customer for lost time, a failed experience and a hungry family. Not the case with Just Eat - no customer service whatsoever really. Will never order through them again.

Title: I made an order on Sunday at about 7pm‚Ä¶
Review: I made an order on Sunday at about 7pm no updates nothing then all of a sudden the screen said delivered at 7.09pm which it wasn't as it didn't turn up. I rang just eat and all they told me is that they will Investigate it within 48 hours which was no help to me as I had kids to feed and they refused to give me credit or refund. My partner then drove to the McDonald's I ordered from to find the food was still sitting waiting at 8pm and the manager said he is getting phone calls every 10mins with complaints and drivers not turning up. This company is a rip off take the money and not give a rats... I RECOMMEND UBER BRILLIANT SERVICE QUICK AND EFFICIENT

Title: Ordered a Macdonalds at 6.45 tonight
Review: Ordered a Macdonalds at 6.45 tonight. Was told on screen it would be delivered at 7.02pm....but it was not. At 7.20 it was marked on site as DELIVERED, but definately not delivered here !!!  I think maybe the driver ate it himself....Rang the company and had to speak to a robot online, who told me they would investigate....I would hear in 48 hours....Well they can stuff it...Uber Eat we shall be back.

Title: Zero stars if I could second time‚Ä¶
Review: Zero stars if I could second time ordering an Sam problem delivery taken over two hours food cold an they will not refund you you will just have to wait for the cold food üç≤ avoid it order from Uber or deliveroo

Title: Just Eat, bad service and they don't care
Review: I placed an order from Just Eat last week and the food was delivered but one of the item was wrong in portion. I paid for larger portion but only obtained a small size. I raised a issue on Justeat and asked for a refund, after waited for a week for a response from Justeat, today I received an email from justeat saying that they can't offer any money back. There's nothing further they can do at this time. So if anything went wrong with our orders 'there's NOTHING they can do!!!!'. What a rubbish service from Justeat!!! what's the point of paying service charge every time we made an order! They just don't care, Don't use justeat any more.

Title: This company are a total rip off!!
Review: This company are a total rip off!!! They don't deliver food and when you phone to complain they say they'll refund you within 15- 20 minutes lying b.....ds no refund and took the money from my bank! ¬£24.42 lighter from my bank but how many more have they done this too? They are raking it in without giving people the goods ... try and ring them to complain and you constantly get cut off!!

Title: Totally annoyed!!
Review: Totally annoyed!!! We ordered from a place we love but my meal was not in the package when the food arrived. This is the 3rd or 4th time they have delivered an order with missing items.. I tried to get some help but it was absolutely impossible. First spoke to a bot and was transferred from site to site. Could not find a human to speak to at all and it was severely frustrating. Wasted a couple of hours of my life trying to find out what happened to my meal. Have ordered from Just Eat a few times in the past before but will never do so again! Will definitely not be recommending them to anyone. Will rather use another delivery service in the future unless this issue is rectified as soon as possible.

Title: Never came
Review: Waited 2 hours, the driver left out about an hour in and then disappeared off the tracking. i called the restaurant and they said he had been sent out.i then contacted just eat, she couldnt help me just told me i got to wait 48hours. thats me ¬£28 quid down and no food.

Title: Just Eat ripped me off as well
Review: I'll join the chorus here. Last Thursday (14/01/21) I ordered from Preston Greggs via Just Eat, the order was marked delivered 30 minutes later but hadn't arrived. Contacted Just Eat and they 'investigated', to tell me the order had been delivered so tough. Currently pursuing a credit card chargeback.

Title: Your money is not safe
