Review: Second time my food didn‚Äôt arrive. This time it hadn‚Äôt even been picked up from the restaurant. Just Eat was adamant that it was delivered. The restaurant also said Just East has been a shambles. I had to collect the food myself. Still no refund. Will never use again_______Just Eat response: Having investigated this and spoken to the relevant parties, it appears that you order was in fact delivered. In which case, this will require no further action‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThey obviously haven‚Äôt spoken to the restaurant and the customer. The two main parties. I‚Äôve even got CCTV showing that nothing was delivered. Absolutely shameful. Exact response I got when this happened a few months ago. Use at your own risk... this company isn‚Äôt fit for purpose

Title: Use my order from a well known local‚Ä¶
Review: Use my order from a well known local burger restaurant... they were running late and I had to wait quite a long while for my order to be given to the driver who by then must have got fed up with waiting cuz after it said my food was in the way the driver turned their signal off on google maps and ran off with my food order !!! It never arrived !!! Not much help from just eat customer service!!! 48 hours to be investigated and no guarantee of a refund !!! What absolute tosh !!! Won‚Äôt be using again .Hope u enjoyed ur free meal just eat driver !

Title: Food put as delivered
Review: Food put as delivered, restaurant confirm driver didn't turn up my food was still there, still no option for a refund.....never again just eat are complete parasites.

Title: No food, no refund, no customer service
Review: After an hour and 20 minutes of waiting we received a message to say our food has been delivered, as it wasn't delivered we applied for a refund, we get told the driver has confirmed the delivery and has delivered the food so they can't process the refund. This is our second order in a row with a problem, first we got charged for part of our order that never arrived and now we're being charged for food that hasn't arrived at all. The fact that just eat drivers can just say that the order has been delivered and then take your food is the easiest scam I've ever seen. Just eat does nothing to prove if you're right or wrong they just say they'll investigate for 48 hours. Now I'm sorry but we got told that over a month ago too and we still haven't been refunded for a previous order and now this happens and our entire order isn't here but our money is in their pockets and our food is probably eaten by the driver. Don't get me wrong ive had deliveries that have gone right, however it shouldn't be a risk reward scenario of whether you'll get food or you'll get charged and the driver gets your food. Absolutely disgraceful. The customer service even has the cheek to ask how your service was after effectively scamming people. Do not use just eat! The risk outweighs the reward every time!

Title: This company is a disgrace..
Review: This company is a disgrace... ordered food at 4.50pm, waited and waited for them to assign a driver... an hour passed, I tried to cancel. The website said I couldn‚Äôt. Next thing an alert comes through to say it‚Äôs been delivered.... It hadn‚Äôt!!! Tried and tried to get through to customer service... no chance...THREE HOURS LATER... I get an alert to say my food is on the way!!! The courier was really understanding and said he would try and contact Just Eat. I tried again today through online chat explaining all the above, to which the first question I was asked was if I can confirm the food was cold?..... seriously?!!!! Anyway... the person on the other end said as a gesture of goodwill they would credit my account with ¬£20.... my order was over ¬£25!!!Apparently they can‚Äôt refund to your bank and when I requested to speak with a supervisor, there were none available and was told that they would just say the same!!!!To say I am furious is an understatement!!!! Just Eat is a rip off with no respect for their customers. Pathetic. Do not use this company.

Title: Crooked delivery drivers
Review: So I ordered a burger and some chicken and a happy meal for my daughter after 40 mins no delivery, contacted just eats, said it had been delivered!! Which clearly hadn't happened or why would I contact them, obviously crooked delivery drivers who turn there in car GPS off, very dodgy indeed, just eats say they are investigating, in the mean time I have to wait 48 hrs for a decision, what a joke, feel totally robbed, I am furious, it was only ¬£16 but to be robbed so easily is unbelievable, I will never order from them again, oh and live chat cut me off to add insult to injury, had to make us beans and toast in the enx, single parent with a small budget, not working because of virus situation, very limited funds this was a treat for us, more like a disaster

Title: delivery driver, he says 'YOUR FOOD IS IN THE DUSTBIN'
Review: Ordered food from a restaurant who use Just eat delivery drivers. The restaurant took an hour to make and driver took another hour to deliver. My phone i ordered from was switched off, so i called the restaurant as i placed the order and gave my alternate number to call just incase. No calls, no updates, after 2 hours tried calling the delivery driver, he says 'YOUR FOOD IS IN THE DUSTBIN'. Called Just eat to complain, they say cant do nothing & we will refund 50% ONLY. For keeping me starving for more than 2 hours now and throwing my online paid food in the DUSTBIN and for unknown reason for charging 50% when i didn't even get to smell the food. Just eat is a complete bogus, thieves and that Driver who threw the food in the Dustbin, may god teach you a lesson for every grain that you threw there.

Title: I refuse to use these people again-‚Ä¶
Review: I refuse to use these people again- have had about 3 bad experiences, one time waiting for 2 hours, only for our food to be delivered to someone else , so i had to go to the restaurant to pick up a replacement. By which point i was livid. The time for a delivery is usually ridiculous as well, an hour if you are lucky to wait for the delivery. If i could give less than one star i would

Title: 0 STARS charged but nothing
Review: 0 STARS My order was supposed to arrive 21:40 (Ref: 1096411275). At 21:56 I asked the restaurant and got told to wait another 10 min, the driver is on his way (the restaurant is opposite my house, so I can see when he would crawl to my door taking 10 min). At 22:17 called again and they told me they don¬¥t know where the driver is but the restaurant is closed now and please contact Just Eat (40 min waited). Called Just Eat to get bots for every fxxxxx things even though when saying "to connect you with someone press 4". Tried different options, no chance to get a human or any living noise (thanks for charging phone costs for that rubbish). NOT ONLY CHARGING A  SERVICE CHARGE (they not cooking the food) for choosing orders (not stated online until you pay and should be optional in UK), now even for calls which leads nowhere. Great one. So I tried the chat (place 89 in the queue). Lovely!!! 20 min later speaking to "Kem" looking into everything to tell me he/ she can not do anything and has to raise it. I will get a confirmation of that conversation after ending the chat (nothing moved in my inbox for 20 min). WOW evening for JE but me. BUT I get the emails to write a review. Not enough time wasted for an order which was supposed to arrive 1,5 hours ago. Not enough stress in fxxxxx Covid times. (thumps up Just Eat)FIND OUT WHO THE DRIVER IS WHO ATE MY FOOD AND CHARGE HIM.

Title: Not delivered but reported as delivered!
Review: I ordered Mcdonalds. The driver reported as delivered even though it was not! He rang the bell, I let him in the building and then he disappeared!!! The food was already 2 hours late, the restaurant never picks up the phone and the helpline(after waiting for 20 minutes on the line) tells me that investigation team will help me within 48 hours! You are a food service what help would I get after 48 hours?! Thanks for ruining my evening!!!!!!!!

Title: Appalling customer service
Review: Appalling customer service. Took over an hour to get a refund for an item that was missing from my order. Tried to tell me that they could only do an account credit as a refund, until I pointed out that I had only used them twice in 2 years and wasn't going to use them ever again. Eventually got my refund agreed to Paypal, but it shouldn't have taken an hour on their chat

Title: Shocking customer service
Review: Shocking customer service, make a mistake and months later still not rectified. Ignore you on Twitter, rude on the phone. Be very cautious with this company. Still not resolved from end of September

Title: Company is an absolute joke‚Ä¶
Review: Company is an absolute joke chat service will only provide a refund to your just eat account and when you call them you can‚Äôt speak to anyone and when they say they elevate you dispute to a supervisor they don‚Äôt call you. All the drivers pick more then one order up and 9 time out of 10 your food turns up warm or cold and you can never get a refund. DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM

Title: We could ‚ÄòJUST EAT‚Äô if you‚Äôd actually deliver our food!!
Review: Absolutely terrible experiences with Just Eat. Still waiting on 2 refunds from orders that they claim to have been delivered! They are quick to take your money, not deliver your order or give you a refund! Do not order from this shambles of a company.

Title: BEWARE !!!  NO Food and No Refund
Review: Order a food delivery 27th November 2020 after 2 hours hadn't arrived.Restaurant called and hadn't received any order from Just eat!!Called Just eat and advised refund will be within 48 hours , Now 15Th December still waiting and been unable to contact Just Eat.Absolutely disgusting I am contacting Trading Standards.

Title: Scammers
Review: Scammers! Item was marked as delivered but it wasn't. Nobody turned up. Correct contact number and delivery instructions included. Nightmare to contact Justeat!

Title: Terrible company
Review: Terrible company! Terrible Customer service! Do not use them!!!! Ordered food which was not delivered and then Customer service just messed me around on the phone instead of helping, clearly wasting my time and doing nothing to resolve the issue. No food, no refund, no assistance. Will never use this company again and i advise everyone else to stay away also.

Title: If you get defrauded by JustEat (marked‚Ä¶
Review: If you get defrauded by JustEat (marked as delivered scam) then email TRADING STANDARDS. Search for your local office on Google.You can also contact ACTION FRAUD.I have been in contact with Trading Standards and they have opened an investigation. Please contact them also to build pressure.Thank you. Do not let JustEat thieve off any more innocent people.

Title: Two examples of terrible customer‚Ä¶
Review: Two examples of terrible customer service. 1st one order was over 2 hours late. Restaurant apologised and told me to apply for refund  Just eat refused to give me a refund as my order was too large( cost wise -  it was a birthday meal). I lodged complaint they promised to get back to me but didnt. I wrote a review and did not post any of the narrative only the stars which is really misleading.2nd complaint ..placed order with takeaway which had no delivery charge within 3 miles. However i was charged delivery. Contacted takeaway and was told to contact Just eat. Contacted Just eat and was told to contact takeaway. Again lodged a complaint..but no response. Appalling customer service.

Title: New scam
Review: Ordered a KFC meal from the Kingsway, Rochdale restaurant. The meal did not turn up and when I checked the APP is stated that the meal had been delivered. Tried to call the restaurant several times but no answer. I've called just eat 3 times now and spent over 2 hours in phone calls. They just keep on saying that they are investigating the delivery. It was over 1 week ago now and still no refund and no confirmation email that they are investigating even tho I've asked them 3 times. This company is an absolute nightmare to contact and resolve any issues with. I believe this is a new scam delivery drivers are doing because they know how difficult it is to follow up on such matters. I don't think I'll ever see that money again so be careful when ordering because if it goes wrong you won't get your money back.

Title: Complete Rip Off company, amounts to theft from decent hardworking people with no intention of contact or refunding money
Review: We didnt get a full order, the restaurant confirmed this via telephone but couldn't refund as it was Just Eat that was paid. Like nearly all people who have responded here their customer service is a disgrace it appears to be another call center abroad that is reading from script, dont understand the complaint just keeping on saying it will be recorded. It was agreed i was owed money but was offered credit which i dont want, they took my money i want money not credit as i have no intention on using Just Rip you Off ever again. I tried the call center but there is no option to speak to anyone all options go dead after listening to someone explain you need to use app to send a complaint, all this is when selecting customer section, they have no intention of speaking to customers directly only via live chat, which again is abroad and read from script and have no intention of dealing with customers other than go through motions. Ive learnt a costly lesson using this Just Eat non service and i am one of many that will be cancelling my account and requesting my data gets deleted from their account regardless of we keep you data on file for security purposes.

Title: Generally ok
Review: My food orders have always been complete, on odd occasions the delivery times have been much longer than the estimated time given, so the food arriving lukewarm, down to the restaurant I suppose. Never had a problem getting a refund either.

Title: Useless
Review: Useless. No help from them at all! Beware of coupon-refunds (personally I wouldn't use them again at all)

Title: Ordered food from Just Eat on Thursday
Review: Ordered food from Just Eat on Thursday, spent ¬£67.00 as a treat for the family. Tracked driver who then went offline. Rang the restaurant who said it‚Äôs not their fault and to contact Just-Eat. My complaint escalated to chat and today received an email to say they have investigated and that my order was delivered - NOT TRUE! So angry right now!! This is THEFT. I will be providing the police with my CCTV footage as proof my order was not delivered

Title: Food not delivered, no refund forthcoming!
Review: Ordered from Burger King via just eat and never received my order. I escalated through the chat and was told that they would get back to me within 48 hours, the reply I got back said that they investigated and the food WAS delivered. I‚Äôm now ¬£20 out of pocket, disgusting way to be treated! I‚Äôm also not the only customer that has had food go missing judging by the reviews, what‚Äôs the point in writing one of Just Eat won‚Äôt take your word for it?

Title: So unreliable and the customer service is absolutely ridiculous
Review: The most useless website I‚Äôve seen I ordered food which never came and I sent a report to just eat and they said they will investigate they emailed me the next day saying my food was delivered and that they spoke to the restaurant. I called the restaurant and they said that just eat didn‚Äôt give them the order and that he would prepare my meal and I refused and wanted a refund either the restaurant lied to just eat or just eat is just unreliable either way im really angry. I didn‚Äôt get anything and they took my money also and I can‚Äôt write anything to just eat or call them because apparently their ‚Äúinvestigation team‚Äù has investigated and apparently the food has been delivered even tho restaurant confirmed to me that it wasn‚Äôt even made

Title: Total waste of money, always get the orders mixed up and they just don't care. AVOID!!!
Review: I had an awful experience again this morning ordering breakfast from my local McDonald's. This is the second time this week I have received someone else's order! Mistakes happen which I do understand, but twice in the same week!? Have a word with yourselves!Today I ordered via JustEat but it was actually an UberEats driver who delivered it and it was someone else's (lukewarm) food. I managed to get in touch with JustEats but only via their online chat where they informed that I need to email their complaints department along with photographic proof of what I ordered versus what I actually received so that it can be investigated, with no guarantee of a refund no matter the outcome of their little "investigation".I hope to get a full refund as I was unable to eat the order I received but I don't have much hope reading all the bad reviews on here. I have a feeling that I will just be palmed off and told to contact McDonald's who will no doubt tell me to contact JustEats again. I just want my money back! I won't be using JustEats ever again to order my food and if I had only read on here first, to see how most of their reviews are negative then I never would have used them in the first place! I would advise everyone to avoid this company. They just don't care and now I'm ¬£15 down! Bunch of incompetent fools!!

Title: Rubbish
Review: Rubbish. If you ever have a complaint about an order don't bother contacting just eat. You'll get nowhere. Ordered nearly ¬£20 worth of food and received the wrong order worth about ¬£3.  Contacted the restaurant who said I had to go through just eat for a refund. Contacted just eat who sent an email to reply to with photographic evidence but not heard from them since.

Title: Order ref
Review: Order ref: 1091245178.Please anyone reading my review should pls feel free to contact me regarding Just Eat. The organisation Just Eat work in conjunction with criminals to defraud customer. They do it randomly by claiming your food has been delivered by the driver and that is not the case. I am looking to raise a petition and requires lots of volunteer to get my petition to the parliament to stop us from further been a victim of the so call Just Eat. Dont forget you can always ask your bank for a charge back if your food isnt delivered but keep a record or transcript of your phone call. Also be mindful the customer service is extremely poor so try to make sure you stay calm to get some sort of email respond if calling on the phone although i understand you might be fuming when they start claiming your food has been delivered but pls remain calm because you might need the email for your charge back with the bank.

Title: Justeat are not worth it.
Review: Justeat are crooks! It seems if you are a customer you cannot get through to Justeat by telephone. Their switchboard I have tried 7 times through different extensions and each time they disconnect. Did go through the restaurant extension twice easily but they didn't take my call. Justeat did not bother investigating a refund when a driver didn't show up with our delivery. The restaurant when chased were soo abusive I had to disconnect from them. Had to speak to Justeat via their chat bot as you cannot get through to customer services via phone? Spoke to a customer service advisor explaining no food came and the restaurant does not care. They refused the refund! No food and didn't bother helping us at all. My family and I will not be using them again. The only customers they care about are the restauranters.

Title: Vouchers - don't ever ever do it!
Review: Thinking it would be a great idea for people I wouldn't be having xmas event with, I bought vouchers as gifts for a bunch of colleagues - a process which was incredibly difficult. I sent one to myself as well, in order to see how easy it was. The answer - beyond difficult. I have had numerous emails with their customer service, but nothing they tell me to do works. It took forever to get the amount added to my account, then it wouldn't add the credit to my order despite me following instructions exactly. You actually have to order with your credit card and then trust that it magically apply the credit at the end! Well, it doesn't. You can't speak to them, and via email they have refused to refund my money, so I am now having to seek recourse through Barclaycard. Absolutely disgusted with these clowns - what they are doing in my case is basically fraud. I would avoid them at all costs. I will never use again.

Title: Cheats, rude, unhelpful
Review: Worst company. Their driver don't ensure that the order they are picking up is right. The contact centre executives are rude and don't have chat etiquette. When you ask for a refund they disconnect the chat. They are hell bent upon giving just eat credit. Ordered  3 times. All three times order was either missing something or totally wrong. Never going to use their services again. And incase just eat is reading this review then u can shove the ¬£2.90 credit up your.

Title: This is the most disgusting dishonest‚Ä¶
Review: This is the most disgusting dishonest delivery company. our food did not arrived and they say that they delivered the food so who recieved our food? we are so hungry and the children,  they said they will investigate in 48 hours I dont think they will give the refund, as I read some of the peoples reviews they have the same experience , please dont use this company they are a thieves, they will take your money.

Title: Awful
Review: Awful. Waiting an hour just for a driver. 2 hours for food. And it was FAST FOOD

Title: JUST GREED
Review: ATROCIOUSLY EXPENSIVE.. The delivery charges in my area all seem to have increased by 50p to ¬£1 per restaurant. So now I can be paying ¬£2.50 for a delivery. On top of the 50p processing charge, I‚Äôm not paying ¬£3 before I‚Äôve even chose something to eat. You can buy a decent meal from a supermarket for that. It got worse when I realised they also take a commission on top of that too. Businesses are there to make money. Just Eat are there to milk as much as possible. Not fair to the restaurants or the consumers.

Title: The most disgusting company i have ever‚Ä¶
Review: The most disgusting company i have ever encountered in my entire life...my food wasn't delivered but you took my money!I asked for your help online and gave you all the proof necessary...I have CCTV no one was at my door to deliver anything!Every time there is movement at my door or a car passes in front of my house i get notifications on my phone!!!How can you lie shamelessly?? Telling me maybe the address was wrong? I have the confirmation email with the delivery address!!! This is called theft!Stealing people's money and refuse to be responsible for your own mistakes? My phone number is in my details? To whom was my food delivered? Why no one called called me? And you are telling me that is going to take 48 hours until someone will look over my case and that no refunds can be made? Are you serious??Also I have looked on the tracking every second,I went outside to look at other houses maybe the driver misplaced my order..that is not the case..on my videos it showed no one was in the vicinity...funny how the delivery driver signal was lost at some point...and than it appeared delivered while I was looking on the window but no one was in front of my house!

Title: Terrible service delivery guy gave me‚Ä¶
Review: Terrible service delivery guy gave me the wrong folder someone else's sausages and and then customer services refused to refund me until a week later which was no used to me  I was left no option up to use uber eats which by the way I have never had a problem with

Title: Ordered food two hours ago kept saying‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered food two hours ago kept saying on its way, spoke to just eat who said it was on its way, then they said it had been returned to the shop no missvall no driver knocked nothing now I have to wait 48 hrs to decide if I can have a refund it seems like a regular occurrence too I won‚Äôt be ordering from just eat ever again

Title: Don‚Äôt order from Just Eat!!!
Review: I placed an order with Just Eat and guess what? Yes correct I didn‚Äôt receive it. Customer service told me that it has been delivered but that‚Äôs not what my account says. Even two hours later it says On it‚Äôs way. So I contacted customer service who say that they going to investigate to see whose at fault (the driver or the restaurant) if they find that no one‚Äôs at fault I doubt I‚Äôll be getting a refund. I have now got to wait 48 hour for them to do their investigation until I hear whether I‚Äôm getting a refund. The funny thing is that the drivers signal got lost during delivery (pretty suspicious when you think about it). Do not order from this company, I repeat do not order from them! Order from deliveroo or uber eats, I never get any problems from them.

Title: Avoid at all costs your order will go‚Ä¶
Review: Avoid at all costs your order will go missing, customer services is a joke they blame everyone else but themselves offered a partial refund for missing order will never use again.

Title: Drivers from JustEat have no logic whatsoever.
Review: Every time I order from JustEat there's always an issue with drivers finding my address. The drivers don't actually speak English and I can't give them directions. You shouldn't hire someone who doesn't speak English if they need to communicate with the customer. UberEats and Deliveroo have no trouble finding my address but somehow JustEat drivers cannot figure out that sometimes an address isn't always on the Main Street. I was supposed to get a refund on my past order but I guess JustEat just keeps the money from the food they don't deliver. Very disappointing.

Title: Awful Customer Service
Review: I'd tried to order from a couple of restaurants that had incorrect opening times. After ordering and receiving no response, I had to cancel the order. I decided I would do the right thing, and waited for around 5-10 minutes in a queue in order to notify customer support. It was a hassle just to get through to a human, but then even when I did, I was met with generic, copy and pasted responses to my concerns and questions. The customer service skills are non-existent, and this isn't an isolated incident. I have been a long-time customer of Just Eat, like many others, but enough is enough. Just Eat provide poor customer support and a poor website and ordering system, and when you bring up issues with customer support, they conveniently pin the blame on "independent restaurants", thinking they are unaccountable for the issues that plague their company. AVOID. Go local, and go direct to your local takeaway. This is the best way.

Title: Confusing payment instruction
Review: I have a ¬£20 on my account and just realised I can only pay with debit/credit card and not mobile wallet likes Paypal. The fine print does mention it is invalid via cash payment but Paypal? That is not cash! The instruction has to be clearer.

Title: Do not order with justeat!!!!!
Review: Do not order with justeat!!!!!! 2 hours wait no refund !!! Customers service lie to you!!!DELETE THIS APP

Title: Ordered food and it never arrived
Review: Ordered food and it never arrived. When I contacted them they told me the food was delivered and that they would give me a refund.. I still haven‚Äôt received it.

Title: Customer Service is diabolical
Review: This is purely focussed on Customer Service team. I've not been able to place an order as I keep gettin payment declined on my account. Despite I'm still able to use the same card for onlin shopping and at deliveroo/ubereats etc. Since my email ticket was raised on 13th October nothing has been resolved. My outstanding account credit that I still have available can't be used, neither will they refund me. I've completed all technical checks needed and contacted my bank with evidence, and they still won't accept there's an issue with my actual account and not my payment methods. No resolution, repeated advice and no intention to resolve any issues I'm experiencing. If it wasn't for the value of my  account credit, I'd stop trying. But, I need my money back that I'm entitled to.

Title: This company is garbage and deserves to‚Ä¶
Review: This company is garbage and deserves to go bankrupt

Title: No Customer service at all . Avoid
Review: Charge stupid prices for partners - Awful customers service - VERY expensive. A company of this size should be good at customer service but its none existent

Title: Never Using Again - AWFUL
Review: Doesn‚Äôt let me make payment with card (any card not just my own) & Customer service are generally slow to reply (rude & don‚Äôt read what you‚Äôre saying) and almost always have a bad experience. There‚Äôs either a problem with payment, or missing food, or cold food, or late delivery or a rude delivery driver. Can‚Äôt remember the last time I had an easy and nice food delivery. Using my remaining credit then deleting and not using justeat again.

Title: The worst customer experience I have‚Ä¶
Review: The worst customer experience I have ever had. Starting with the late and cold, half missing food order and ending with repeated attempts to get some sort of refund. Still not resolved! An absolute disaster!

Title: Literally awful
Review: Always late. Received ¬£5 compensation for an order that was over two hours late and never delivered. I‚Äôve just tried to use my credit and it‚Äôs taken them over an hour on the ‚Äòdriver assigned‚Äô notification. I am never using just eat again after this. I was not offered any help when hours of my time had been wasted hungry and instead had to then further wait to speak to customer service.I had to call them myself - or just eat would‚Äôve taken my hard earned money on food I paid for that never arrived. Look at your overall trust rating. Come on Just Eat, this is a joke.

Title: An absolute disgrace
Review: An absolute disgrace.  Ordered food via the app and it was delivered to an address I had previously used not the address I asked for and was confirmed. Have contacted the so called customer service team who say that as the food was Delivered the case is closed.  Sent them a screenshot of the order with the address they were supposed to deliver to but that has fallen on deaf ears.  Contacted my friend who‚Äôs address the food was supposedly delivered to and they said it wasn‚Äôt delivered there either.  Try to speak to someone.  Forget it. I have since contacted my bank for a refund as Just eat refuse to.  Your better off going and collecting the food yourself at least it will be warm and in one piece. They company should look at rebranding to make it more true to life. How about this ‚ÄúJust Awful‚Äù.

Title: Twice in 3 days I did not receive my‚Ä¶
Review: Twice in 3 days I did not receive my order they accepted. Just Eat getting worse everyday not using them again. You are finished you had your chance. And we don't need your poxy 5 pound credit keep it for yourself. COWBOYS

Title: Ridiculous concept of customer service
Review: I ordered food and had the order accepted an hour later my order was abruptly cancelled. I contacted the laughably named customer service via the chat with us button and all I got was apologies and an offer of ¬£5 . Do they not understand that it is not about the money. They then say mid way through the complaint, is there anything else I can help you with today?; like they've helped resolve the first issue. They do nothing and it seems have zero concept of customer service, everything is an excuse.

Title: Recieved an offer If ordered a takeaway‚Ä¶
Review: Recieved an offer If ordered a takeaway bye sunday I'd get 1 month now tv movies free for a month that's all it said ordered Saturday now told only 1rst 5000 nowhere did it say that shall be moving to a other site

Title: Just use uber eats
Review: An hour and a half over expected delivery, no tracking info on hold for nearly an hour to customer service.

Title: Very
Review: Very, very, very slow

Title: Just Don't Eat
Review: I have used this platform for a while, and as any other customer. I would leave a review about the service and the food. I had very nice deliveries and the abysmal ones. I would leave a review either ways, whether the service and the food were good, or not. On Saturday, I had one of the worst deliveries on the website, the food was literally not fit for humans, the items on top of it were tossed around like there was a tsunami. I left a review....that was a mistake. I did not know that Just-Eat CENSORS reviews for the advantage of the take away, and they alert them and give them the personal information of the customer. Not only that, the customer service representative has passed a copy of the chat to the restaurant  owner, who in turn. called me about the review. Tried to call Just eat for clarification, nothing but noise. Emailed their privacy team nothing, tried to chat to them on facebook, no response.

Title: Just Eat customer service joke!
Review: Just Eat customer service what a joke!! They are fine till you have a problem, then don‚Äôt expect food or help Restaurants advise using Deliveroo

Title: Delivery drivers stealing food
Review: Not receiving food deliveries seems to be a common practice with Just Eat. The drivers are stealing the food and marking as 'delivered' on their system when they are close to your property. I sent numerous emails after they said they wouldn't refund my money. I then contacted my bank as I used my debit card to purchase the order and submitted a transaction  dispute to say I didnt receive the goods. The money was refunded back to me in a couple of days.

Title: As per other reviews, poor in the extreme
Review: As per other reviews, order marked as delivered, but not to my house...!!! Still trying to get a refund. Terrible experience. Easy fix for them, implement a texted 4 digit code so the driver can check he's at the correct address. Never will use them again. will take to small claims court out of principle. DO NOT USE THEM

Title: DO NOT USE - they will steal your money
Review: Wish I could give this joke of a company zero stars. Placed my first order using the app for a lunch delivery - food never arrived, yet the app stated it had been delivered. Immediately contacted just eat using the chat function on the app to be told that they would need to investigate and will get back to me in 48 hours with the outcome. Terrible service and no apology given considering I was left without lunch for the day & had paid for a meal that never arrived. Have today received an email to state I will not be getting a refund as they state the item was delivered. This is absolutely ridiculous - if the item was delivered, it certainly WAS NOT DELIVERED TO THE PERSON WHO ORDERED IT!  Wish I had read the reviews before using this thieving company who clearly have no regard for customer service whatsoever. I feel robbed! Probably stealing from customers to pay for Snoop Dogg‚Äôs bill for the Tv commercials. Never using Just Eat ever again.

Title: THIEVES AND LIARS
Review: You have stolen my takeaway twice and my money twice once on my disabled sons birthday. I've rang u to get it sorted and you ignore me dont send an email the team it is passed onto is non existent its been months and where is my ¬£60 I want it back otherwise I'll start legal proceedings as I have photo evidence the driver went the wrong way and stole the food

Title: Liars
Review: Liars, said they delivered the food and did not. Wish I had read the reviews. Now it‚Äôs a fight to get the money back.

Title: Great customer service always get‚Ä¶
Review: Great customer service always get things sorted when drivers fail ro deliver items warm or on time not one case has unsolved their even better now their also offering value for money cheap service charge fee scrapped on ordera above ¬£10 they are hearing what customer wants love the coupons through the email 10% 25% your order yay!

Title: Whats happened Just Eat
Review: Whats happened Just Eat? You used to be good.Foods over an hour late and when we rung the restaurant they say they have cooked our food but JE have failed to provide a driver even though the app has been telling us the food is with the driver and its been on its way for the last 45min. Frankly I feel sorry for the restaurant.Well thats the last time we use this app.With hungry kids to feed we've given up and sorted something else. Not looking forward to the fight to get our money back if previous reviews are anything to go by.Appalling service

Title: DO NOT USE - WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY AND NOT CARE
Review: Same as everyone else is saying, if I could give zero stars I would.  Delivery arrived with completely the wrong order.  Contacted customer service who just trawled off scripted reply and said we would receive an email re an investigation (which we know from experience we will never receive).  Phoned restaurant who said as we ordered through JE would need to collect replacement ourselves!  So end result is, nobody ate tonight and we are now out of pocket.  Cheers JE.

Title: They take your money.......but that's it!
Review: Ordered food, watched the delivery driver supposedly reach the street on the tracker, didn't come near the building and then turned away (no phone call to say they couldn't find the place)! Rung the restaurant who said the food had gone out, delivery person hadn't returned or reported an issue. So no food delivered. Contacted JE who don't care, just gave a scripted apology and said as the liar driver had marked my order as complete, would only refund me 50%, even though they accepted I hadn't received a thing! Doubt I will ever see a penny back. Dreadful, conning company who take money from people then don't delivery the service. I will never use them again.

Title: DO NOT ORDER FROM JUST EAT
Review: IF I COULD GIVE WAY UNDER ZERO STARS I WOULD! Please do not order from this app! Like everyone else I ordered food and waited hours. My app stated the delivery driver was near by and then ‚Äòdelivered‚Äô when no one even came down our road! I have CCTV around my property and I triple checked to see if anyone came near our property! I even sent my husband up the road to see if the driver was lost! After trying multiple times and being on hold for 3 HOURS I finally get through to someone who said they can‚Äôt do anything and refuse to give me a refund until an investigation was done. NO INVESTIGATION EVER DONE. Just Eat take your money and never deliver food or a refund! DEEPLY UPSET.

Title: Still waiting for refund
Review: After waiting over a hour the food that came wasn't even my order so I sent it back to the restaurant, I contacted just eat to see if my order was being delivered still and they told me I had to cancel and re order, and I would be refunded for the first order. So I went to cancel my order in chat with just eat and they told me I would only get 50% of my money back because I was canceling my order that was being prepared!! I told him my so called order had already been delivered, which wasn't my order, and that I was told I had to cancel it in order to be able to re order and I'm not paying for food that I haven't had. He said he'd would check and came back to say I would get my full refund. That was on the 23rd of November, its supposed to take 7/10 days for a refund, today is the 5th of December and I still haven't had a refund, I've emailed 3 times now with no response, chatted on their app to be promised someone would call, which hasn't happened, I've used just eat for many years, not using them any more after this, which is the second time this has happend in the space of a month. If the option was no stars I would choose that.

Title: Don‚Äôt trust their delivery information
Review: Said they had collected my order and it was on its way, transpired they had cancelled the collection but kept in informing me it was about to be delivered. There system kept telling the driver was close and delivery was imminent. I eventually rang Resturant who told me the true story. Collected the food myself. Took over an hour on their system to register a complaint. I would be never trust their delivery app again after this experience!

Title: Please don't risk a just eat nightmare
Review: Numerous times it has arrived late, cold or not at all. Then spending an hour or so on hold and no apologies later you are told not only that your food hasn't arrived, but that you won't be refunded. Your case will be submitted to the investigation team and you might be contacted in the future with some offer of resolution. Told I could not be refunded more than a set amount despite receiving nothing. How much would you like to pay for nothing at all..... You'd have better luck asking a random bloke in the street to go get you some food from somewhere cash up front. Collect in person, Use deliveroo or better yet the restaurants own delivery service. Forget about this joke of a company and save yourself the money and stress of it all.

Title: Terrible service over 90 minutes late
Review: Terrible service over 90 minutes late. Don‚Äôt use. I‚Äôll never use just eat again

Title: Charged for a meal
Review: Charged for a meal , that never arrived, and nobody wants to do anything about it, so finished with just eat, it's just a matter of time, before it happens , so carry on using at your own peril

Title: WHERE IS MY F* ORDER
Review: WHERE IS MY F* ORDER ? NO WHERE ! I PAID 18¬£ TO EAT NOTHING AND THIS GUYS HABE THE GUT TO TELL ME THEY CANT REFUND THE FULL AMOUNT !! JUST 50%! THIS MUST BE A F* JOKE ! HORRIBLE SERVICE,HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE, HORRIBLE !

Title: Don't Use Them
Review: Made an order at 19:52 and checked the app the driver was no where near the restaurant and I kept changing so 40 minutes later my food arrived stone cold. I called customer service and had to jump 4 times from foreigner to foreigner, one who had a chicken cooing in the background, all of them said that they would only refund the hot items off my bill but not the drink or the delivery fee. I also kept asking to be put through to someone who was British but no joy. In the end they said they would send it off to be investigated and get back to me in 24 hours... let's hope they do this. This is the worst customer service I have ever received and It proves that the CEO of Just Eat is just a money grabbing a**hole.

Title: STAY AWAY FROM THESE PEOPLE
Review: What a HORRIBLE customer service EXPERIENCE, I wish I could give Zero stars. I placed an order from KFC coming to ¬£30 total. Order arrived and over HALF of the order including drinks was missing. The driver apologised and advised I contact the restaurant....no answer. I then contacted customer service only to be redirected to advisors based in The Philippines who couldn't care less. I was advised complaint would be raised and called back. Over 24hrs later and, no surprise, NO call back received. Just tried to call again, and again redirected to outsource in Philippines who claimed they were in the UK. Driven to madness and tears, the advisor started laughing and said that they would transfer me to a supervisor after I explicitly requested a manager. Then they contradicted themselves and said that they would have to arrange call back as unable to transfer. No complaints raised or escalated. DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE EVER.....

Title: JUST EAT PROFITEERING
Review: I am a courier with just eat. They make you wait in the restaurants for excessive amounts of time for the customers order. They should pay the couriers a waiting time fee but just eat always refuse and when it is raised they always reply by saying that the courier did not swipe correctly.So just eat get to keep all the reimbursement pay they charge the restaurants but refuse to pay this to the courier.When it is questioned and evidence is asked for as proof. The customer services then ignore you.Customers using just eat eat should know about the way just eat scam the money out of the restaurants that should goto couriers but instead hey keep themselves.This is a true review and I have taken screenshots of my chat with there customer services over a 2 hour period. As proof. I dont want them to say that it's not true.but now I have the evidence in there chat They cannot blame the system againBeware

Title: Awful customer service
Review: Awful customer service. Food doesn‚Äôt arrive, customer services say it‚Äôs delivered but they believed that I haven‚Äôt got it. Their ‚Äòresolution‚Äô was to investigate and contact me within 48 hours. I just wanted my food. Complete loss of faith, they refund me after this so called investigation with no explanation. Be careful ordering from them, completely useless

Title: I went from one star to 5 stars
Review: I went from one star to 5 stars.  Here we go, I placed an order for my sister at the time through justeat just to her been poorly.  She didn‚Äôt receive it. I had to deliver some food myself  Contacted their customer services which took 48 hours for them to resolve wasn‚Äôt happy at the time and got my refund so I thought that was it.  Since then as it‚Äôs been over a month They have apologised a countless of times and also credited me since then.  I understand mistakes can happen but I wasn‚Äôt expecting that.  I will order from justeat UK again.  These times we needs to support each other just reach out to those guys either on Twitter and social media.

Title: I‚Äôll never use Just Eat again
Review: I‚Äôll never use Just Eat again.  They apply the service charge to your bill AFTER you click to confirm the final price.  This is illegal.  I complained but received an incoherent response from someone without a grasp of basic English.  No apology or ownership of responsibility was include.  Avoid them.

Title: Disgraceful service.
Review: Disgraceful service.Will never be using Just Eat again.Pure robbery

Title: DISGUSTING CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review: I order my Mddonalds delivery through just eat 30.11.20.  Was told it would be delivered at 18.57.  At 19.15 I started to query where it was.  Tried the just eat live chat but was in a queue of over 400 people.  I tried calling the restaurant directly which was permanently engaged.  I tried cancelling my order online but told no as food prep may have started.  I then get an update saying order delivered at 18.57.  No food came.  I even walked all around the outside of my house to see if it had been left.  NOTHING!

Title: Shouldnt be allowed to exist as a company
Review: would give zero stars if I could. No food turned up, no tracking, no one is answering phone lines, no refund for undelivered order.No help or support, go use UberEats or Deliveroo instead.

Title: Still waiting after two hours
Review: Placed an order at 6.05pm. Awaiting a driver to be assigned. TWO HOURS later the system randomly updates to say order delivered. THIRTY minutes of trying to get through to an actual person and I‚Äôm still waiting. Beyond a joke, useless service, nobody has helped from JustEat and the place I ordered from can‚Äôt do anything about my order until JustEat assign a driver to it.

Title: Always have issues with orders being‚Ä¶
Review: Always have issues with orders being late. order supposed to be delivered in 10 mins.. took 1hr 45 before i got through to customer service for it to be cancelled.

Title: Useless Service
Review: I ordered from Just Eat, and after nearly 45 minutes of waiting for a driver to be assigned, i decided to contact them. The support agent said to wait a further 15 minutes and see if it arrives, in total the order was nearly an hour later than the delivery time at the time of order. This totally messed up my schedule for the day.

Title: So poor
Review: So poor. Firstly, it's infuriating that I had an order cancelled. And the compensation for deciding effectively taking someone's dinner away fron them is non existant. My wife and I work long hard hours and she cares for her mother. We finally got to sit down at the end of a long day and catch up and share a meal. Our McDonalds was prepared, a driver selected and after waiting half an hour on 2 mcdonalds meals from one mile away, it was reported as being cancelled with no explanation. Just like that. So now Just Eat had decided we were not eating tonight worse still I had to call your customer service line to find out why as if  I was not already owed an explanation. Not good enough. It was at this point it became evident your customers are not important. After failing to carry out the sole service you provide, cancelling 2 tired and hungry peoples dinner that night you could offer nothing but a refund. At that stage and that late in the evening a refund is about as helpful as a delivery company who can't deliver fast food less than 1 mile away in half an hour. To find out the reason for the cancellation only proved to incense further. How can it still be possible that a company of your size and time  in business make it possible, to order from a restaurant that has closed for the night? No warning. No prior checks made. Just a half hour wait and abrupt abandonment of duty of care and service to your customers. And all for my money back. Where does that leave me at 11.30pm on a sunday? Utterly useless. Not only will I not be using this service again but actively advising people steer clear. For a company  that is meant to make ordering food easier, you've proved the opposite and that the best way is go and get it yourself as you can't be trusted. Spend less on celebrity advertising and more on an app that won't let you order from a closed restaurant only to be refunded after an hour of waiting for food!

Title: Disgusting service
Review: Absolutely disgusted with the service. Waited 40 minutes for food for it to say it‚Äôs been delivered but nothing has turned up. Rang the take away and was told that apparently some delivery drivers are keeping food and saying it‚Äôs delivered. Contacted just eat, they won‚Äôt refund me, told me they will look into the issue. Basically spent ¬£25 on fresh air. Won‚Äôt be using them again.

Title: Placed an order and didn‚Äôt get my food
Review: Placed an order and didn‚Äôt get my food. Called the company they fulfilled the order just eat just didn‚Äôt deliver. They took my money and gave no food. Effectively stealing ¬£20!!! DO NOT USE!!!

Title: ABSOLUTELY VILE SERVICE
Review: This is the most disgusting service we have ever received EVER. After this happening before with no one even resolving the issue, yet again our food has not turned up, we have received no phone call so the driver hasn‚Äôt even bothered to access our address. We then spoke to customer services who continuously said it had been delivered. SO WHERE IS OUR FOOD!!! They didn‚Äôt refund us the first tome so I highly doubt they‚Äôll resolve the issue today however we will be taking this further as we are completely disgusted!

Title: BAD DO NOT USE JUST EAT
Review: BAD DO NOT USE JUST EAT.  Ordered from McDonald's wrong order arrived nothing gon there which was mine.  Driver had already left so I could not return items.  After spending an hour to speak with someone, to be told a refund must be investigated in the next 48hrs and no refund can be made until the team look into the issue.  THE ISSUE IS SIMPLE the customer has not recieved what I have ordered, you have failed to provide a service which I have paid for.  I am not a satisfied customer and want a full refund as a basic right of the customer.

Title: Do not use this company
Review: Do not use this company. Ordered Macdonalds to celebrate daughter passing her 11 plus.App said food delivered but no food. After an hour managed to speak to a human only to be told they will investigate and this will take 48 hours. Got email back to say the food had been delivered so won't refund. I have since found out food was delivered to wrong address (next road Down,)What ever you do don't install this app or use this company they are useless thieves

Title: I have ordered  from just eat and never‚Ä¶
Review: I have ordered  from just eat and never arrived. In my opinion they should be called just thieves!!!!! even comes up as delivered on my phone. Trying to get a refund is an absolute joke.  Never will I use this app again. Avoid at all costs!!

Title: McDonald's holderness rd are top off merchants and liars
Review: McDonald's holderness rd are loads too just eat say they delivered but didn't I tracked the driver and no food turned up so ordered again and paid again I am disabled so good way of getting food but this is disgusting I got email from company saying they had looked into it and McDonald's say they delivered I want driver number Tec and to ask who the he'll did he hand it too but am getting nowhere so trading standards next and McDonald's by the way dont pick up phone theiving b..... Taking people's money up front how many more get ripped off by this company

Title: Rubbish
Review: Made an order , said it was nearby then all of a sudden said delivered but it hasn't been.Spoke to customer service who basically said they couldn't do anything like contact driver etc. sounded like a robot responding to me not a person.Said they would investigate and let me know within 48 hours. Haven't recieved a confirmation of my enquiry or anything and they've taken the money. Really annoyed and won't be using them again

Title: Really bad
Review: Really bad, deleted app, ordered takeaway online, due to a not having a kitchen as new one going in. App said it would be here at 19:07 ( app said deliveredat this time and wasn‚Äôt )ordered at 6:20. Phoned restaurant twice and first time driver not arrived at 8pm then again at 8:45pm boxing up order as driver there. 9:10 still not arrived no answer at restaurant on the phone. Phoned just eat waited 35 minutes to speak to some who didn‚Äôt have all the details, so put me through on hold for someone else waited another 15 minutes. They still could give me an answer a part from its running late, ( really I told them that!) 3 hours later NO FOOD and the only way to get a refund was to cancel the order! Discussed will never use them again! By the way I‚Äôm up at 4am for work tomorrow.

Title: Missing take away
Review: I ordered a takeaway lastnight,on the just eat app and it said my order was on its way so I went to get my delivery and no one turned up so I rang the take away and they got the delivery driver to phone me.The delivery driver stated he had delivered the food and gave it to a random person with grey hair and a grey beard must have been santa-claus, after I stated there's no one that lives near me of that description and it certainly wasn't me he started to repeat well someone has took your order then. Never had an issue before with just eat but I wont be ordering anything from the app ever again. They have said they will give me a refund I highly doubt that after seeing other people's reviews.

Title: Just starve, just wait, you choose!
Review: Just eat, laughable at best, just starve, just wait or even just take my money and don't even bother to send me any food!!! seriously, if i order food direct from a restaurant at least they have the decency to give me a realistic ETA, just eat seem to think that changing the eta every 5 mins is acceptable. I, along with my family get hangry not hungry and when just eat stert to interfere with the schedule this is possibly the worst move they can make. I called them to cancel the order which was over an hour and a half late, they told me that i will be charged 50% of the order as the driver had already picked up the order, don't lie too, you're digging your own grave! Just eat should be shut down, trying to convince their customers that food is on the way when you can track it in real time!! last order they get from me and also 6 of my friends who also were waiting for food. Then try to offer ¬£5 off my next order, haha, what next order? Shove it! i'll stick to uber eats or deliveroo in the future you thieving clowns!!!

Title: Absolutely horrendous
Review: Absolutely horrendous. They are USELESS. I‚Äôm not a complainer but these guys are daylight robbers. The food. Once delivered. (70 minutes late) was delicious. All be it a bit cold. This is not a restaurant issue, the drivers don‚Äôt collect the food !!!!!!! They‚Äôre a joke. Online chat? 99th in the queue for over 15 mins. Really? Or you just cba to help?! Do not use. Deliveroo and Uber are much more helpful when things (inevitably) go wrong from time to time. Shocking.

Title: steer clear of just eat ive only ever‚Ä¶
Review: steer clear of just eat ive only ever ordered maccy ds from them always turned up cold but today I thought I would try a Chinese yeah that didn't work out at all food never turned up so I phoned them for them to tell me they will refund me in dollars EH! I lived in England ffs my advice is pick the food up yourself absolutely useless company

Title: The worst service
Review: So i waited a week for Justeat to get in contact with me to only have to call them and be told that Mcdonalds has confirmed an order delivered that I never recieved, Just eat are thieves and they need to do better, i have tried to call MCdonalds and they are not picking up, i am fuming, this is completley unacceptable and nobody is being held accountable for this theft of my money.

Title: Shameful service and unsafe food.
Review: My order arrived 20 minutes late, it was stone cold and the drinks were missing. When I asked for a refund I was told they don't have the facility to do that and that they would give my just eat account credit. I never got the credit.

Title: The worst service I have ever received.
Review: The worst service I have ever received. Rang customer service to complain food was 40 minutes late, again when an hour late and a third time when over 90 minutes. At this point we demanded a full refund AND the food which, at that point, had been marked as 'delivered' and then reset to be delivered at what would be 1 hour 50 minutes late. The woman on the phone cancelled the order despite us telling her not to. We spoke to the restaurant (KFC) who told us they'd prepared the food twice and nobody had collected it. To be fair, they were helpful, it's Just Eat that have been absolutely terrible. 1 star is too many.

Title: 7 days on
Review: 7 days on, never delivered, haven‚Äôt refunded yet. We have to chase with calls.

Title: Terrible customer service and unhelpful ‚Äúinvestigations‚Äù team
Review: Terrible customer service and an incompetent ‚Äúinvestigations team‚Äù.My order from McDonalds (I feel like a fool now reading all of these reviews) was undelivered, instead dropping the food on the opposite end of town, shown on the partner map, leaving me out of pocket twice because of the credit on my account because of the previous failed order from McDonald‚Äôs. The investigations team said the order was delivered (as they seem to say to everyone) despite the fact that it was not. I have asked for evidence and look forward to some kind of resolution. But I highly doubt I‚Äôll get any. Just use UberEats/Deliveroo, their customer service is great (I say that but I honestly don‚Äôt know I‚Äôve never had to use it unlike Just Eat) I regret not using them now, but the six free nuggets swayed me - like a fool.Prior to this order I waited two hours for a Maccies order which didn‚Äôt show. I was unable to cancel on the portal and legitimately had to spend two hours listening to their awful hold tone until I finally got through to someone who begrudgingly refunded my order and credited a fiver on my account, which was also lost.Just please use Deliveroo or UberEats, if it‚Äôs not in your region go old school and call. Don‚Äôt do it.

Title: I wish there was a zero star because‚Ä¶
Review: I wish there was a zero star because just eat doesn‚Äôt even deserve one star there customer service is terrible I complained about a food order and got given a voucher and was promised multiple times it got sent to me yet to find it wasn‚Äôt, 3 times I‚Äôve been told the voucher has been sent to my email address to then look and find it hasn‚Äôt and when I‚Äôve complained again they say there‚Äôs nothing they can do.

Title: day light robbers ..
Review: day light robbers ... ordered a kfc... the delivery driver from just eat brought the wrong order that was a Mc Donald's and he asked for it back and said he was going to kfc to get our order then be back .. but he never came back , then we had to go through the process of reporting it to just eat what was a person on the end of the phone with a written script she was reading of .. no help what so ever don't even go out there way when there in the wrong . she just told me to wait about 4 days for just eat to do a investigation. i just had an email from them saying they not going to refund my money i spent .. thanks to the dirty thieving driver I NEVER GOT MY MEAL AND NOT GETTING MY MONEY BACK ...... I'm on sick benefits what i don't get a lot of money and the kfc was a treat . ile never use just eat again and will advise friends and family to do same as just eat just take your money and give you no food !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! order no: 1073964442 .

Title: I used to use these a lot until i‚Ä¶
Review: I used to use these a lot until i realised if i phoned the takeaway up myself and order the exact same thing i get it for like ¬£11 instead of ¬£14/¬£15 which you could argue isn't "a lot" but what exactly am i paying these guys an extra ¬£3 or ¬£4 for exactly? and only time i rang them as takeaway we ordered from dropped off our order and forgot 2 bottle of big pepsi and drove off these guys said "Is it that much of a big deal?" like what..paid like ¬£4 just for drinks! they never made the place come back with the drinks either.

Title: WORST COMPANY IN THE WORLD
Review: worst company in the world, food was late, when it did arrive only 50% of the order was delivered, the restaurant admitted they forgot to send the entire order and advised we contact just eat to get a refund. Contacting just eat what a nightmare. Spoke to so many very rude people, promised call backs from manager to process refund, no phone call, kept me on hold for over an hour, still no refund. AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS.

Title: Everytime I pickup a menu if any of‚Ä¶
Review: Everytime I pickup a menu if any of these just eat in between companys are on I wont order I go directly to the shops menu why pay in between man for doing nothing.

Title: 1 STAR iS TOO HiGH !!!!!
Review: 1 STAR iS TOO HiGH !!!!!For a business they damage your online presence, justGreed more like - Horrible company - all talk is scripted & useless - that is - if - they understand english, they charge a high fee but do nothing to earn it, it's all take take take, they do NOT care about who they take money from - as long as they get their money they are the most expensive aswell !!!!!

Title: Really poor customer service
Review: Really poor customer service. Didn‚Äôt ring me when the promised. Wouldn‚Äôt issue me a refund, asked me to speak to the local council!!! I literally had to bombard them for an hour on the chat facility! The literally tried to fob me off at every stage. I refused to leave the chat until I received a call from the supervisor. I had to tell the online advisor to stay with me until the supervisor called me. Which he did, eventually, after my persistence, and ignoring the online advisors advise about hanging up and wait for the call. The supervisor rang and begrudgingly offered me a partial refund to my JustEat account. I refused and asked for a full refund to my bank account. I told him that I will NEVER order anything through JustEat again. I asked to make a complaint. Was advised that I will be contacted with the next few hours. Guess what? Still waiting! Save yourself the headache and order directly from the business. Much easier dealing with the business if you encounter problems.AVOID JustEat!!!

Title: Takeaway never arrived
Review: Takeaway never arrived. Contacted just eat, because the restaurant had despatched the order just eat said they couldn‚Äôt contact the driver. Then the takeaway got marked as delivered, which it clearly hadn‚Äôt been. Contacted just eat again, they said they would investigate and contact us in 24-48hours. Which is rubbish when you were expecting food that night. Just eat then contacted the next day to say the driver marked the food as delivered so it must have been and they won‚Äôt refund us. No food and out of pocket. Just eat believed the driver over their long standing customer. Won‚Äôt use them again.

Title: I never ever complain
Review: I never ever complain, however will make sure to do so now!!! ZERO STAR RATING!!! Absolute joke!!!!! 2 days in a row now I await patiently for my order, the driver marks the order as delivered, when it has not been delivered!!!! Call the help line and they are absolutely useless!!!!!! Telling me that they will log an investigation that will take 48 hours!!!! Well who is feeding me NOW???? What am I meant to eat NOW???? Absolutely unacceptable!!! Individuals in the call centre tell me they cannot offer any assistance or rectification or provide an immediate solution!! Absolute sham!! Drivers are stealing meals and marking them as delivered and I am paying for it!! Absolute joke!!! I will never use JustEat again, and no one else should!!! Find another ordering system!!

Title: Would of been zero if there was an‚Ä¶
Review: Would of been zero if there was an option. AVOID the wife ordered a kfc tonight and got told it will be with us with in 40 mins of ordering we waited over  half hr and kept checking the tracker app and still nothing and rang customer services to be told that the courier had to be cancelled so got given a refund after they tried to force us to have the money back in just eat credit will never be using them again

Title: No Delivery - No Credit - A Huge Shame
Review: I placed an order for my 7 year old son (happy meal from McDonalds. (Order# 1073078303) It was supposed to be delivered in 25 min. Got in chat with the Just Eat representative, first they claimed it is restaurant' s delay, then they said they will be providing a 5¬£ to my account. I told them that I used a guest account and they claimed that it would still apply and they issued it. Then they asked me whether if Id still prefer to wait for the order so I said yes. Everything is recorded in the chat with the representative. However I NEVER received the order nor the credit cause there is no way to use the credit without logging into an existing JustEat account. I' ve never had such an experience in my whole life.

Title: I don‚Äôt even know where to start
Review: I don‚Äôt even know where to start! Ordered my food, never arrived even though it says it was delivered. We find out that it was delivered to the wrong house, as the the person who received called up complaining of the wrong driver. Dealt with a useless call centre, who will MAYBE give a refund after a 48 hours investigation. Had many positives delivery‚Äôs with just eat but this just atrocious.

Title: They don‚Äôt deliver your food and then‚Ä¶
Review: They don‚Äôt deliver your food and then don‚Äôt provide a refund. Terrible customer service.

Title: WHAT AN ABSOLUTE JOKE!!!
Review: WHAT AN ABSOLUTE JOKE!!!! I ordered mcdonald's for my kids at 5.20pm, said it would be delivered at 5.53pm. 6.30pm no food, went onto "just eat" & was asked to contact the restaurant, I did this and the guy told me I have to go through "just eat". So after waiting an hr and 15mins online I was told I needed to be passed to someone else, BACK IN THE QUEUE AGAIN!! So I rang the customer service line... On hold for over an hour!!!! whilst waiting on hold apparently my order was "delivered at 5.53pm " I'm thinking "just eat" must employ the SAS because they very stealthy "delivered" it as no one turned up here at my door and its not on my doorstep..... Mmmmmm where could it be. I KNOW, IT WASN'T DELIVERED!!!!!!!!!! and after waiting on hold and online for in total 3 HOURS, I'm advised that because some robbing person decided he wanted my kids food and marked it as "delivered" I cannot get a refund and it will go to investigation üò° so onto uber eats and good was delivered no problem. Obviously its cost me double the amount for the same food, AND I have paid for someone to have a "meal on me" AND he's been paid for the privilege!!!!! AVOID JUST EAT AND USE UBER EATS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Title: Just eat customer service is absolutely‚Ä¶
Review: Just eat customer service is absolutely terrible. The worst customer service I have ever ever experienced. TIP: PAY WITH PAYPAL. I was waiting over a week for Just Eat to 'call me within 24 hours' to discuss getting a refund. I got fed up of waiting and talking to robots so I opened up a dispute through PayPal and got the refund in about 3 hours!

Title: Terrible service, order directly from your takeaway
Review: Terrible service from everyone involved. Ordered food that when arrived was inedible. Was literally directed to another website and the just eat representative ended the chat. I have used just eat multiple times but have never had to deal with an issue with them directly until now. This experience was just terrible and I can see why their competitors will be getting my business (and most people that have an issue) from now on.

Title: First and last time I will use Justeat
Review: First and last time I will use this company. Placed an order, all seemed okay, then driver just went offline. Food was an hour late at this point and I spent 25 mins trying to get through to someone in the customer service team. I was told my food would arrive in 5 mins, nothing. Managed to get through again on live chat, and order was cancelled and was supposedly refunded but Paypal refunds are automatic and I have had nothing come through yet. Wasted 3 hours of my evening sorting this out and now just eating a sad bowl of cereal..

Title: Avoid Just Eat - Multiple Fails
Review: Avoid Just Eat. The food does not arrive like they claim and they do not respond to phone calls or messages on social media. They do not refund your money. They are will waste your entire evening trying to 1. get your food 2. getting your money back. I gave them the benefit of the doubt the first couple of times this happened but this is the third time, so lesson learnt and will tell everybody else to avoid.

Title: ¬£19.99 for a pizza of disappointment
Review: Hahahhh....avoid this service at any point still you can...disgusting food at it best...service was 25mins earlier than it should, but we all know that is sometimes not on schedule....................this food however was topped a still frozen corns and have arrived 30 mins the stated time and was disgusting....won't push for a refund, though should ask for a charge on recycling as it had made its way to the bin.......paid ¬£20 close for rubbush.....avoid this service at all cost

Title: Rubbish service
Review: I would give a minus figure if I could, absolute rubbish!

Title: I wouldn‚Äôt even give them one star
Review: I wouldn‚Äôt even give them one star. They are money thief‚Äôs they have wasted 2 hours of my day they wouldn‚Äôt refund the delivery money so claimed to put it on a credit note which was an outright lie. I should be entitled to my money back instead of a credit where I would have to end up spending more money again. Every single order I ever had was cold or wrong. Staff don‚Äôt know how to resolve issues and simply don‚Äôt care.

Title: JustEat fail to put their customers first.
Review: I ordered a takeaway via their website two nights ago. The expected delivery time of 7.30 pm came and went. After 30 mins of waiting I contacted JustEat via their website and they then sent a text advising the delivery would now arrive around 8.10 or so. This time also passed. Delivery never arrived so I ended up ordering from another takeaway around 9pm which arrived promptly. I have taken this up with JustEat to request a refund only to today receive a blunt and what appears to be a copy and pasted email advising that the takeaway confirms they delivered it (yet have provided no evidence) therefore JustEat consider the case closed. This has really annoyed me as it makes me feel like they don't believe me?! I have used their website many a time over the years with no problem. I have asked to take this dispute further and I have also opened a dispute on PayPal. I won't be using JustEat again. Their customer service is abysmal.

Title: I have been using this ap before it got‚Ä¶
Review: I have been using this ap before it got popular and must have spent thousands on it over the last couple of decades but never been shown anything for my loyalty, I've since gone over to Ubereats, more expensive but at least they send me offers.

Title: Trashiest food ordering site
Review: Trashiest food ordering site, they host restaurants that will give you food poisoning and won‚Äôt give you refunds at all avoid order deliveroo instead

Title: Dispite years of being a customer 100%‚Ä¶
Review: Dispite years of being a customer 100% payments made justeat chose to believe an order i made was delivered which in Fact wasn't.  A dispute arose.  Justeat substantially dismissed my claim until i demanded my account closed.  Was then offered a refund plus 10 pounds as a carrot.  I refused both. All i want is my account closed and all DATA removed.  You've no idea how much hard work it is.  My advice is that justeat are more interested in profit rather than to trust customer history so DO NOT USE THEM .

Title: Trashy customer service... useless.
Review: The driver got stuck in the middle of nowhere on the way to my place and returned to the restaurant without even calling me in advance. I understood this was just the driver's fault, not Just Eat. As I couldn't contact the driver, I chatted with someone from JustEat. However, the customer service attendant suddenly ended the chat even though we hadn't sort it out yet and all he said was "Your food was returned to the restaurant, please call or email them by yourself." I did not even have the contact info of the restaurant and I was not even comaplining about the situation but just explaining what happened. I started a chat with another attendant and she offered me ¬£5.00 credit as compensation plus a full refund. I asked for the food instead of a refund but she said NO and had to re-order it once again by myself. Spend so much time and energy to sort this out and they treated me as someone who was just complaining about whatever beyond their responsibility... not fair at all. What they do is just give you some money/credit and make the customer silent, that's it. Useless.

Title: Just Eat Scammed and Lied to me - AVOID!
Review: Items missing, Food Cold false advertising. Collected as the restaurant shut and so could not return it. Contacted Just Eat straight away. Who said "because the restaurant has not fully processed the order we cannot help" 2 days later the order is completed by the restaurant on their system I contact Just Eat who state, "due to your not reporting a complaint within a 48 hour window we cannot help you. In this time I spoke to 3 Just Eat Reps who all understand the system and told me to get back in touch with Just Eat after the order had been processed. I was told by the first 2 reps I would get a refund as my Order was not up to scratch and if the restaurant had been open I would have returned it myself. It is now 72hour after the order and so Just Eat now say "Take it up with the restaurant". Just Eat are honestly Useless. Don't waste your money with them They have DISGUSTING Business practices and just mess you around. They allow the restaurants to wait 48hours before "Completing Orders" So they don't have to give refunds for awful food and poor service. I also have evidence of all of my communications with Just Eat and Photos.

Title: Our food didn‚Äôt arrive although the app‚Ä¶
Review: Our food didn‚Äôt arrive although the app said ‚ÄúDelivered‚Äù. Couldn‚Äôt get any sense from Just Eat that evening so picked up food ourselves from town. In the morning found it had been left on a neighbours doorstep. When I complained I was told their tracking device said it was delivered so they wouldn‚Äôt refund my money. Proper crooks with shocking customer service.

Title: If I could give these c*nts a -grade I‚Ä¶
Review: If I could give these c*nts a -grade I sure as hell would. Ordered from Greggs cardiff UK. Waiting for my order still its 8.33am and I placed the order at 7.30am thats peaking over an hour you jokers. Rang the poor resteraunt to ask what was going on for a lovely lady to come on the phone and explain there was 2 other orders like me waiting for a driver to be assigned to. ITS A JOKE. They get the backlash. The customers are NOT happy. And you walk away scotch free nah I don't f**king think so cu**s. I've rang you. The lady sounded like she was in China selling covid products rather than taking complains on behalf of just eat. Im fu***ng starving you nasty nasty company.  If you can't get drivers for your lovely customers SHUT IT DOWN BOO. Hope this was really useful for the people in the back shout out to UBER EATS THOOOO they always had me covered c**t.

Title: DON'T USE JUST EAT
Review: DON'T USE JUST EAT, FIRST & LAST TIME FOR MEI ordered from just eat Saturday night, food came an hour & a half late. All item extremely salty. I rang the restaurant who weren't bothered & told me to ring just eat, finally 35 mins after holding to speak to customer service at just eat I was told to wait 48hrs to open a complain. My partner & kids were hungry bearing in mind the time was 10pm by now, so I had to order from a different place. This left me ¬£80 out of pocket in one night. Just Eat customer service rang me 3 days later only to inform me they will not refund my money & just to write a review. Such scum bags, money scrouging company. They have no sympathy for their customers. PLEASE AVOID JUST EAT!!!!!!!

Title: DO NOT USE!
Review: I ordered though just eat for McDonald‚Äôs! It arrived half an hour later than said then for the hole order to be wrong like they got 2 deliveries the wrong way round not one thing that I ordered arrived I also couldn‚Äôt eat what was delivered because of allergies. This was Saturday morning, went on live chat straight away was told a supervisor would call me Saturday and heard nothing, had email to say would come back to be within 48 hrs and still nothing. All I wanted was what I had ordered to be delivered or a refund! DO NOT USE THEM!!!!!

Title: How JustEat managed to convince people‚Ä¶
Review: How JustEat managed to convince people to pay for a service that they were already getting for free, is beyond me. Maybe if they paid their delivery partners adequately then they wouldn‚Äôt be stealing their customer‚Äôs food. I was going to write a review on their service but it pretty much echoes the others

Title: Dear reader.. don‚Äôt use Just Eat
Review: Dear reader...  please use a direct method, or a service that is vastly better than Just Eat.  I‚Äôve had a good experience with Deliveroo.If only there was an option for zero stars...It was Saturday.  We felt resolute for some reason.
