Perhaps for many reasons but when I think back it‚Äôs most likely because a 2nd lockdown had been announced and we knew it would be a while until our next family treat.... our favourite meal, Indian take away üòÅ17:30 - order placed on Just Eat(Food ETA, 18:30 as per the app)Circa 18:15 - get the table set, prepare drinks...Circa 18:45 - everyone ready, no food yet... ‚Äúbe patient guys, it‚Äôs Saturday. They‚Äôll be busy tonight‚Äù...  thinking the food would arrive any second...18:50 - call the restaurant - engaged tone18:55 - call the restaurant - engaged tone19:00 - call the restaurant - engaged tone19:05 - call the restaurant - engaged toneHmmm ...Keep trying... 19:30 - food arrives!  Yes!!Let‚Äôs tuck in üò¨Only, the food is cold - we can‚Äôt eat this!19:40 - call the restaurant - engaged tone19:50 - call the restaurant - engaged tone20:00 - call the restaurant - engaged toneYou get the picture - literally 30 calls laterContact Just Eat and pain begins!I‚Äôm now 7 Just Eat chat sessions into this painShort versionI‚Äôve requested a refundJust Eat can‚Äôt issue a refund until the restaurant marks my order as ‚Äúcompleted‚Äù... Just Eat refuse to contact the restaurant to request that the order is complete.Meanwhile, the App shows the order as delivered at my end... triggered by the restaurant - they‚Äôve deliberately left the order incomplete at their end to avoid providing a refund because they know their service was awful.This loop of death means the restaurant can provide poor service without providing any recompense for dissatisfied customers.At peak times, they can continue taking orders, despite reaching their capacity, knowing full-well that their service will be compromised due to lack of resource and there‚Äôs no way for their customers to be refunded.Just Eat, change your process to empower your customers.  This will improve their service experience and ensure people return, making a sustainable model. Like Deliveroo - don‚Äôt spend millions on tv campaigns if you can‚Äôt back it up with good service experience...  Just Eat, if you‚Äôre reading this, my order number is 1061021859I have requested (twice) that a manager contacts me to resolve this issue...I‚Äôll start the clock now 23:07, 16th Nov 2020

Title: Bad customer service
Review: I was refused a refund back to my debit card as several items were missing from my order and the food I did receive was cold. I asked to speak to a manager as I wasn‚Äôt happy. It took 2 days for somebody to ring me and I was told exactly the same. I am now stuck with Just Eat account credit that I do not want!

Title: The Bull Pub in Tunbridge Wells.
Review: The Bull Pub in Tunbridge Wells.The roast dinner was advertised as half a chicken, cauliflower cheese,veg,roast potatoes, Yorkshire pudding and gravy.When it arrived, it was two chicken legs with veg, roast potatoes, gravy and 1Yorkshire,but no cauliflower cheese. So disappointed as cost ¬£14 with delivery.Will not be ordering again.

Title: Excellent, good selection of restaurants
Review: Have used Just Eat for many years, never had a single problem. Their online chat is useful if something does goes wrong like a delivery driver not finding the address etc, which has happend maybe 2 times out of hundreds of orders over the years.I was genuinely surprised to see the 1.2 star rating on here, the only place in the UK I have ever had an issue with is Uber Eats, whereas Just Eat, Deliveroo and Eatsy have all been great for years and years worth of ordering takeaway food.

Title: Joined the rest in the Just Eats‚Ä¶
Review: Joined the rest in the Just Eats scam... Restaurant was great - but Just eats took the money and a driver never showed up... they then marked the order as delivered... It stayed at the restaurant... we ate something else...

Title: Rubbish
Review: Ordered from Greggs. Watches the driver arrive and then drive off. Saw him on the map deliver to the wrong address. Unable to speak to anyone. Had to go via a bot chat only to be told will take up to 48 hours for an investigation to be completed before I receive a refund. still waiting.

Title: "Just Steal and Eat my food for me"
Review: Ordered a KFC through Just Eat or my new name for them....Just Eat my food for me please you thieving delivery driver!!Seems like a common issue here of drivers stealing the food and eating it. A 10 minute order from KFC took 60 minutes and disappeared. Signal, lost, driver lost, food lost but apparently it has been delivered.Credit card companies won't refund amounts under ¬£100 so there is a loophole here somewhere that Just Eat is covering up.However, I have had my money refunded by Just Eat after 5 days by using Revolver complaints. To be fair I did take screenshots of the "driver signal lost" as well as going to KFC myself to re-order the food that was stolen and sent the photos of the receipts from KFC (Cheaper and quicker!!).KFC staff told me when I went to re-order that this is happening a lot  - that the Just Eat delivery drivers are stealing the food and eating it themselves.Use Revolver and keep escalating is my tip....oh and don't use "Just Thief".

Title: Absolutely abysmal

I was cut off from a customer service chat because it went past midnight , I have been put on hold for ages to be told the cards have been delivered and activated (100% have not), on next call I was 20th in queue to finally be told gift cards will be there today (did NOT arrive), called them again (15th in queue) told a supervisor will call you back ..... Guess what!! I‚Äôm still waiting ... disgusting treatment ...gift cards were for a Christmas present for my teenage daughters.üò°ü§Øü§¨ ... I wouldn‚Äôt bother if I was you ......I WELCOME JUST EAT TO RESPOND TO THIS POST...

Title: Awful service

Wasted ¬£20 as the customer service isn‚Äôt even refunding, it is disgusting that especially in such times people cannot relay on food delivery services .Will not order ever again

Title: They need to be shut down I‚Äôve been‚Ä¶

Title: Anybody know who to contact at the BBC ‚Ä¶
Review: Anybody know who to contact at the BBC  for Rogue Traders program?Just Eat crooks need exposing to the general public asap they are scamming people out of money on non deliveries!!!TV advert for just eat should be taken off air immediately

Title: Awful experience please don't use

I called back and was informed their system shows food was delivered. This is unacceptable as clearly they have hired dishonest drivers . I will receive no refund . Please don't trust this company as it's fraudulent. Restaurant confirmed food was collected . I requested for the drivers number and they said no . It is the worse customer service and I plan to escalate this complaint as it's not fair to be taking customers money and not delivering the food. It's also the distress it causes is unnecessary.

This is unacceptable and as a disabled person a genuine loss of ¬£12, this would have been a treat. Now I go without due to driver incompetence. Will never trust Just eat again as this is  the second time.  UPDATED 27 11 20. I got my money back for the undelivered food. So I have given 1 extra star. Still not going to use them again though. Ubereats works better in my experience

Title: No food after over two hours because of‚Ä¶
Review: No food after over two hours because of driver not restaurant

Title: JustEat is the worst
Review: JustEat is the worst! Save your time and AVOID them at all cost! Worst experience ever!

Title: Ordered KFC from just eat to have it dropped on floor by driver
Review: Ordered KFC from just eat,which arrived late. The driver whilst getting the order from back of car dropped the meal on the floor spilling chicken all over the drive, he then scooped up the chicken with his hands and brought the meal to me at my door, I obviously refused the food and demanded my money back.That was Friday evening I contacted just eat who told me it was a problem for KFC to sort out I eventually got through to KFC who told me the driver works for Just eat and I ordered from just eat so I needed to speak to them.After several conversations with Just eat they agreed to credit my account with ¬£20 which did not even cover the cost of the meal I paid for, they told me they were not authorised to credit any more and basically this was all they could do, they then said they would investigate the drivers behaviour.Great that‚Äôs going to helpStay clear at all costs

Title: Do not use just eat.
Review: Do not use just eat.. Thay messed up my order from KFC got the wrong order which was no where near what we played for.. Culled then and women told me we get refunded and have email confirming it.. Did not get email. Had to contact them again to be told thay going to investigate and send proof which we have and told got to wait 48 hours for refund.. Terrible service.

Title: Worst customer service I have ever‚Ä¶
Review: Worst customer service I have ever experienced, better off ordering from deliveroo or Uber eats.Would give them minus stars if I could.It‚Äôs fine until u have a issue with your order don‚Äôt expect them to help you out....

Title: Thief Delivery People.
Review: I ordered a meal from McDonalds Hereford & the delivery driver half way to my property turned off his tracking and stole my meal. I contacted customer services but didn‚Äôt get much in the way of apology just told to wait for refund. I wish I had read the other reviews before ordering. Never had a problem with deliveroo so will never use just eat again. Thief delivery drivers.

Title: No refund for inedible food!
Review: Disappointed to not receive a refund from a restaurant through Just-Eat, due to inedible food. Thought you were supportive of the customer, but more so with the restaurant. Asked about number of customers that evening to all confirm the food tasted really bad. Going to now use another delivery portal from now on.

Title: I never received my food
Review: I never received my food. Was told I'll get a call back, next day I get a e mail saying that they confirmed with the restaurant it was delivered!Such a joke!

Title: Absolutely appalling ordered kfc
Review: Absolutely appalling ordered kfc, never arrived driver apparently delivered it but to who I don't know. Passed from pillow to post with just eat who offered a 50% refund. Why should I only get 50% when I never received. Thankfully I've got cctv and can prove the food was never brought to my property. I will never use just eat ever again!

Title: Food never arrived and I have contacted‚Ä¶
Review: Food never arrived and I have contacted the restaurant immediately who then advised me to call just eat.just eat passed it to the investigation team and after a week notified that the food was delivered and they will not refund it. Used them a lot, but Will never use them again and order from the restaurant directly next time. investigation took over a week and obviously it is very difficult to get any evidence directly from the restaurant now, would be so much more efficient to get this directly from the restaurant next time.

Title: Food never arrived
Review: Food never arrived. Kept telling us it was on the way. Customer services left the chat before dealing with me. Struggling to get my money back.Wont be using again.

Title: Without my money or my food, terrible customer service!
Review: Order was cancelled by restaurant and told that i would get a refund within ‚Äò7-10 days‚Äô that doesn‚Äôt help when I am down ¬£27 and without any food, why can‚Äôt they just keep the credit on the account and let me use my money at another restaurant, what if I was a single mother trying to feed my children and that was the last of my money, simply saying you can have a refund 7-10 days later isn‚Äôt good enough if I‚Äôm without food and now without money.Terrible customer service, still without my money or my food! You literally have one job!

Title: Wrong burger
Review: Don‚Äôt know how but they put a spicy fillet burger in a original fillet burger box.  Everything else was fine

Title: Shocking service ordered KFC when it‚Ä¶
Review: Shocking service ordered KFC when it arrives we discovered it wasn't our order tried to stop driver but could not contacted just eat and then bounced around departments trying to either get my food or money back  Rubbish companyRubbish service

Title: Shocking service
Review: Ordered from McDonald's, order late, so contacted customer services (joke of a title).Was told food had been delivered, even though it hadn't been, and their app stated out for delivery!Standard 48 hours for investigation, guaranteed we won't get a refund!¬£30 up the swanny.Trading standards will be informed

Title: I ordered from just eat for a‚Ä¶

They took my money but the driver must have got hungry on the way so had himself a little snack , shocking customer service from just eat. Is this what it‚Äôs come to being done over by another company that likes to take your money for a terrible service

Title: I ordered food from Tandoori knights‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered food from Tandoori knights colne, once again you smashed it with food & service nice and hot food , friendly delivery man, will be ordering again next week !!!!!!

Title: Just Eat stole my money and food
Review: Just Eat stole my money and food. Absolutely awful. Ordered food from KFC and it said that it arrived. No knock, no ring. I called them immediately and they told me that I have to wait for 48 hours. I will take this to the small claims court. This is THEFT

Title: Just Eat driver stole my family‚Äôs‚Ä¶
Review: Just Eat driver stole my family‚Äôs meals. I contacted Just Eat straight away to explain it had never been delivered and all they could do was pass it to the Investigation Team, that would come back to me in 48 hours. 4 days later, I‚Äôm still chasing daily for a response and my money. It was to feed a family of 4 so the money is quite a significant amount.They keep trying to ‚Äúfob me off‚Äù but I‚Äôm not going away.

Title: Missing Meal
Review: Ordered KFC via Just eat.  Order arrived missing 3 year olds meal. Contacted KFC and was advised that they where sorry for their mistake but could not deliver the missing meal but advised me that I could come to restaurant  to collect. Also advised if not collecting i would have to go through Just Eat for refund. By this time food that had been ordered was getting cold and then had to be shared out so the 3 year old could eat. Contacted Just eat by chat... in short spent nearly 3 hours , had  to queue twice (number 99 in queue twice as the first attempt was terminated by Just eat rep for no reason). Eventually  was told a refund for the missing item would be paid back to our card .  Was not happy  so asked to speak to supervisor manager. Was told I would be contacted within 2 to 3 hours (11pm). No call received until 3pm next day. Was advised they don't call after 9pm.  This was pointless as no further compensation was given except for delivery charge.   Meal and evening was meant to be a birthday celebration but completely spoilt by the event... won't be using the ¬£1.49 credit as I won't be using just eat again.

Title: MC Donalds
Review: MC Donalds, about 3 minutes drive away. Took 45 minutes to get to us and was all cold , very dissapointed üò° delivered by Just Eat

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service. Waited 3 1/2 hours for our meal. Only be told that he went to the wrong address. No one in so they cancelled our order without even telling us!!! Never use them again. RUBBISH

Title: The never offer a full refund it seems
Review: Refused to give a full refund when food was running over 2 hours late. Offered 50% to cancel and said it would be the same amount even if the food just didn't arrive at all.

Its a nightmare to try and report it, customer services that are a joke, getting passed around, Ended up pointing out we have CCTV, tell me when it was "delivered" & I can send footage to show it wasnt. Promised a refund, 3 weeks on still no refund. Ive deactived my account, never again would I use "Just Thieve", sorry Just Eat"

Title: Joke of a company!!
Review: Joke of a company!!! Never received my order and the company are telling me I CANNOT GET A REFUND BECAUSE THE RESTAURANT ‚ÄòSTATES IT WAS DELIVERED‚Äô!!!!So can I just say I‚Äôm Beyonc√© and that means I‚Äôm Beyonc√©..... NO!!! I want my refund for the food I NEVER RECEIVED!! And your agent KATHRYN SMITH couldn‚Äôt of been anymore unhelpful if she tried!

Title: Just eat scam
Review: Absolutely shocking I ordered subway and it never delivered even tho it said it did, i got in contact by phone and waited in a cue for an hour and they said it would go to the investigations team,they said the longest i‚Äôd have to wait was 48 hours i never heard nothing for 3 days i phoned again, and said i‚Äôd get a email with my refund by the end of the day i never got a email it had  been 5 days and i rang again and the woman on the phone was so rude i asked how i could put in a complaint and she said i can‚Äôt help you lol. they just stole 20 pounds off me.

Title: Ordered a sample order from Greggs via‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered a sample order from Greggs via justeat uk never arrived. Useless  company Greggs should dump them.

Title: Missing food
Review: Ordered from KFC through just eat. No delivery was made but status shows delivered. Just eat could not get hold of driver either, probably busy eating my food. Had to re order and pay again to feed kids who have school the following morning. Very poor customer service. They just want you're money. Let's see what happens when the 48 hours investigation is over.

Review: Shocking.Paid out for a takeaway that I subsequently cancelled and rejected following a 2 hour wait.Now refusing to refund me because the restaurant has lied and told them that the order was delivered.So I have been robbed of just over ¬£24.Dreadful customer service, avoid at all costs, just order direct.

Title: Terrible
Review: Terrible.  Ordered mcdonalds then was told 39 mons later it had been cancelled.  Then Ordered a kfc. Waited 1 jour. Called and they said 10 mins. Called again 20 mins after to be told it wasn't coming. 2 hungry upset children. Avoid them big time!!

Title: If I could have given 0 stars I would‚Ä¶
Review: If I could have given 0 stars I would have. Order food which said it was delivered but it wasn't- I have full cctv that shows no attempt made or even vehicles coming down the road. Phoned Just Eat and was passed between 4 different "customer care staff" - not that they actually care. Each time I had to wait in a cue so spent over an hour just holding. Not only do I have to wait 48 hours for someone to get back to me, they wouldn't provide details to report it as a crime (theft), I've lost money, no food and a very disappointed child as it was a treat for Halloween. I have never been spoken to so appallingly as I was last night. They are a disgrace! Looking at the reviews this seems to be a theme with Just Eat who obviously does not care about their customers.

Checked my bank account to see that just eats have taken the money for the food ordered.rang shop back to be told I'd have to contact just eats surely the shop will receive my money with just eats taking their percentage which is what I said to shop all they could say was contact just eats which I have but haven't got a confirmation order number fuming! Watch this space " just eats" I will get my ¬£32 back ! Shocking how they can not confirm your order but take your money!

Review: My food was inadequate for many reasons as discussed with Just Eat. They are refusing to refund me, as the restaurant hasn't marked me order as Accepted ....!That's so funny, because I ate it last night!!! Had an email confirmation of the "thumbs up" I've offered to send them, PLUS "your order is on its way email" I've offered to send. Apparently, after a live chat with just eat, it is MY job to contact the restaurant to ask them to change the status as delivered!!! haha! I'm sorry but that's not my duty or responsibility! Ongoing complaint. Disgusting disgusting disgusting

Title: AVOID
Review: They don‚Äôt deliver food that I have paid for, then refuse a refund - only offer a credit note. Shocking customer service - how is that even legal?

Title: Shocking service

I've never seen a driver use a wheelchair so why are they incapable walking and as they don't park why are they allowed to use their phone whilst engine still  running just remember it may be your child knocked over cos car drivers can't see round abandoned cars

Review: Ordered Kfc through just eat. The kfc never turned up so we phoned just eat to which they said it will take 48 hours to investigate and now they have said they will not be refunding because it was delivered. IT WASNT AND NOW WE ARE ¬£30 OUT OF POCKET AWFULL CUSTOMER SERVICE AND DELIVERY DRIVERS THAT ROB YOUR FOOD.

Title: Chimps could be trained to run a better‚Ä¶
Review: Chimps could be trained to run a better service! Just eat? Just starve more like.  Your food is cold when it arrives, that's if it doesn't get lost by the cretin supposed to deliver it.  Absolute crock of shi*!!!

Title: Crud Customer Service
Review: Delivery guy delivered the wrong order and when i phoned you to sort this mess out I got some person in customer service who obviously needs retraining as, instead of apologising and getting my order delivered, said that i would need to waste more of my time taking a photo of the food i did not order put it in an email and get a refund within 24 hrs and then reorder. Which is absolutely and totally ludicrous, i paid to have food delivered over and above the actual cost of walking into KFC and buying my food there, If I pay for a service I expect that service to be provided, I appreciate mistakes happen but  the above is just terrible customer service and the woman who dealt with me made me extremely angry with the half arsed don't care approach to resolving a very simple issue. Telling me that it would need to be investigated.  In the end I had to go to the store in question who were more than happy to replace the food delivered with the correct order and as always with this particular KFC the staff are always friendly and polite.  Not only have you wasted my time and money having to drive to the restaurant but you have also provided terrible customer service.

Title: Shockingly bad
Review: Appalling. Consistently late deliveries, rude delivery drivers and complete refusal from their so-called ‚Äòcustomer service to escalate the complaint, which I am sure companies have to provide by law. Amazing to think they are still allowed to continue their business which is clearly morally bankrupt.

Title: I ordered a meal
Review: I ordered a meal, which didn‚Äôt mention chillies anywhere, when it came it was covered in them which I cannot eat, I just had one bite. I contacted customer service through the chat, they asked me to take a screenshot of my confirmation email as they were saying that it mention on it the chillies (it didn‚Äôt)  and send it through the chat, which didn‚Äôt even have that facility. He asked me to email it but did not want to give me an email address saying I would find it on the website. I have sent 3 email to 3 different emails addresses and they all say I need to ring. No one answers on the phone, so basically after 24 hours, a meal in the bin, I have lost my money. I spent the night in the toilet because of the fact that I cannot eat chillies. Such a crap customer service. I will report to food safety standards so that they can close this awful service

Title: Avoid, avoid, avoid
Review: I think the feedback on this Company just about sums them up. I really hope as an online business they go under during the pandemic. We have been waiting for our take out for 2 hours. The number they give you for the restaurant is dead. I don‚Äôt suppose we will get any refund for food that never turned up. Please avoid. The more people who share this the better chance we have of putting them out of business.

Title: Garbage customer service
Review: Garbage customer service ,  they do not help you at all and when i asked them to call the restaurant , she just gave me the number. What a piece of **** these just eat is. Kept on saying i am here to help. and when i asked what way can you help. she said you can leave a feedback for the restaurant . like i dont know that. HUGE MISTAKE OF BUYING FOOD THROUGH JUST EAT.

Title: Placed an order to my old address
Review: Placed an order to my old address - my mistake as just eat don‚Äôt let you change your address permanently (have to do it for each individual order) - called kfc who was giving the driver my order and they said they can‚Äôt change my address and to call just eat - on hold To just eat for 30 minutes to be passed onto someone else (or a robot - I wasn‚Äôt sure if she was a robot or human - if she was human, they need to train their staff as I‚Äôve no idea what she was trying to say and took 5 minutes to get each word out) meanwhile my food has been at my old address for approx 25 minutes now, marked as delivered - to who, I‚Äôve no idea since my old house is currently up for sale and hasn‚Äôt been occupied for years, useless service from just eat and kfc - won‚Äôt be using again. Oh and I‚Äôve just been told by just eat robot/woman ‚Äòit‚Äôs your fault‚Äô - useless w*nkers

Title: CLOSE JUST-EAT DOWN NOW!!!
Review: Close this company down!!! Ordered KFC from Rayners Lane London, i live 4minutes walk away on the same road...delivery e-mail comes through and says "Delivered". NOT A SINGLE Buzz on my flat number, no knock at my door and No phone call if they cannot get into the building. Called JustEat, pathetic service and tell me they can't do anything as it has been delivered. THE RESTAURANTS AND DRIVERS ARE KEEPING THE FOOD TO THEMSELVES and JustEat are not doing anything about it!!! They have not given Refund and are are not willing to do anything about it!!!! This happened to me twice in 5 days! They owe me twice Refund as the 1st place I ordered was Pizza Chalet in Harrow. The Driver calls me before the food is made and says he cannot find my address. And then says for me to give him another Post code....I cannot just make up a post code of where I live. Everyone else can find my post code but not this guy. Once again....no food delivered and NO REFUND!!!! So basically not been handed the food and been paying hard earned money to these people to steal food! JUST EAT NEEDS TO CLOSE DOWN NOW OR PAY ALL THESE PEOPLE WHO THEY ARE SCAMMING BACK THEIR MONEY AND COMPENSATION!!!!

Title: Waiting 2 hours and didn‚Äôt turn up!
Review: Waited 1 hour for our kfc and got a phone call to say it was given to the wrong driver and it should come in the next hour but call back after 1 hour, we ended up calling back an hour later and they said it says it‚Äôs been delivered but still says it‚Äôs on the way and we won‚Äôt be getting our food after 2 HOURS of WAITING! awful service

Title: Absolute joke of a company
Review: Absolute joke of a company. Pay drivers who steal food, mark it as delivered and then still get paid. Standard copy/pasted responses everytime you contact support with no outcome other than "we will pass this onto our investigations team".Go any other food delivery company as you wont get scammed

Eventually they agreed to refund in full I am still waiting 8 days later. I have had several lovely chats with their robot and each time been told a different excuse. #liars I will never use this company again. Avoid, avoid and avoid again!

Review: Just got our order for breakfast through just eat, our food turned up without any drinks, which means I paid extra for meals for no reason at all over ¬£20 for two mc muffins and a few hash browns and a doughnut. Absolute rip off and who ever I spoke to on the phone with was no help what do ever really

Title: For order number 1051638441
Review: For order number 1051638441, I want to give you the worst review ever, unbelievable. The food hasn't arrived after almost 2 hours after ordering you causing us physical pain as we are so hungry and angry now the app is so useless. How can you run a business like this? I'm so angry right now I know an employee that works at your head office and is a friend of mine and I'm going to let him know infront of our circle of friends what I think of this company, he will be ashamed to work for you. The best you could do is offer ¬£5 compensation which doesn't even cover the cost of burger. I will pursue this complaint, but my right know I need to arrange food for my family as we are so hungry!

Title: Never use them

To whom may I ask?? I just hope that someone who was in need, had my food and enjoyed it.

Title: Absolute joke of a company

They put you on hold then cut you off or if you do get through they tell you someone will contact you within 48hours which never happens. 6 conversations with staff on phone 2 with staff online. Still no refund . Robbing gits avoid avoid avoid !!

Title: CON ARTISTS.

THEY THEN MARKED THE ORDER AS DELIVERED WHEN IT HADNT LEFT THE RESTAURANT, WE WERE ON THE PHONE WITH THE RESTAURANT SO MANY TIMES!!! The restaurant were so apologetic and just eat are total con artists. Its taken an hour and a half of them to cock about. Just eat, feel free to contact me on georgia_tucker at hotmail Dot com. youre an absolute joke and disgrace.

Title: I will never use Just Eat again.
Review: I will never use Just Eat again.I placed an order last night. Apparently the order took a whole three minutes to prepare and the driver was on route. The driver "lost signal" for a journey that should have taken 10 minutes. I couldn't track the order - was waiting for my dinner for 45 minutes. I called JustEat who told me my order was "completed and delivered" and there was nothing they could do. My order wasn't delivered and if it was - it wasn't to me. I'm now out of pocket and will NEVER use JustEat again. Terrible customer service.

Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! Take your custom elsewhere!!!!
Review: Just eat is an absolute and utter disgrace! They are a dam joke! Fumin!The app shows on a map where delivery driver is, I could see exactly where delivery driver was... First of all he took the absolute mik getting to the restaurant, then he drove to my house just to turn around & drive away again & go sit in a street around the corner, then he drove to the top of my street & sat there for more than 15 minutes! By the time he knocked on my door my food was clap cold so I contacted just eat which was an even bigger joke! The first chat agent didn't even help me with my issue told me to report it through the app section even though it didn't offer the option I needed, I then went on chat again just to end up repeating myself over & over again! Eventually the chat agent decided to refund me for the food only so basically I paid ¬£3.50 for delivery for the driver to sit around for so long that I received clap cold food which was a complete and utter waste of money. As if that is not bad enough, I was then told that only way of receiving the refund was by crediting my just eat account which by this time I just wanted to delete completely! I demanded she return the money to my card which is how I paid and she told me that this was not possible which is an absolute and utter disgrace because they have then put me in a position where I am then forced to order from them just to use the credit on the account so I told her to stick it n that they could keep the dam money cos I will NOT be ordering again especially just to end up with some div driver that hands me cold food that I wish I never bothered ordering!!!!

Title: I tried to get a refund for the missing‚Ä¶
Review: I tried to get a refund for the missing meals i didn't receive from just eat, i spent nearly an hour on the phone yesterday which has ruined my evening and today on line for nearly two hours speaking to four different people on line and had to repeat everything, i was told i can get my refund on line but when i tried it didn't work and was put back on chat line again, this is not good enough just eat,  poor poor poor, after the chat they wonted me to give a good review well you got one not positive, bad service bad customer service i do not recommend them at all...awaiting to see the manager contact me to resolve my refund well we see....

Title: Money grabbing thieves
Review: Ordered food that made me really ill, I went through just eat to try and get my money back for something that made me poorly, i was told the same things over and over again, and then told no refund or compensation would be given, never order from here, money grabbing thieves.

Title: Not the first time this has happened to‚Ä¶
Review: Not the first time this has happened to me using this disgraceful service. Ordered a takeaway for a lot of money and the takeaway never came. Followed just eat steps for help and basically nothing was done to help me, I never got my food and the takeaway gets to keep my prepaid money. Just eat always side with the takeaway regardless of what has happened and now there is absolutely nothing that I can do about it. Well one thing I can do is to warn all you good people to avoid this service and never get mugged in daylight by the thieves and liars who run these establishments and services. I don't even want to give the one star but that is the lowest I can give. The customer service is absolutely appalling!

Title: justeat seems fine with promoting bad‚Ä¶
Review: justeat seems fine with promoting bad sellers, and this is not a one off bad order, over two years 1/4 of all my orders have a problems with them.Such as non delivery, cold food, 1 hour late delivery, canceled orders, don't trust justeat anymore.

Title: I ordered Mcdonalds from the 'Just Eat‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered Mcdonalds from the 'Just Eat App' this evening at 9.30pm but my delivery never turned up and no one bothered to contact me. The app stated they were waiting for a driver, so we waited patiently for over 2 hours. When I finally contacted Just Eat they then sent me messages saying my order was cancelled and said I would be refunded within 15-20 min. Very poor service and lack of communication back to Uber Eats I go

Title: Money Grabbing Thieves
Review: I ordered through just eat on Sunday the 18th. My order wasn‚Äôt processed but I was still charged. I spoke to the Chat team who said that there‚Äôs nothing they can do and I would have to wait 3-5 days for MY money to come back.Waited until Sunday the 25th (one week) to contact them again about getting my money back as I still haven‚Äôt been refunded.The person on the Chat spoke terrible English and just kept repeating himself on every message that I need to talk to my bank who I already spoke to, they advised me to dispute it with the merchant.After nearly an hour he said that I‚Äôm not entitled to a refund as the order wasn‚Äôt successful and he can‚Äôt see any funds were taken and refused to even point blank apologise or offer me some form of Credit.I WILL NEVER use this joke of a company again, they will scam you until the cows come home. They have no issues in taking your money but will fight you tooth and nail to give it back. I‚Äôm not confident I will ever see my money again.

Title: Ordered 2 items from papa John‚Äôs in‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered 2 items from papa John‚Äôs in kingswood Bristol , chocolate brownie and ice team .. arrived ice cream  missing ..... rang the food place was told they would deliver but didn‚Äôt know how long ?! Contacted just eats to complain and asked for a refund of the missing ice cream which they did but as a credit to my just eat account . Which I didn‚Äôt want I wanted refund to my bank account . Advised by customer services they can‚Äôt do this . Glad it wasn‚Äôt for a larger amount ! Didn‚Äôt know that you can‚Äôt get a refund for non delivery of goods and they only offer a credit note . Surely this is not right ? I‚Äôve got had goods yet I have to pay for them ! Won‚Äôt use just eat again

Title: Terrible Service
Review: Ordered what should have been a fairly easy order at 6:45pm, was given a delivery time of 7:05pm, then 7:15pm, then nothing after that, just the app saying they were trying to find a driver. rang up at 7:30pm to ask where my food was, placed on hold for 15 minutes, someone answered and then said they would be a few minutes, put me on hold for another 15 minutes, someone else answered and asked how they could help, she then put me on hold for another 5 minutes, and told me my order was awaiting a driver.Ended up cancelling and getting a refund after an hour and a half of my time wasted.Used Just Eat before in the past, won't be doing so again after this terrible service.

Title: Just eat are thieves
Review: Investigating a delivery order which was not received the polish driver couldn't speak English and pressed delivered without confirming name on the bag the restaurant Greg's in whitton confirmed my order was there but no way to deliver or refund and take up with just eat. But just eat are thieves because I didnt think of taking a photo they are going by app data and lying about talking to the restaurant. I will never use their service again

Title: This company should not be‚Ä¶
Review: This company should not be running,refused a refund on a missed ¬£80 order , sarcastic and rude person on there phone . I WILL NEVER USE AGAIN , and advise other people not to

Title: WORST CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE
Review: Received the wrong order today from Tim Hortons through just eat. The driver told us to take the order and contact just eat - which we thought would be an easy fix. Just eat have told us the driver has put the order down as 'delivered' however failed to state that it was the wrong order. We are now having to go through an investigation with a 48hr turnaround. I cannot understand why we couldn't have the correct order sent and query resolved there and then? Worst service I have ever experienced will never use again

Title: Absolutely terrible company
Review: Absolutely terrible company, ordered through them and food never delivered. Contacted restaurant who advised driver hadn't collected. Contacted just eat who said food had been delivered and are refusing to refund. Definitely won't be using again

Title: Incredibly poor user experience as the‚Ä¶
Review: Incredibly poor user experience as the time for delivery isn‚Äôt displayed until after order and then if you want to cancel because it‚Äôs too long they want to keep 50%.I walked to the restaurant for them to be able to turn my pizza around in 10 minutes. Have asked for a refund of delivery and been told just eat won‚Äôt do anything. Same experience of no call back. My recommendation is to use other platforms that advise you or delivery times before placing the order and have good customer service.

Title: I will never use Just Eat again
Review: I will never use Just Eat again. I can see looking down these reviews that so many people are having the same issue as me. Ordered food, didnt turn up but was marked as delivered. Spoke to Just Eat chat who said it would need to be sent to their investigation team as it was marked as complete even though I explained that I called the actual restarant who said that they had never received the order. So where has my money gone then?? Absolute scam. Like I said, will never use again.

Title: 2hrs messing about awaiting my order
Review: 2hrs messing about awaiting my order. Order cancelled in the end. Just eat customer service is scripted and security information required to check an order. Used Just eat along time now however will be trying other apps from now on. Very disappointed and going the night now with no food.

Title: Ordered via just eat at 6.40pm and was‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered via just eat at 6.40pm and was informed delivery would be 8.05pm 85mins!!! at 8.20pm no food arrived so we rang te takeaway said would be 15mins .at 9pm rang again and driver then turned up.we had waited 2hours 20mins .and the food was cold.complained to just eat who just seem to read from a script .they offered me ¬£20 compensation from a bill of ¬£29 that included a ¬£4.50 delivery charge for a takeaway that is 0.7 miles away .we normally collect our food but we have had to isolate due being told to by nhs track n trace Will i ever use this service again??? let me think......

Title: Just recieved good 2 hours late and‚Ä¶
Review: Just recieved good 2 hours late and cold as a slab! Rang customer service before the order arrived and they said wait until the food comes and if it is cold, we will refund you. I called back once the food was delivered and they completely lied and said they couldn't do anything but escalate it which would take forever! I said the call was recorded and they had both lied about refunds.I have used justeat for years and will now never use them.again! Disgusting service and customer service.

Title: Ordered food never arrived. But treat like we were  lying.
Review: Ordered food through his eat. Order never arrived. Was told to reorder and pay again whilst they investigate. Meanwhile we didnt have the foid. Loyal customer for over 20 years and that was the treatment we got. Why would I reorder when the last one was punched. Stated delivered o  their site on ours stating 1 minute away since 6.pm (4 And half hours ago). Disgusted with the treatment. Will not be reordering through them again

Title: Complete rubbish
Review: Complete rubbish , steer clear. Do not have access to sufficient delivery operatives to make the service viable. Should really confirm order and delivery available before they take your money.

Title: Disgusted with the customer service‚Ä¶
Review: Disgusted with the customer service here. I placed an order, ¬£27 taken from account. Received confirmation from Just Eat that it had been accepted by the restaurant. 20-30 minutes later received a text from Just Eat to say the food was on its way. 50 minutes later I'm still waiting. Rang the restaurant directly and they told me they hadn't received an order for me. Rang Just Eat, to be told it would have to be investigated and i would receive a response within 48 hours and a supervisor callback within 24 hours. Refused to issue the refund there and then. Supervisor called, again refusing a refund until they'd looked into it. Said that i would be 'generously compensated' for the inconvenience. full 48 hours later i received an email to say they would NOT be refunding me as the restaurant had confirmed the order was delivered. Rang the restaurant, they verified my version of events and told me they'd done the same to Just Eat. so Just Eat LIED. Rang again following their email refusing a refund, was again told i would receive a supervisor callback within 24 hours. 3 days later, still no phone call and they're now ignoring my emails. Disgraceful. Not mentioning the restaurant's name as it wasn't their fault. Don't trust Just Eat now and will not be using them again. I feel sorry for the businesses that are signed up with them

Title: Stick to Uber eats or Deliveroo or just Cook lol
Review: So I decided to use just eat to order McDonalds instead of Uber eats this evening. Of course the food never arrived and it was marked as delivered. Just eat have told me about their tedious 48hour turnaround, I honestly will never use just eat again after this, going. To bed hungry after a long day of work because of the incompetence is just so annoying! I won‚Äôt rest until I get a refund! Just eat can‚Äôt continue to get away with scamming us out of our hard earned money. Especially during a pandemic!!!! Stay away my friends!!!!!

Title: High way robbery!!
Review: High way robbery!!! I order food the driver marks it as delivered and you want to take 48hrs to investigate! I am not even from Europe! This is fraud! I see a lot of customers with the same issue! A campaign needs to be started to shut this company down!

Title: Like Snoop says "I'm sick of this".
Review: This is the second time I have not received my delivery, I called customer service to complain and was told that their investigation team would look into it and that I would hear back in 48 hours. Of course I've heard nothing since and they've even removed the order from my app. No food and no money back. Absolutely terrible service, I have let everyone I know that Just eats customer service is shameful and of course we won't be using them ever again.

Title: Horrific customer service
Review: Horrific customer service. I ordered food using just eat, and the driver never turns up. When I called to chase up the order was told I get charged 50% for the cancellation. So here I am out of pocket and no food. Just eat are theives and scammers that is probably how they make their money. Never had this experience with uber eats the only reason I ordered from here was that particular restaurant was not on ubereats.

Title: Customer Service is shocking
Review: Customer Service is shocking, never been treated so badly - Never do what they say, blame culture

Title: Awful
Review: Awful!  Those (zero hours????) mopeds cause noise nuisance and also rid across pavements and communal areas. Needless to say that "just eat" moped rider on scooter LC65CXW had his licence plate obscured, so it could read anything. Also, he had a "just eat" box on the back and wore a "deliveroo" coat. This does not instil trust but makes one think that 'just eat' is dodgy. Photos taken.

Title: This company needs to be shut down
Review: This company needs to be shut down. Won‚Äôt accept any responsibility for issues. Why do they exist? Why do restaurants need them? Worst customer service, in fact there is no customer service. They just blame the restaurant for issues that are completely app or website related. THE WORST AND MOST POINTLESS COMPANY IN EXISTENCE!

Title: Food was never delivered
Review: I wanted to order takeaway and looked for my favourite dish from K O kebabish plaistow on Uber eats. The dish was showing sold out on Uber eats. I then looked for the same on justeat and placed the order . The restaurant accepted my order. I was tracking the order and when it showed that the driver arrived on my road I went out and was waiting by the door. No one turned up on and the status or order changed to delivered. I was still standing outside for another 3-4 minutes and called the restaurant and told them what happened. They asked to to contact justeat for refund.Contacted 3 times and after more than a week was told that they can‚Äôt refund as the tracker shows the driver was on my road. It‚Äôs not about money but how can they get away like this??

Title: Bad bad bad
Review: If I could leave no stars I would broken GDPR rights, consumer rights act of 2015, and there own turma and conditions not to mention not having sutable solutions,Okay so I ordered a meal that came in correct so I called just eat as the app they where having some Tec issues,After I was on the phone for 30 min I was told u can have a redound to give me some sort of voucher on my next meal which isn‚Äôt a refund,In the visa/ MasterCard terms and conditions resounds must be Refunded useing original method of payment I was told if you want that you need to speak to a manager they will cal u in 24 hours that was wensday so to this date it has be a total 120 hours still no call back,So u called them and told them response was I don‚Äôt have the tools I can‚Äôt help email them I tryed to explain I do have some difficulty‚Äôs with this as I have a few issues that make it difficult (that‚Äôs way a Frend has helped me type This) so I ask for the recording of the call of proof of this event my answer was no...... GDPR it is a requirement legal speaking that they have to have this facility....I have tryed email still no look so even worse when they don‚Äôt even read the Email and say you haven‚Äôt responded talk about getting out of a job.So this and my back are the last stop if any one is thinking of using just eat stay away

Title: If your food is inedible or doesn't arrive, don't expect Just Eat to refund your money, they won't.
Review: The food I received was inedible (even the dog wouldn't touch the bacon on my burger) and cold. I called the restaurant to ask for a refund and the manager told me he couldn't refund me until he's spoken to Just Eat and checked whether I'm a liar just trying to get free food. He said he'd call back when he had done so and never did. I tried to complain to Just Eat and request a refund via chat, but no matter what browser I used as soon as I asked to be transferred to customer service the chat window closed. I tried a few times, then gave up. I emailed Just Eat and requested a refund, and explained how appalling the food and the attitude of the manager was. I never got a response, or a refund. This is not the first time this has happened with Just Eat. Their attitude is that if the food is poor quality, tough luck.

Title: Don't deliver and then refuse to‚Ä¶
Review: Don't deliver and then refuse to refund. DON'T USE JUST EAT, EVER! PLACE ANY ORDERS DIRECTLY WITH THE RESTAURANT. WHY PAY USELESS MIDDLEMEN?

Title: Fabulous service
Review: Fabulous service, cannot fault

Title: Order a meal said on the app was to be‚Ä¶
Review: Order a meal said on the app was to be delivered at 20.11.. Rang the restaurant 20 mins later they said its on route tracked the order on the app it said driver has lost signal.. Rang just eat twice they said it has been delivered which it hasn't this is now 21.00 I have screenshot s of dates and times just eat say they will not refund me cowboy company I will be taking this further and go to my bank for a full refund  within the next 2 days as I have not received what I have payed for

Title: Useless - never again
Review: Useless. Placed an order through the app at 6.30pm for delivery at 8pm. Phoned the restaurant at 8pm as no update on app other than order accepted. The restaurant said that they hadn't even started cooking the meal as a driver hadn't been assigned by Just Eat. After finally tracking down a customer service number, they tried to fob us off with waiting another 10 minutes (plus the time to cook the meal?). Got a full refund and won't use again.

Title: Avoid at all cost!!!
Review: Avoid at all cost!!!! Bad customer service, no drivers. Everything went wrong. I called the restaurant after 45 minutes and was told that my order has been ready for 20 minutes but Just eat didn‚Äôt assign a driver. I called just eat and after 2 hrs and 33 minutes the driver arrived and I refused to take the order as my kids already eat buy that  time. I said I want my money back and this lady named Maria refused on the grounds that I didn‚Äôt named the items on my order and was a lie of course because I did.  This company is a complete sham. I would advise to everyone not to use it.

Title: Poor Account Management
Review: I had the app on two phones but couldn‚Äôt remember my password so I reset it, but the reset the password of an old account which was deleted years ago. So I had two accounts under the same email. I was told to delete it through the website so I did and it deleted both my accounts. The lack of understanding from the live chat was shocking for their own staff

Title: No delivery, no communication, no refund
Review: Spent over ¬£50 on subway for my family on for them to not deliver it and then not pick up their phone or online chat. The driver marked it as delivered even though it hadn‚Äôt been so everyone will be going to bed hungry tonight. Customer services autophone bragged about their 2 minute wait time and yet didn‚Äôt pick up. Shocking for such a large company.

Title: I have no word to describe how bad this‚Ä¶
Review: I have no word to describe how bad this company is just avoid at all cost. Call the restaurant direct.

Title: 1 star as I can't choose any less!
Review: 1 star as I can't choose any less!Placed an order for a family dinner, paid via PayPal as usual, meal arrives with one complete dish missing.Called the restaurant, to be told they had told just eat that meal was off the menu but just eat had not updated their app. Now I'm by the just eat chat thingy that I can't even get a refund for the missing dish just an account credit, I don't want a credit I want my money back for the item I did not even receive!Will not be using these jokers again! Deliveroo or Uber eats will at least refund you for missing items.

Title: It would be zero if that was possible
Review: It would be zero if that was possible. Terrible experience yesterday. Over 1.5 hours wait for food, then wrong order arrived. Delivery driver took wrong order away with no answer as  to how the problem would be fixed. Just Eat App useless including Chatbot. Rang Customer Services who said I should have taken a photo of wrong food order (!) so they could pass to their investigation team (?). Eventually after a lot of grief they agreed to refund my money. Still no food solution. I guess someone somewhere got our order and their much smaller order 'dissappeared'.  Only thing to add was that the food supplier was great, their customer service was spot on. NEVER NEVER USE JUST EAT!

Title: Absolutely shocking customer service
Review: I made an order worth ¬£80 of food and it took over 2 hours to assign a driver, when I spoke to customer services it was absolutely shocking. I couldn't understand a word the women was saying, she then told me she was transferring me elsewhere which took 45 minutes to get through to and then the lady on that end cut me off!!

Title: Disgusting customer service
Review: Disgusting customer service, have no interest in giving your money back or even engaging with you. Asked me to call them back when their system is back up and running, how am I supposed to know when that is?Never want to put a manager on the call and try to offer you a partial refund when you‚Äôve not received your order lol

Title: This 1 star is just because I have to‚Ä¶
Review: This 1 star is just because I have to give one. Soo bad company services.I order kebab, didn't show up by the time they give me, and I decided to call the restaurant. 1 the guy didn't even speak English, and afterwards they came 1h30m later. Guess what, the chicken was pink inside, and cold.I told just eat what happen and guess what they didn't do anything. I got the pictures from the chicken and if I get sick I will put the restaurant and just eat in court.

Title: TERRIBLE COMPANY!
Review: TERRIBLE COMPANY!TERRIBLE COMPANY!I ordered food and waited over 1 hour from a place only 15 min from where I live. There was no tracking and no updates. After 1 hour 30 min I called Just eat and they told me the food had been delivered, but it had not! I was starving hungry by then and everywhere was closed as it was 11:30pm. Do not use this company!

Title: Just Eat Just Forget it.
Review: Ordered food for 6:06pm delivery, like so many others , it didn‚Äôt turn up. Over an hour later I‚Äôm told it needs to go to a 48hr investigation, ridiculous for ¬£13. No delivery, no service, no food, no refund. They need to be reported from doing this to the consumer. App removed.

Title: No delivery received  at 6:50 got confirmation‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered food at 6:50 got confirmation saying it would be delivered by 7:25 got a message to say driver was on way have screenshots on phone as delivery never turned up managed to get in touch with restaurant an hour and 20 mins later and order was still there and never been collected just eat have said it‚Äôs delivered and are most unhelpful when contacted on chat and say it will take 48 hrs to investigate whilst I have children at home waiting to eat before bed. This isn‚Äôt the first time I have issues with items missing etc I shall never use just eat again

Title: Terrible Service
Review: Terrible Service. I had missing item in my order. Ive asked about refund. Someone on chat asked me to contact with restaurant. To much hassle and problems. Crazy! I bought using JustEat so they should resolve my issue. Refund not done. Next time I will use restaurant straight away. For sure I won‚Äôt use JustEat

Title: Awful service
Review: Awful service, still no refund.

Title: FISH AND CHIPS=AWFUL
Review: Must be mad ordering fish and chips on Just eat,be careful as the takeaways will not refund or send out alternatives if there is a problem with the food as they don,t normally have delivery drivers.Nothing better than being there in the chippy seeing them putting the food in the paper ,hot from fryer.Just eat fine for chinese/curry etc not F/C

Title: Ordered food
Review: Ordered food, 40 minutes after supposed delivery time I phoned the indian restaurant who were extremely rude , told me there was no such order and put the phone down on me. Then when I referred this to just Eat they told me that at 3am in the morning ( according to their email) they'd contacted the take away and confirmed the order had been delivered. Lying toads all of them

Title: False advertising, no delivery and obnoxiousness.
Review: Delivery time advertised was a lie, added 30mins straight off the bat. Then the driver was nearby, then he didn't turn up. Customer service were ridiculously obnoxious, basically said I was lying and the driver had delivered the food. Refused me a refund subject to investigation so I was left out of pocket and with no dinner.Not the first time it's happened. Will not be using Just Eat again.

Title: Refused refund
Review: Our order did not turn up, we saw the driver on the map parked up on a different road for at least 20 minutes. They did not attempt to ring us to say they were struggling to find the house and therefore we were unable to contact them to assist. When we rang the restaurant they said as the order had been picked up it wasn‚Äôt their issue. We then complained to Just-Eat who have turned down our refund request as the driver said it had been delivered. It is disgusting that they think we have made a false refund request after being such a regular user of the service. I also do not understand how they are not able to see where the driver had been and noticed that it was ‚Äòdelivered‚Äô over an hour after it was meant to.

Title: Disregard
Review: I have been waiting for a refund 2 months now, never got my food and they said it has been investigating by the team which are not making any effort to solve it I have lost count how many times I contacted them about it on the app so frustrating will not buy again and I was a regular. Updating: and after several contacts I have been told that I won‚Äôt get any refund because they have no track of information for more than 30 days. It is a joke.

Title: horrible
Review: horrible, food arrived very late and very cold so i refused it. just eat wont refund so they just get to have my money. nothing i can do

Title: Thieving scum
Review: Thieving scum.They put the order through to the restaurant. Had no drivers ... for 1.5 hours. They didn't contact / warn me or the restaurant. Chat didn't work, waited on the phone for 30 minutes. When I finally got through they told me there was a driver on the way and would I accept ¬£5 credit and my dinner that had been sitting on the restaurant counter for an hour. When I declined and asked for a refund, they stole the money back from the restaurant, even though the restaurant had zero responsibility for the problem. Mistakes happen, but stealing from restaurateurs in a pandemic is disgusting, dishonest, criminal behaviour. The management of this business should be ashamed of themselves.

Title: Food delivered 70 minutes earlier than‚Ä¶
Review: Food delivered 70 minutes earlier than agreed. Partner not home from work, so sent driver away and asked to deliver at agreed time. Delivery was subsequently made at correct time; the order was cold. The original food from the first delivery attempt was simply retained and then delivered. Unbelievable! Just Eat not interested and refusing refund. The take away in question not answering their phone. No dinner and no refund. Just Eat completely evasive and unhelpful. Will never use again!

Title: My food didn‚Äôt arrive
Review: My food didn‚Äôt arrive. Just eat asked if they delivered it, they said yes and that‚Äôs the end of Just Eat‚Äôs thorough investigation. No refund or further contact. I would avoid using them.

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service. Hard to find live chat. Food did not turn up and no reason given why.

Title: No Customer After Service!
Review: No Customer After Service!Order food at 3.44pm no update. Tried ringing and texting after 1hour with no update. Justeat not answering telephone. No updates, so ordered KFC which was delivered within 45 mins and a whole 1/2 hour before Justeat meal,  despite being ordered before KFC. Absolutely disgusting service!!

Title: Bad ethics, company does nothing about the internal fraud
Review: Today I received text message from Just Eat sender ID about the order I‚Äôve never ordered. i checked my account and found nothing - that led me to the conclusion that someone used my number for impersonation purposes.I contacted their support, which verified that it is fraud - but once I‚Äôve asked if they will report or block this order I was told that they don‚Äôt do this and suggested to contact my phone provider.That means that Just Eat really doesn‚Äôt care if the order is fraudulent or legit - they do nothing about such impersonation orders and happily take carded/criminal money from fraudsters - not caring about customers personal information such as mobile number.It‚Äôs unethical, awful practice that should be investigated.

Title: Ordered a kebab on Friday night
Review: Ordered a kebab on Friday night, it never arrived and yet it was marked as 'DELIVERED' on justeat's site.I contacted the shop and re-ordered via ubereats, at least it arrived but I'm now nearly 30 QUID out of pocket for a KEBAB !!!!!!!!!!!JUSTEAT better take heed of this.....This is just the start of my campaign and I will not relent until I get a refund.AVOID AT ALL AND ANY COSTS.It's UBER EATS for me from now on.NEVER AGAIN.I hope you go bust soon... 'JustRobbers' is more appropriate.

Title: Horrible experience
Review: Horrible experience I ordered takeaway at 5 and the delivery time was given as 5:32. Just eat sent me message at 5:22 that food is on it‚Äôs way. I kept on waiting till 6 and then tried to contact just eat. There is no one to answer their call and website asked me to contact restaurant. The restaurant told me that I have to speak to just eat as the Food has been ready since 5:15. I kept on trying their number but no luck. I lost hope and went out myself to a nearby restaurant at 6:45 to buy food. As soon as I got home the driver turned up at 7:05. I refused to accept food and asked for refund and it‚Äôs a nightmare to claim. First of all chat box tries to resolve your matter for 15 minutes.(just a trick to waste time)Then the customer service person takes over and asks you to repeat your details and story again. And after going through all of that she told me that she can‚Äôt give me refund as the driver turned up at my house. Now it will go to some investigation department.(investigation for ¬£18? I think they should contact FBI & MI5) This is clearly another tactic to delay or avoid refund. Any big company refunds straight away to avoid any bad name to their reputation but just eat didn‚Äôt even bother. My takeaway was only ¬£18 but I wasted my 30 min just to claim that money.  What a joke. The amount wasn‚Äôt significant for me but there are a lot of people who are struggling and for them it can be a big thing. I would suggest you guys never to order through just eat. If you ring restaurant direct your prices will be cheaper as just eat takes certain percentage and you guys are paying for a ridiculous service. I‚Äôve been ordering through just eat every other week but now I‚Äôve learnt my lesson.  Never again

Title: Never again
Review: Ordered food with a note to make a plain burger. Added, no cheese, sauce or salad just so there was no confusion. Food arrived with cheese, sauce and salad. Couldn‚Äôt get a reply from just eat so called restaurant direct. They said they‚Äôre happy to replace but as don‚Äôt have drivers, would have to call just eat to arrange. Eventually got through to be told, take a picture of food ( now in food waste) and wait for email confirmation. Doesn‚Äôt help when you have a hungry child. Went to restaurant ourselves to pick up food. Just eat just removed.

Title: Do not use JustEat
Review: Do not use JustEat. I ordered food yesterday and it was never delivered, despite the driver signing the order off as delivered. He stole the food and I am fairly convinced they do not track their drivers. I now have to go through a process of proving that the food was not delivered to get my money back. Use UberEats. They track their drivers.

Title: I will never use just eat again.
Review: I will never use just eat again.The meal ordered at 6.30pm, I had to cancel the Oder at 8pm as it still hadn‚Äôt arrived, the restaurant prepared the food but the driver didn‚Äôt show up after accepting the Job.Kids ,birthday meal ruined by just eat!It‚Äôs Deliveroo and Uber eats from now on, just eat don‚Äôt care about customers

Title: Food delivered
Review: Food deliveredRipped bagAnd hair in the inside of container

Title: so we ordered a takeaway that took‚Ä¶
Review: so we ordered a takeaway that took nearly 3 hours to arrive and when it did arrive it was cold! now just eat will not refund as the restaurant hasnt changed the delivery status as delivered on there system but shows delivered on my app! absolutely appalling customer service! AVOID -

Title: Responsibility dodgers
Review: I ordered McDonald's Breakfast at 10.45 (10 minute predicted delivery time) and by 11.06 I hadn't received any updates so I 'spoke' to the Bot who told me my food was on the way.2 hours later with the Bot telling me my food was still coming, that it was just running late, I had spoken to 3 different people (2 of which had ended the chat without attempting to resolve my concern) I finally get a complaint reference number and a promise of a callback from a manager.Supervisor called the next day to apologise but apologised for my food not coming (which wasn't my complaint) and offer ¬£5 credit and a full refund which I probably would have accepted at any time up to about an hour of trying to find out where my food was. I asked whether the supervisor believed ¬£5 was adequate compensation for 2 hours of my time trying to resolve something that should have taken 2 minutes and the supervisor explained that was the best they could do. Only at this point did they formally cancel my order (more than 24 hours after it had been placed) I requested a callback from someone more senior as I didnt feel my complaint was being taken seriously (the error of their Bot and failure of two 'customer care' operators to deal with my issue) but was warned they couldn't do anything more.Manager called the next day and apologised again for something I had not complained about and offered the ¬£5 credit. Again I asked the same questions and once again, they avoided taking responsibility for their mistake costing me 2 hours of my time to rectify. To ensure my complaint was taken more seriously, I requested a call back from someone more senior.They failed to make that call. I was sent an email to once again apologise for something I had not complained about.Moral of the story, this company seem to be eager to shift the blame onto the restaurants rather than admit to their own shortcomings and then suppress your complaint instead of acknowledging the issue. Steer clear.

Title: Probably the same complaint,as others.‚Ä¶
Review: Probably the same complaint,as other just eat customers. Placed an order using the app,the restaurant confirmed the order and gave a 50 min time frame so at 1:03am got a message saying the order was on it's way so I live a 10 minute walk from the restaurant. To meet the time frame estimate should reach me by 1:15am come 1:45am no order so I phoned the restaurant they said the driver was running a bit late and it would be at 2:20,so I said he's not picked the food up yet and the chap said don't worry I've cooked the food I said oh and hung up 5mins later phoned up again and said no cancel the order,it hadn't been delivered in good time so I am entitled to cancel under statutory law. The chap said ok,obviously he wasn't happy but that's not my problem,he told me I'd have to contact just eat for a refund. I contacted them the next day when I got the order number I noticed the app had my order as delivered,I don't know if the restaurant has any interaction with the app as far as marking the order as delivered or not. If they do then they marked it as delivered out of spite. This is where it gets really sketchy I contact customer services first you go through a chat but then the chat but puts you through to an agent while trying to get my refunded and going through the convoluted process I would be dealing with one agent and while I'm typing the agent asks if there's anything else they can do and drops out so I then get bounced onto someone else so you have to start again and control your anger at how long the process is  taking so I left the chat,had a cuppa and phoned them. The person I spoke to had a thick Philippino accent so was abroad and scripted,which they stick to they said the complaint would be handed to their investigation dept and they would get back to me in 48 hours. Of course they didn't back on the chat same rigmarole a little bit more progress,I had to point out that under UK law I'm entitled to my money back and demanded a refund they then inform me they are unable to do so,it would have to go back up the chain and I would have to wait a further 72hours. Every CS agent kept pointing out that the order was marked as delivered,basically calling me a liar. I don't know if the delivered  is applied automatically or the restaurant is responsible but that is not my problem. My contract is with just eat they take the money so I have met my side of the contract just eat is in breach of their contract for not dealing with my complaint and refunding me as swiftly as possible,I can't help but think the whole process is designed to frustrate the customer to the point of writing off the cost. Which in my case it was a grand some of ¬£17.02p in these times which are hard that could feed me for three days so I'm not giving up. If the restaurant did mark my order as delivered then that's not good and just eat need to reprimand the restaurant. Either way just eat has lost me as a customer and I would strongly advise any new customers to try one of the newer apps or deal directly with the takeaway but most of them don't have provisions for automated payments and what with the lurgy cash is not wise. Just eat get half of the one star and the takeaway gets the other half,I get a sore finger and ear and zero respect as a customer from just eat oh and an untitled ticket sent via email,whatever that is and at least I can leave this review as a warning to others avoid just eat like the lurgy and if you do use them eventually,you will end up here and if you have had an identical experience then you know that you are not alone and I'm not a gammon.

Title: Instead of getting Snoop to do your ads maybe pay some drivers to turn up on time with hot food....
Review: Awful ordered food for it to turn up 2hours and 30mins later stone cold. Asked for a refund but was given account credit instead. Joke

Title: My food never arrived
Review: My food never arrived. I contacted customer service and the told me I would get a response within 48 hours. 2 days later they tell me that the driver told them he had delivered it so I would not get a refund. This is a flawed investigation process as the driver clearly wouldn‚Äôt admit to stealing my food. I definitely won‚Äôt use the service again until I get my refund.

Title: You wouldn't believe it
Review: Well , I've just had my 3 negative experience with just eat customer services I ordered some food and got the complete wrong order O contacted just eat to be told I had to recontact the restraunant even after explain I had been told to bugger off but with other words when I contacted them about my order being incorrect , so I contacted them again to explain just eat needed the order to be signed off as delivered and they were not helpful at all so i got back onto just eat and they said it had to be investigated now I'm still waiting for them to contact me about an order 2 months ago they are meant to be investigating , so I said I'd prefair if it wasn't and we could deal with it now , to which I was told I wouldn't be entitled to a refund as we had recieved some of our order we ordered a donner meat chips with salad and recieve chips and salad and they said that it was close enough to warrant acceptable so we couldn't get a refund for the order st all .I had to contact them again today spoke to 8 agents before I got offered a ¬£6.70 when I refused this as my order was ¬£15.10 they said they wouldn't be able to help me so I said about this trust pilot review site and it being at 1.2 out of 5 and that i would be leaving a review in this and would post it on social media all of a sudden they offered me a ¬£11.70 refund which again I rejected I reminded the agent again me leaving a review and putting it on social media all lf a sudden I was offered a full refund via just eat credit , not what I wanted at all but i would rather have some sort of money back for a future order than nothing at all.Please if you have a problem getting something sorted with them push and push it otherwise they just fob you off

Title: 3 orders 3 cancellation no refund
Review: So I have ordered 3 times since 930pm every order has been cancelled. To find out just eat has no drivers. I tried to call to complain but the the guy did the whole cant hear me thing as soon as I said the word complain and manager. The customer service staff blatantly just lie on the chat to get rid of you. I actually haven't eaten tonight. And as its after 10pm looks like due to this service I won't be eating tonight. Thanks. Maybe if the spent less on the advert and maybe more on service we wouldn't be in this mess

Title: Very long wait
Review: Ordered food on just eats at 9:15 and have been stuck on assigning driver ever since üò§

Title: Worst delivery company
Review: Got the wrong food then they never sent out the correct order paid over 10 pound and they only offered me 6 pound credit on the app... Tried contacting them for over an hour just for them to say they won't give a full refund....

Title: Exactly  same situation as Sue
Review: Exactly  same situation as Sue. Long wait. No delivery  yet charged ¬£23 and told they will investigate  yet no response .

Title: Beware u can loose your money easily.
Review: Ordered 2 meals form Just eat. Food was expected in 25 minutes or so. Food never arrived. I contacted the restaurant and they advised to contact just eat. On the app the food was marked as delivered. Contacted Just eat to discuss they said that they will investigate and it will take 48 hours to get feedback. In the mean time I ordered another meal which arrived fine. Just eat came back and said because the meal shows as delivered and that it shows that the driver was in my area I'm not entitled for a refund. Very disgusting that I should be out of pocket for food I never received. I will never use this service again.

Title: Missing items yet again
Review: Missing items yet again . I have deleted the app . Won‚Äôt be giving them any more money . Bye bye

Title: Over 1 hour delay and the food never arrived
Review: I ordered takeout for 17:40. This was delayed to 18:11. Then 18:56. Then 19:17. By 18:20 I was already on the chat with customer service, and then to their Complaints department. Who pretended to have a technical error before they would even answer the phone, via their answerphone message. Then dragged out the process as long as possible. Eventually I was issued a refund, but they wasted an hour of my time and left me with no dinner. Utterly disgusted by the entire service. DO NOT USE JUST EAT.

Title: Absolutely useless
Review: Absolutely useless. If you are a small business, do not be tempted to use these cowboys. All they are bothered about is there commission, which is around 20% of every order, and not bothered about anything else. No customer service. No control over your menu, or delivery areas. It's an absolute nightmare. I just cannot get the help I need, and it just takes so much of your time to get the simplest things sorted.

Title: No delivery and yet only 50% refund....
Review: Three hour wait for no food to arrive and told I‚Äôm only entitled to a 50% refund as driver already assigned???? Disgusted is an understatement

Title: For the second time in one week my food‚Ä¶
Review: For the second time in one week my food was tagged as delivered by just eats driver dispite it not been delivered.First order was ¬£18 odd and this one ¬£15odd.The annoying thing is it takes 48 hours for just eat to look into the matter and then if your refunded it takes another few days for the refund to show in your account. A company as large as just wat must be making some healthy profit on interest on that money.Why do they not have their customer service agent you speak to contact the driver. Since they moved their customer abroad things have gone downhill fast.I now have to wait a week for my money back.Of course I will be closing my account as it's to much hassle when orders are messes up by just eats delivery tracking and this has happened twice in 7 days costing me over ¬£30 total.Get a grip just eat and do something about drivers tagging orders as delivered when they are not.Treat your customers better.

Title: Driver marked order as delivered but no‚Ä¶
Review: Driver marked order as delivered but no food arrived, customer service can only forward onto investigations but I‚Äôll have to wait 48 hours for outcome. Which really means no food no refund.

Title: Justeat = criminals
Review: Justeat = criminalsThere driver claimed to deliver the food that never turned up and they refuse to refund the money paid.I never leave bad reviews in general but there poor customer service and terrible attitude has made me.I really do hope restaurants wise up and stop using there service.

Title: Just Eat = BLOOD SUCKING
Review: I am so happy for this opportunity.  Just-Eat is nothing more than BLOOD SUCKING organisation, who took advantage of small businesses, and did nothing but utilise their technology advantage over many good food business, who received virtually NOTHING from their hard works.Just Eat does nothing more than coining the money from many struggling small businesses.   Just Eat expect no helps unless, these struggling small businesses pay Just Eat money to promote.  I hope one day GOVERNMENT could see how Just Eat has been taking advantages of its monopoly and stop  this unfair businesses deal.Just Eat only have the web sit up and running, but those business members have to do all the hardworks, but then these small business have to  pay 14% (+VAT) and additional 50p from the guest into JustEat pocket.Just Eat had enough money to buy its only competitor HUNGRY HOUSE - and closed that business down. Something is not right, and PLEASE if any one reading this message, please help and support your local business, by ordering directly to the Restaurant, and if it is not that far, get up and do a little walk down to kick off the appetite.

Title: Absolutely crap
