Review: Absolutely crap.  Ordered two tubs of Ben And Gerrys.  Delayed delivery, when they finally arrived they had melted. Refused  to accept them.  Tried contacting Just Eat...how pathetic is their algorithm.  Wont recognise any of my word inputs to the "Juat Eat Bot" what a joke that is?Can not get my money back as the supplier claims it is a Justeat problem but Justeat, using its awfully created algorithm doesn't respond.Unbelievably awful.

Title: Food did not arrive at the delivery‚Ä¶
Review: Food did not arrive at the delivery time but came 2hours and 30 mins late. I spent around 40 mins on the chat. The first 2 chat assistants ended the call before it was processed. I had to repeat myself 3 times before I got any joy.  They would not refund the order at the time said the order was out for delivery. I recieved no updates until 10.20pm to say once again the delivery was on its way. When the order came it was cold and not at a satisfactory quality so I refused to except delivery. I informed the assistant on the chat and she offered  a credit note and said it was as good as a refund. No it not. This break the consumer rights and trade description  law. I was given misleading information and the food was at a unsatisfactory standard. Totally unexceptable. I wanted a refund as as far as I was concerned I did not recieve my order in a timely manner and it was cold.

Title: I wouldn't even give it a one
Review: I wouldn't even give it a one! Disgusting service - food was over 30 mins late and therefore cold, when I phoned to chase up the order it was waiting on a driver.  Drinks were all spilt over in the bag on delivery.  When I went on the webchat they offered a just eat credit ' I won't ever be using Just Eat again. Disgusted

Title: Brilliant
Review: First time i have used this site this evening.Cant complain. No issues at all. Food arrived hot and on time. Website is easy to navigate and order.

Title: Useless support staff when an order‚Ä¶
Review: Useless support staff when an order hasn't been picked up. Cannot trust the delivery service.

Title: Food Order never arrived
Review: Food Order never arrived. Can understand a mistake. But JustEat attitude sucks. Customer service non existent. 2 Bot attempts, 3 calls later and 2 emails, justEat wont refund says restaurant delivered. No poof they even delivered or to the correct address. Utter rubbish, family sat with no food for 2 hours waiting. Food never arrived. Avoid at all costs. Will never use them again.

Title: AVOID - Terrible customer service.
Review: I tried to make a complaint via just eat after ordering food last night. The food took 2 hours 45 minutes to deliver and when it arrived it was cold. I tried to speak with the restaurant (1 successful attempt out of 65) and was fobbed off with an excuse about traffic (even though there was none - food arrived at almost 9pm and roads were empty according to google maps). I spoke to the bot service who put me through to a live chat. I was told just eat can‚Äôt help and I need to speak with the restaurant. So I tried the restaurant one more time as requested of me, of course they hung the phone up. I went back to just eat and was told it‚Äôs down to the restaurant, they can‚Äôt help - even though I had followed every single step asked of me. I then asked for the complaints procedure and was completely ignore, the response was ‚Äúyou need to contact the restaurant‚Äù. I then asked again around 10 more times and did not receive an answer as to what their complaints procedure was or given a number/email etc. The service was absolutely shambolic. They don‚Äôt want to take any responsibility, yet they are offering their service on their website.

Title: Customer service as good as catching Covid-19
Review: Worst customer service I‚Äôve ever experienced. Ordered peri peri chicken tonight ate a bit and realised it was so off and rotten it smelled like roadkill. Immediately rang the takeaway who offered to give refund through justeat. Contacted justeat via the ‚Äúbot‚Äù which agreed to issue the ¬£6. Nothing then happened, so I rang up the helpline as I was now feeling nauseous 3 hours after the eating a small piece of rotten chicken. I suspect food poisoning. The guy couldn‚Äôt understand my problem so put me on hold for an hour. I hung up and tried again, to speak to a woman who couldn‚Äôt understand and she put the phone down on me. I then contacted the ‚Äúbot‚Äù site again for them to tell me they take no responsibility for food poisoning and that I should contact the council. Words cannot express how utterly useless and unethical they are as a company. They take a large cut of your money for literally no effort, responsibility or due care for there customers. Avoid at all costs, they wouldn‚Äôt care if you died of salmonella.

Title: same again disgusting
Review: same again, very disgusting service of justeat, wrong ordered delivered, contacted just eat and after half an hour talk they said some one will investigate and contact me and no one ever contacted back..

Title: I ordered food which never arrived
Review: I ordered food which never arrived, when I checked the site it said it had been delivered; nobody had called my phone, buzzed my building, or knocked at my door. I rang Just Eat to find out what was happening, after a long drawn out process I was finally put through to one of their customer service team, I explained what had happened and they told me what I already knew - the restaurant had marked it as delivered - though they also told me an investigation would be launched. A few days later I received an email telling me I would not be receiving a refund as they had checked their records and the restaurant marked it as delivered... I don't know if I need to point out why this is a problem. So a restaurant marks my order as delivered when it wasn't, I call and explain that, their "investigation" means simply asking the restaurant again? And what a surprise, the restaurant stuck to their lie. I was frustrated when I didn't receive my food, but I was really getting annoyed now, who wouldn't? Not only am I being refused a refund for food I didn't receive, I'm essentially being accused of lying and Just Eat have not put any effort into determining what is correct - their "investigation" is as lazy as they come. So I get in contact with Just eat again and explain all of this, I'm told they will look into my issue more thoroughly, sounds all good right? Today I get another email from them, the exact same email I received last time (word for goddamn word). What is the point in pretending you're going to deal with my issue if you're going to put such little effort into concealing the fact that you have done absolutely nothing? Do Just Eat just assume their customers are too stupid to realise? Or too lazy to persist? Nothing annoys me more than companies who take their customers for granted in this way, I order food occasionally out of convenience and thankfully it was just me on my lonesome this time, what if I was ordering for a family? I've been ordering from Just Eat for as long as I can remember, yeah I don't get a bucket in every week, but I've given them enough over the years and I've NEVER claimed food wasn't delivered to me. Welp what can ya do? The most annoying thing about this (and I take full responsibility for being duped twice) is that this all happened to me with Deliveroo! Both have terrible customer service, basically you're fine on 99.9% of your orders, but pray that a restaurant doesn't F you over because believe me, these guys will not lift a finger to solve it.

Title: Appalling Service - I will never use them again!
Review: My daughter had got to Outstanding at school so I decided to order a Macdonalds to deliver to the house, through Just Eat, as a surprise to say well done. Not only was the order a hour and a half late, it was stone cold and the delivery driver made no attempt at an apology. She simply said that she did not speak English, shrugged her shoulders and walked off. I tried to request a refund and complain to Just Eat. What a joke! Seven different operators all asking me what the problem was with no solution, no refund, barely an apology and just talked nonsense at me for an hour! I asked how to get a card refund as I had no intention of ordering from them again and no one could tell me. Their site is ridiculous when it comes to a complaint as you just get passed through one 'call' to another and there is no direct way to request a refund anywhere! When I called Macdonalds they could not believe it had taken so long and told me that next time I visit the restaurant they would give me a free meal as a way of saying sorry. They were polite, apologetic and very professional. In comparison Just Eat said to leave a review for the restaurant and they would feed back to them how dreadful they were with no one wanting to share the blame etc. I am utterly appalled by the lack of customer service, empathy, helpfulness or regard for my two tired, hungry and tearful children who I had promised a treat to! In the end I had to cook for them otherwise they would not have eaten till late and would have had to go straight to bed! This simply is not good enough and I will never use this company again!

Title: Surprised by all the negative reviews
Review: Surprised by all the negative reviews. I've ordered from Just Eat 100's of times over the years and I don't recall ever having any problems. I've lived in 4 different towns/cities over the last couple of years and Just Eat has been reliable in every location. I've taken off 1 star because the delivery fees are sometimes extortionate. I don't know what Just Eat charge the restaurant for the use of their service but in most cases I can order from the restaurant directly and get free delivery so I don't get how Just Eat can charge ¬£3 for delivery from the same restaurant.

Title: I ordered a takeaway and despite living‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered a takeaway and despite living exactly one mile from the shop for two hours the delivery driver couldn‚Äôt find my house. I was verbally abused by the man in the shop and the delivery driver. The delivery driver sent me abusive text messages and I didn‚Äôt receive my delivery. I complained to just eat and explained as a woman living on her own being abused by two men who knew my address and phone number I had felt scared and vulnerable. Just eat ‚Äúinvestigates‚Äù the matter and said the takeaway shop said my food had been delivered so basically saying I was lying. I have screenshots of the messages to prove I‚Äôm not lying I also had to order another delivery from just eat straight after. Why would I do that if I‚Äôd already received the first order? As a nurse finishing a 12 hour shift during the pandemic all I wanted was a quick meal as I hadn‚Äôt eaten all day. The way just eat didn‚Äôt care that I was abused or didn‚Äôt receive my food was shocking. The takeaway has numerous complaints like this and they have done nothing probably because they make more money from having them on the site and don‚Äôt care how they treat their customers b

Title: They spent so much money greasing Snoop‚Ä¶
Review: They spent so much money greasing Snoop Dogg`s palm that they can`t get the basics down. They`ve got a `gangsta` operation running that would make even the most seasoned `G` go green with envy. I can`t believe they can get away with this; does Snoop Dogg know what`s been going? I guess some white middle-class advertising executives have decided to get down with the whole `hood` thing from the comfort of their privileged status (have a look at Les Grossman in Tropic Thunder for more of that, or perhaps listen to Vanilla Ice). Just Eat: Get Rick Quick Or Die Tryin`, eh? :(

Title: Very Poor Service
Review: They are expensive unless a discount code is used, typically use 20-25%.I transferred money in to give account credit not knowing that this then can't be used with any discount codes - effectively meaning I lose 20-25%!All other payment methods including PayPal allow codes to be used with an order. Can not see any way of getting my money back.Customer services are useless: robot, then stock answers from a human which don't help. They kept me on the chat for over 90 mins and passed me through several staff who made no attempt to resolve the issue.Shocked to come here and find 1 star rating - looks like everyone else also has an unacceptable poor experience!But I like the 5 star p' take review from "Sno man" the best - search it out, you'll love it, both funny and probably spot on! :)Note that we have had good experiences with both Deliveroo and Uber Eats so you know where I will be sticking!

Title: I don't think I have ever had an order‚Ä¶
Review: I don't think I have ever had an order there hasn't been an issue with. Missing items and missing meal. The worst so far was this weekend just gone. We ordered kfc through just eat spending ¬£60 on 6 meals sides and drinks. For once the delivery driver actually arrived by the predicted time...however. he passed me 2 little bags ,so I asked him where is the rest .he replied that's all they gave me ...I said to him does it look like there are 6 meals in there ,I opened the bag and it only had the sides in it .I phoned just eat who were as about much use as a chocolate teapot and suggested I phoned the restaurant. So I phoned kfc who quickly informed me that the driver had actually left the bag behind and he seemed in a hurry. KFC where very helpful and said I could go and collect a fresh order. The staff at kfc explained my order was ready to go the driver just didn't take it . Just eat always pass the buck and never take responsibility or offer to resolve the problem. You plan a nice evening and it just ends up being headache. I will never use just eat again and I would seriously advise against using them . If I could give 0 stars I would.

Title: I would advise everybody to use‚Ä¶
Review: I would advise everybody to use deliveroo or Uber eats as they are so much more helpful in the case of any problems this is the worst food delivery service I have ever come across If I could give this service a 0 that wouldn‚Äôt be Low enough My food came incomplete I then phoned up customer services which was terrible the women on the phone was very rude and actually hung up on me the restaurant blamed it on just eat and just eat blamed it on the restaurant will never be using this service again and wouldn‚Äôt recommend anyone else to do so either.

Title: Just eat was good, food was bad
Review: Ordered food from Jones grill, the delivery was on time the guy that delivered it was nice and polite and as for the order it was brought to the door with no issues.  Unfortunately, although the online experience was very good the food was not. Ordered 2 lamb dishes and it was fat and tough Was not able to eat the food.  I have had a chicken order before which was lovely, but tonight I have paid ¬£14 for food that I was unable to eat. Just eat was good the delivery was good but the food was bad

Title: Terrible service from just eat this‚Ä¶
Review: Terrible service from just eat this evening ordered food over two hours ago. Spoke to McDonald‚Äôs who had cooked order three times and had to throw away - update on app says looking to assign a driver. Eventually got through to Just Eat customer service who were useless just said they would cancel order!! Pointed out it had ruined my evening didn‚Äôt care a bit. When I asked why they had taken money and app had not been updated to say no drivers in LONDON (not in middle of nowhere) she just kept reeling script off. Then went quiet and wouldn‚Äôt speak or answer questions- this reflects badly not only on Just Eat who used to be good but also on the likes of McDonald‚Äôs and the other companies they are representing! Checked app now says delivered even though they haven‚Äôt!!! Should be investigated by trading standards

Title: LiveChat Kristine Ruined My Night More Than Non-Delivery
Review: Waiting over 1.5 hours with no driver assigned. Spoke to customer service and KRISTINE was absolutely ABYSMAL to deal with because of her obsession with POINTLESS security questions for data protection. I was already logged into the account and speaking to her via live chat so if I were a fraudster/hacker I could easily read all the stuff she was asking for anyway, her questions served no purpose than to infuriate me even more. Surprised she didn't ask my bleeding shoe size, it was like 4 or 5 security questions she asked, she even asked me 4 my name which was written in the live chat FACEPALM- HOW IS THAT MORE SECURE?! When you're fuming and hungry you are not in the mood to do a quiz about your old self (the account was set up years ago with old phone numbers, email and delivery address so i had to try and guess my answers several times while fuming and just being repeatedly quizzed

Title: Ordered from Mc Donalds
Review: Ordered from Mc Donalds, not even half my order came. The Delivery Driver took the order back to McDonalds, and told me to contact Just Eat as it was not the restaurants fault. I was given nothing, zilch, zero, no food! I paid to have a man knock at my door and tell me that the order was wrong! I contacted Just Eat and they said I would have to wait 72 hours before I even got a response, and that I might not get my money back. So basically Just Eat, Mcdonalds, whoever is responsible, have robbed me of ¬£20.17p. Nice going guys, you lost another customer!

Title: Impossible to get a refund. Contacted Just Eat immediately when my‚Ä¶
Review: Impossible to get a refund. Contacted Just Eat immediately when my order didn't arrive. Was promised a refund and told to re-order. Refund never arrived. Contacted them again and told to wait up to 5 days for it to be refunded. Contacted them again 4 times and spoke to 4 agents all who took my details of my missing order and promised a refund. Was then told they couldn't refund as they didnt have the details of the missing order. Gave them details again then told it was over 48 hours (remember I rang them immediately) The agent promised to escalated to a manager who promised to call within 24 hours but never did. Spent 2 hours on chat bot and was assured by 3 different agents I'd be given a credit to my account or refund. Never got either. They also disconnect the chats frequently. Disgraceful do not use. Go direct to the restaurant as its cheaper and save money and hassle. They should be investigated.

Title: Customer service is absolutely awful
Review: Customer service is absolutely awful. Order never arrived and have had 5 separate conversations with no resolution to a simple request of a refund.Stay clear and use deliveroo or Uber Eats much more customer friendly

Title: Sad at lunch
Review: I ordered from Just Eat for my lunch break. I received someone else's order, returned it, then lunch break was over while waiting for a replacement. Also, I didn't receive any replacement after and I ate my morning biscuits. In the end, I was hungry and have to explain things to get my money back.That wasn't very nice.

Title: Worst Company EVER
Review: For the sake of your sanity, DO NOT use Just Eat...UberEats or even deliveroo are a much better optionI placed an order, Just Eat driver marked the order "delivered" and did not actually deliver anything.After many days and numerous attempts, I have not received my money back yet and I've honestly just given up now, the time wasted is not worth it anymore.Listen to this.... they said they will open an "investigation" and make a decision in 48 hours looolThen.... after their investigation, they decided to not refund me because the order was marked "delivered". I mean..... sometimes i actually do wonder if it's really actual people or donkeys working behind the scenes at this pathetic excuse of a company.Oh... and good luck trying to speak to a manager or supervisor... no, they're so busy stealing customers money that they have to call you back, I've still not received any call from them by the wayAll i can say is, if you actually do decide to order on just eat, may the force be with you

Title: I downloaded the app
Review: I downloaded the app, I ordered my food but as I got to payment it came up with an error saying payment wouldn‚Äôt go through...stupidly clicked it again...no order and just eat took 2 payments from my bank. Doesn‚Äôt look hopeful I‚Äôll get the money back! Order with Uber eats if you can

Title: Absolutely terrible service     I‚Ä¶
Review: Absolutely terrible service     I ordered a takeaway for deliver and it never arrived. Tried to request assistance to no avail, they were quick enough to take the money   I have not managed to get it back yet. Will never use again

Title: If you are unlucky enough to have a bad‚Ä¶
Review: If you are unlucky enough to have a bad experience with a restaurant, dont expect just eat to help you out. They will tell you a manager will call within 24 hours (Which is a lie) & they will only offer you a partial refund or credit on your account when you are entitled to a full refund.

Title: I got a refund credit on my account but‚Ä¶
Review: I got a refund credit on my account but it will not let me use it 9 phone calls later and I am just being palmed off. Amazing when I un tick the credit and go to pay  full price it soon allows me to pay. Bunch of thieves

Title: They keep your money if you have to alter an order!!
Review: I made a error on my order but couldn‚Äôt alter it so ordered a second time. Rang the restaurant to cancel my first order and they said just eat don‚Äôt let them I would have to do it through just eat. So I did and just eat kept half of the value of my cancelled order value. They kept ¬£34 of mine for no reason whatsoever and have totally ignored email correspondence from me querying it. BE VERY WARY OF USING THIS APP. no wonder they can afford to pay for an ad with snoop dog on a private jet!!!!

Title: I was promised a refund for disgusting‚Ä¶
Review: It is not even worth one star I was promised a refund for disgusting food and got passed to 10 different robotic chat helps they promised 20.00 refund made me put another orser in and charge me in full i am going to the trading standards please use takeaways direct stop using just eat they do not deserve the businrss

Title: I placed an order and I received a text‚Ä¶
Review: I placed an order and I received a text saying that you‚Äôre order is going to be late.within 1 minute of Ordering it.I called the restaurant. they said we are not open for another Hour and a half. I don‚Äôt know why they‚Äôre letting you order on the app. I cancelled the order thinking that I‚Äôm gonna get my money back but they‚Äôve taken ¬£10.88 for cancellation. They said I can‚Äôt get it back. Second time this just eat have robbed me. Never agen usen them stay away.

Title: No refunds
Review: This company is impossible to get a refund from. Their customer service team don‚Äôt know anything apart from pre-loaded generic answers who just bounce you to a different department, ‚Äúinvestigations team‚Äù. After investigation for s few days they tell you what you already know and can‚Äôt help. To me this is tantamount to fraud or extortion. The restaurant had to call and insist on my refund. How can you expect me to pay for a cancelled order. Pile of ****.

Title: Read for refund
Review: I ordered a takeaway pizza and it never arrived. I call the customer service team and they passed it on to the investigation team. I then phoned back after 3 days and we were no further than the conversation from our first call. I then called back a week later and still no further progress had been made. I then asked to speak to a manager who directly told me she would deal with this personally. A further two weeks later it‚Äôs still sat with the investigation team. If you experience this their is hope contact your bank explain your situation and keep the evidence of your calls, as you do have to try and resolve it with just eat and then too no avail the bank will return your transaction.

Title: Papas at green lane rm8
Review: Papas at green lane rm8Is the worst place to order from and for some reason just eat giving them a high rate of customer service this not correct everyone please go in there and see it for yourself the staff unless u speak their language they won‚Äôt hekp you it‚Äôs filthy they way they work and timing for the food or anything takes twice long as they fava and serve others food before you.  Worst place in history then I thought let me order it over the phone OMG waited almost two hours for delivery.

Title: SHOCKING
Review: Hello,I‚Äôm really sorry to even be having to email, but I have no clue where else to go or turn. Over two and a half weeks ago I made an order through just eat to Pizza Hut. Myself and two children waited over two hours and it never turned up. When I rang Pizza Hut directly They said the driver never turned up and had also not picked up three other orders I then went on to ring just eat 6 days in a row and no one was helpful or clear. I kept being promised a refund within 24 hours and it never happened. I have chased and chased and got no where. I then just tried to speak on line to someone who cut me off! Purposely I have recorded everything and I‚Äôm beyond angry and upset. This is my last reach out before I feel I must go public as I‚Äôm disgraced that I‚Äôm chasing my own money for something that never turned up!

Title: Just Eat going downhill fast.
Review: They used to be able to deal with problems quite efficiently when their customer service department was in the UK. Now you have absolute 0% chance of resolving anything with these 1diots.  They have become so incompetent over the last few years, customers (the people actually ordering the food) and their partners (which are the food establishments that provide the food) are finding it impossible to deal with this company. Avoid Just Eat,Uber Eats and Deliveroo  if you can because the food establishments will inevitably increase their prices or reduce their offers on these platforms to cover the costs. They can charge the restaurants anywhere between 20%-35%. If a food establishment has their own delivery service ringing them directly or using their website will normally be cheaper. Food Hub is another good option at the moment (they charge the restaurants 0% commission) so they should be able to give better deals on this platform. One thing is definitely for sure Just Eat is becoming a joke, but I suppose they had to cut some corners to give Snoop Dogg his 5 million.

Title: The worst customer service! AVOID AT ALL COSTS
Review: I have had the exact same experience! My order turned up wrong, the delivery driver then said he would go to try and get the right order! ..... and then never returned! I phoned Just Eat 1 hour after the order was placed to say he had not returned and I had not got my food! They then responded with ‚Äúunfortunately we cannot do anything as the order was marked as complete‚Äù so your customers don‚Äôt matter? Then they said the only way they could do anything would be to send this to the investigations team who would take 48 hours to reply! Then I also got a reply saying ‚Äúthe investigation team have spoken to the restaurant and can confirm the order was delivered and will be unable to issue a refund‚Äù I phoned back immediately to which I was told ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry about this I will pass this onto the investigations team who will contact you in 48 hours‚Äù I heard nothing! So phoned back for a 3rd time (one week later) and was told exactly the same thing again! It seems no one has ‚Äòauthority‚Äô to refund or even do anything! How can they think not giving customers a service they‚Äôve paid for is acceptable!? I‚Äôm never going with them again!

Title: I'm not sure how JustEat can say they‚Ä¶
Review: I'm not sure how JustEat can say they are easy to work with you can't even get pass the job app they ask for papers then are not in this country. Even when my job coach has a talk with them all lies they told him.

Title: McDonald‚Äôs although supposed to be is‚Ä¶
Review: McDonald‚Äôs although supposed to be is not on my just eat app...

Title: Disappointing
Review: Same as others, my order never arrived, the restaurant were quite happy to help me with this issue and even rang just eat for me so they were aware of my case. It was the just eat driver that never turned up. Its been 2 weeks, multiple conversations on the phone and over chat and nothing has changed, "issue been looked into further" yeah sure it has!!!!! Im never using the app again.

Title: Absolutely shocking
Review: Absolutely shocking. My order never came. They claimed they had an investigation team looking at my failed order. I spent hours trying to resolve it. Empty promises that they will look at it. Still no response even after one week and four tries (only from my side). They are bad. Never again I m going to use them and I ll make sure everyone I know will hear of their bad customer service.

Title: After spending literally thousands of‚Ä¶
Review: After spending literally thousands of pounds with just eat I encountered my first ever none delivery.  I contacted customer service 3 times without any joy.  Each time they said an investigation e-mail would be sent but one never arrived.  I asked for an e-mail address to send a complaint to and e-mailed it over.  I got a response to say that they had spoken to the restaurant and a refund would not be issued.  What a great way to resolve the dispute without even speaking to me.  I have evidence myself that proves the delivery was not even attempted, but they are not interested.  I am now having to take this issue further and will pursue all the way to small claims if i have to.

Title: Customer service sucks.
Review: I used to use just eat regularly. On one occasion I ordered some food which was never delivered dispute the app saying the driver was on his way for 45 mins. Phoned the restaurant they had no record of my order so it became apparent no food was coming. Phoned just eat explained the problem and said I wanted my money back. The lady was understanding until she went to cancel and said she could only give me 50% back. I demanded I wanted full money back as I had paid them and not received anything. Not my fault. After 30 mins back and forth and me literally arguing with the customer service assistant eventually I got a full refund but by this time I was fuming. Wrote an email complaining about my customer service experience and didn't get any kind of reply. I've now cancelled my account and deleted the app. Will not be using again. I understand things don't always run smoothly but it's how you deal with those issues and just eat highlighted their customer service is awful.

Title: Disgusting
Review: On the 8th of September i ordered a kfc for home delivery from your Downham store on Bromley road, my delivery was delivered by just eat the entire bottom half of the bag was soaking wet with gravy and started to drip over the floor as the bag was being passed to me. The just eat driver said that he could not take it back and had told the staff when he picked it up to wrap the bag some more to which they refused. He said to complain to just eat and get a refund. I live at the top of a three storey block of flats and was not prepared for carrying a bag with gravy dripping everywhere, the entire communal stairway is now covered in gravy as is the carpet within my property, i have also burnt my hands trying to stop more gravy from pouring all over the carpets. I will attach some photos of how my food was delivered and i am sure you will agree that it is just an absolute disaster. To make matters worse i complained to just eat and had to have a 15-20 minute message conversation with someone who would only refund 20 of the ¬£25 i have spent on the food and then i would have to completely reorder. I can‚Äôt believe how bad the entire service was and i even had missing items from my original order. Disgusting customer service!

Title: Avoid if you want food delivered
Review: Avoid if you want food delivered. Food never turned up, restaurant even called us to say they cannot locate the driver and the food was getting cold. Spoke to JustEat Customer service, who deceitfully tried to claim that the restaurant was closed and it was our fault for booking food with a closed restaurant, despite the restaurant calling us to say the driver hadn't arrived?! Recommend using any of the other delivery services - much less of a headache, and you get food at the end of it.

Title: Reliable service
Review: I think the average reviews is just a consequence of no-one bothering to come here to review the simple act of delivering food. I've ordered JustEat about 50 times and had no issues so far

Title: Do yourself a favour and order from a‚Ä¶
Review: Do yourself a favour and order from a more reputable company. Just eat fail to take any responsibility for the poor service they provide. 2 weeks of attempting to get a refund for an order over 90 mins late and stone cold on arrival, and still no closer.

Title: Only got 1 star as lowest could go
Review: Only got 1 star as lowest could go. Their system pulled through old details on the app hence I got no food. Tried dealing with the restaurant directly and service was appalling.  Contacted Just Eat and the only good thing was the rep I spoke to. They didn't acknowledge the system fault, backed the restaurant.  No food or refund  as a result I say DO NOT USE.

Title: Didnt receive order
Review: Didnt receive order. Contacted justeat no refund. App shows delivered. I have cctv and could catch the delivery driver out if justeat would actually bother to look into this. I get theres a lot of people who try get a free meal but I can't believe ive lost ¬£22 and even with cctv footage and other proof that its possible to have a company take your money. I know its only 22. I'll call mcdonalds leisure park themselves tomorrow as I went straight to justeat who's investigations team have refused to refund me and its been 48+ hours. Bit embarrassed I have to speak to a mcdonalds about this now. Just think twice about using themUpdateSpoke to mcdonalds today who have said they just make the food and justeat put on the drivers so sent back to them again. I can't believe this can happen and I know people just probably take what I'm saying with a pinch of salt but I didnt receive the delivery

Title: Worst customer service ever experienced
Review: I tried to order 2 orders in the last two days form different restaurants. Both times the order was marked delivered at road 15 minutes away from my house. Each time the driver rang to say they were outside when I said they weren‚Äôt they said they would have a look and then hang up, then I get a notification saying delivered! The address they mark as delivered is clearly different to what I put on the order. I put it down to my house being new and their systems not picking up my postcode (although no other delivery company have a problem) I contacted the online help was and told my case will be investigated then I got any email today to say they won‚Äôt refund me. I rang and was told the same thing over and over not actually listening to what I say but just saying the same line that refunded there‚Äôs nothing they can do! I will be taking this further and I will never use just eat again.

Title: It must be due to COVID that orders‚Ä¶
Review: It must be due to COVID that orders placed through just eat are being stolen by the hungry drivers. We placed an order today about an hour ago and like the reviews below the order was marked as delivered yet we‚Äôd not received our food, we also did not receive a phone call. We spoke with just eat who said they would refund us and investigate. Why doesn‚Äôt just eat add a tracker like Uber? So in the end we placed an ordered through UberEats and we tracked and received it in the estimated time and delivery was 50p cheaper than just eat. My advice - JustEat? JustDont!

Title: Last 2 orders didn't come and for one‚Ä¶
Review: Last 2 orders didn't come and for one of them they are not in a rush to refund us. Pathetic!

Title: Avoid at all costs
Review: Currently having a nightmare with an order I have placed. Food ordered for delivery at 12.30 today. Received notification that it would be 20 minutes late. 25 minutes after the changed time and we still had no food. Called the restaurant and was told the driver had turned up early and the food was not ready. The driver then left the restaurant and did not return. Advised by the restaurant to call Just eat directly. On hold to Just Eat for half an hour who can give no explaination as to why the driver did this. They have put a request in for another driver to collect and deliver the food. Food that has been sat in the restaurant waiting for an hour and a half. Still waiting for delivery. Very poor show. We are nurses on a tight lunch break and probably won't have time to eat the food, even if it arrives!!! Very poor show and will not be using again. Deleting the app when the food arrives.

Title: Pray you receive your order
Review: Ordered a KFC through justeat and it never turned up. Followed the driver and watched them go the opposite way to a nearby business park which they then turned their phone off. (Probably to eat my order) got in touch with online customer services told it needed to go to investigation team and will take 48 hours to come back with resolution. In the meantime I then went to KFC and my order was nearly ¬£10 cheaper then justeat as they are not passing over the 5%vat reduction. After pestering them 3 times and posting on their fb page still nothing. The only way to get your money back is to go through your bank. I urge everyone to do this and not let them get away with keeping your money.

Title: Order never arrived
Review: Order never arrived, no refund.Customer service took ages to email and then didn't offer any support. Terrible, avoid.

Title: RIP OFF
Review: RIP OFF. They inflate the cost of all the items on the menus, plus they charge you for delivery. Go to your local takeaway and get your own menu and their telephone number, it will save you A LOT of ¬£¬£¬£.

Title: My food didn't arrive and they won't refund me.
Review: My food didn't arrive, I couldn't contact the driver as it just went through to a just eat voice mail. It said my order has been delivered when I think the driver ate it or gave it to the wrong place. Instantly I went to their customer service... A chat bot. After it not understanding anything I said, I got through to a human - after being number 72 in line for the chat. They give copy and pasted responses and told me it would be investigated; if they could see my activity on the app, they could see I ordered more food due to that not arriving and that I contacted the driver after it was 'delivered' One week later, after a lot of chasing, I get told I'd have my account credited for the cost of the food. They said they couldn't refund me because it was over two days... Well yes, because you made me wait a week! Unacceptable, I was told I'd receive a full refund initially, why should I pay for a service they didn't provide? I then get told this is being investigated again. I also demanded to speak with a manager and the staff kept ignoring me or leaving the chat. I finally get a manager to agree to talk to me but they don't. I get an email and a line that they couldn't reach me (I was sat with my phone all day). It's been over a week and it's still not sorted. I just want my refund so I can never use this awful service again. You can't just steal money from your customers without providing the advertised service. I did also request all of my data on this case as per data protection laws but, once again, they didn't deliver. I think I'm going to have to get my solicitor involved out of principle as this is just not fair.

Title: Absolutely shocking service!
Review: Absolutely shocking service!! Do not use this company, half my food was missing from my KFC order, food was cold! had to go out to get more food as not enough!! Took over 2 hours to get through to someone, who said I would get a refund, but lied as no refund, spoke to them again today was told they cannot give me a refund as not their policy! Even after first person I spoke to said they would What kind of company is this!! Absolutely appalling, please save yourself the stress and money and use someone else

Title: Awful service
Review: Awful service! Will never use Just-Eats again, giving restaurants a bad reputation.

Title: Your food might never arrive and you won‚Äôt receive a refund!
Review: Pretty sure there is some kind of scam going on with Just Eat drivers right now. They seem to be picking up the order, driving near your house in order to prove correct GPS, likely eating the food, marking the order as delivered and then leaving. There is no way to report this on the site as you‚Äôre put through to a chat bot with no automated system of receiving a refund. Please avoid Just Eat and use another delivery service. Deliveroo have extremely efficient customer service which is all done in-app.
